      // Animate camera to look at specific position
      function animateCameraToPosition(targetAngle) {
        if (!camera || !controls) return;
        
        // Calculate target camera position
        const distance = 2.5;
        const targetX = Math.sin(targetAngle) * distance;
        const targetZ = Math.cos(targetAngle) * distance;
        
        const startX = camera.position.x;
        const startZ = camera.position.z;
        let progress = 0;
        
        function animate() {
          progress += 0.03;
          if (progress <= 1) {
            const ease = 1 - Math.pow(1 - progress, 3);
            camera.position.x = startX + (targetX - startX) * ease;
            camera.position.z = startZ + (targetZ - startZ) * ease;
            camera.lookAt(0, 0, 0);
            controls.update();
            requestAnimationFrame(animate);
          }
        }
        animate();
      }

      // Animate main model to show position
      function animateToPosition(targetRotationY) {
        if (!tshirt) return;
        
        const startRotation = tshirt.rotation.y;
        let progress = 0;
        
        function animate() {
          progress += 0.05;
          if (progress <= 1) {
            const ease = 1 - Math.pow(1 - progress, 3);
            // Find shortest rotation path
            let diff = targetRotationY - startRotation;
            while (diff > Math.PI) diff -= Math.PI * 2;
            while (diff < -Math.PI) diff += Math.PI * 2;
            tshirt.rotation.y = startRotation + diff * ease;
            requestAnimationFrame(animate);
          }
        }
        animate();
      }

      // Initialize Mini Position Previews with 15% movement controls
      function initPositionPreviews() {
        const positions = ['front', 'back', 'left', 'right'];
        
        // Create Vuexy-style soft gradient background for mini panels
        // Single horizontal gradient that will be split across all panels
        const gradientCanvas = document.createElement('canvas');
        gradientCanvas.width = 1024;
        gradientCanvas.height = 256;
        const ctx = gradientCanvas.getContext('2d');
        
        // Vuexy soft gradient: light purple tints transitioning horizontally
        const gradient = ctx.createLinearGradient(0, 0, gradientCanvas.width, 0);
        gradient.addColorStop(0, '#f3f2ff');      // Very light purple
        gradient.addColorStop(0.25, '#ebe9fe');   // Light lavender
        gradient.addColorStop(0.5, '#e5e3fb');    // Vuexy primary lighter
        gradient.addColorStop(0.75, '#ebe9fe');   // Light lavender
        gradient.addColorStop(1, '#f3f2ff');      // Very light purple
        
        ctx.fillStyle = gradient;
        ctx.fillRect(0, 0, gradientCanvas.width, gradientCanvas.height);
        
        // Add subtle vertical gradient overlay for depth
        const vertGradient = ctx.createLinearGradient(0, 0, 0, gradientCanvas.height);
        vertGradient.addColorStop(0, 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4)');
        vertGradient.addColorStop(0.5, 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)');
        vertGradient.addColorStop(1, 'rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.08)');  // Vuexy primary tint at bottom
        
        ctx.fillStyle = vertGradient;
        ctx.fillRect(0, 0, gradientCanvas.width, gradientCanvas.height)
        
        // Create texture from canvas
        const gradientTexture = new THREE.CanvasTexture(gradientCanvas);
        gradientTexture.wrapS = THREE.ClampToEdgeWrapping;
        gradientTexture.wrapT = THREE.ClampToEdgeWrapping;
        
        // Define UV offset for each panel (split horizontally into 4 parts)
        const panelOffsets = {
          'front': 0,      // 0-25% of image
          'back': 0.25,    // 25-50% of image
          'left': 0.5,     // 50-75% of image
          'right': 0.75    // 75-100% of image
        };
        
        positions.forEach(pos => {
          const canvasId = `pos-${pos}-canvas`;
          const canvas = document.getElementById(canvasId);
          if (!canvas) return;

          // Clone texture and set UV offset for this panel
          const panelTexture = gradientTexture.clone();
          panelTexture.needsUpdate = true;
          panelTexture.offset.x = panelOffsets[pos];
          panelTexture.repeat.x = 0.25;  // Show only 1/4 of the image
          
          // Create mini scene with split gradient background
          const miniScene = new THREE.Scene();
          miniScene.background = panelTexture;

          // Create mini camera - positioned further back for smaller t-shirt
          const miniCamera = new THREE.PerspectiveCamera(25, 1, 0.1, 100);
          
          // Position camera based on view - further back for smaller appearance
          const cameraDistance = 2.0;  // Increased for smaller t-shirt (25% smaller)
          
          if (pos === 'front') {
            miniCamera.position.set(0, 0, cameraDistance);
            miniCamera.lookAt(0, 0, 0);
          } else if (pos === 'back') {
            miniCamera.position.set(0, 0, -cameraDistance);
            miniCamera.lookAt(0, 0, 0);
          } else if (pos === 'left') {
            miniCamera.position.set(-cameraDistance, 0.1, 0);
            miniCamera.lookAt(0, 0.1, 0);
          } else if (pos === 'right') {
            miniCamera.position.set(cameraDistance, 0.1, 0);
            miniCamera.lookAt(0, 0.1, 0);
          }

          // Create mini renderer
          const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
          const size = Math.max(rect.width || 80, rect.height || 80);
          const miniRenderer = new THREE.WebGLRenderer({
            canvas: canvas,
            antialias: true,
            alpha: true
          });
          miniRenderer.setSize(size, size);
          miniRenderer.setPixelRatio(Math.min(window.devicePixelRatio, 2));
          miniRenderer.outputEncoding = THREE.sRGBEncoding;

          // Add orbit controls with 15% movement limit
          const miniControl = new THREE.OrbitControls(miniCamera, canvas);
          miniControl.enableDamping = true;
          miniControl.dampingFactor = 0.1;
          miniControl.enableZoom = false;  // Disable zoom
          miniControl.enablePan = false;
          miniControl.rotateSpeed = 0.3;
          
          // 15% movement limit (~27 degrees)
          const range = 0.27;
          if (pos === 'front') {
            miniControl.minAzimuthAngle = -range;
            miniControl.maxAzimuthAngle = range;
          } else if (pos === 'back') {
            miniControl.minAzimuthAngle = Math.PI - range;
            miniControl.maxAzimuthAngle = Math.PI + range;
          } else if (pos === 'left') {
            miniControl.minAzimuthAngle = -Math.PI/2 - range;
            miniControl.maxAzimuthAngle = -Math.PI/2 + range;
          } else if (pos === 'right') {
            miniControl.minAzimuthAngle = Math.PI/2 - range;
            miniControl.maxAzimuthAngle = Math.PI/2 + range;
          }
          miniControl.minPolarAngle = Math.PI/2 - range;
          miniControl.maxPolarAngle = Math.PI/2 + range;

          // Add lighting
          const ambientLight = new THREE.AmbientLight(0xffffff, 0.6);
          miniScene.add(ambientLight);

          const dirLight = new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff, 0.6);
          dirLight.position.set(2, 3, 2);
          miniScene.add(dirLight);

          const dirLight2 = new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff, 0.3);
          dirLight2.position.set(-2, 2, -2);
          miniScene.add(dirLight2);

          // Store references
          miniScenes[pos] = miniScene;
          miniRenderers[pos] = miniRenderer;
          miniCameras[pos] = miniCamera;
          miniControls[pos] = miniControl;
        });
      }

      // Add T-shirt to mini scenes after main model loads - 25% smaller
      function addTshirtToMiniScenes() {
        if (!tshirt) return;

        const positions = ['front', 'back', 'left', 'right'];
        
        positions.forEach(pos => {
          const miniScene = miniScenes[pos];
          if (!miniScene) return;

          // Clone the t-shirt model for mini scene
          const miniTshirt = tshirt.clone();
          
          // Make 25% smaller
          miniTshirt.scale.multiplyScalar(0.75);
          
          // Apply current color
          miniTshirt.traverse((child) => {
            if (child.isMesh && child.material) {
              child.material = child.material.clone();
              child.material.color = new THREE.Color(currentColor);
            }
          });

          // Rotate based on position for correct view
          // Kamera zaten doÄŸru aÃ§Ä±dan bakÄ±yor, t-shirt rotasyonu buna gÃ¶re
          if (pos === 'back') {
            miniTshirt.rotation.y = Math.PI;  // ArkayÄ± gÃ¶ster
          } else if (pos === 'left') {
            // Kamera soldan bakÄ±yor (-X), t-shirt dÃ¶nmeden sol kol gÃ¶rÃ¼nÃ¼r
            miniTshirt.rotation.y = 0;
          } else if (pos === 'right') {
            // Kamera saÄŸdan bakÄ±yor (+X), t-shirt dÃ¶nmeden saÄŸ kol gÃ¶rÃ¼nÃ¼r
            miniTshirt.rotation.y = 0;
          }
          // Front iÃ§in rotation yok (default 0)

          // Store references
          miniScene.userData.tshirt = miniTshirt;
          miniTshirts[pos] = miniTshirt;  // Store in global object for design attachment
          miniScene.add(miniTshirt);
        });

        // Start continuous rendering of mini scenes
        animateMiniScenes();
      }

      // Continuous animation loop for mini scenes
      function animateMiniScenes() {
        requestAnimationFrame(animateMiniScenes);
        
        const positions = ['front', 'back', 'left', 'right'];
        positions.forEach(pos => {
          const scene = miniScenes[pos];
          const renderer = miniRenderers[pos];
          const camera = miniCameras[pos];
          const control = miniControls[pos];
          
          if (scene && renderer && camera) {
            if (control) control.update();
            renderer.render(scene, camera);
          }
        });
      }

      // Render all mini scenes
      function renderMiniScenes() {
        const positions = ['front', 'back', 'left', 'right'];
        
        positions.forEach(pos => {
          const scene = miniScenes[pos];
          const renderer = miniRenderers[pos];
          const camera = miniCameras[pos];
          
          if (scene && renderer && camera) {
            renderer.render(scene, camera);
          }
        });
      }

      // Update mini scenes when color changes
      function updateMiniScenesColor(color) {
        const positions = ['front', 'back', 'left', 'right'];
        
        positions.forEach(pos => {
          const scene = miniScenes[pos];
          if (!scene) return;

          scene.traverse((child) => {
            if (child.isMesh && child.material && !child.userData.isDesign) {
              child.material.color = new THREE.Color(color);
            }
          });
        });
      }

      // ==================== DESIGN UPLOAD SYSTEM ====================
      
      // Load design texture and apply to t-shirt
      function loadDesignTexture(imageData, fileName) {
        const textureLoader = new THREE.TextureLoader();
        
        textureLoader.load(imageData, function(texture) {
          uploadedDesignTexture = texture;
          texture.encoding = THREE.sRGBEncoding;
          
          // Get design size from inputs
          const width = parseFloat(document.getElementById('widthInput').value) || 1;
          const height = parseFloat(document.getElementById('heightInput').value) || 1;
          
          // Apply to main scene
          applyDesignToMainScene(texture, width, height);
          
          // Apply to all mini scenes
          applyDesignToMiniScenes(texture, width, height);
          
          console.log('Design loaded:', fileName);
        });
      }

      // ==================== HIGH-PRECISION DECAL SYSTEM ====================
      // Mesh'in gerÃ§ek boyutlarÄ±na gÃ¶re dinamik DecalGeometry
      
      let targetMeshRef = null;
      let meshBBox = null;
      let meshSize = null;
      let meshCenter = null;
      
      function applyDesignToMainScene(texture, widthInch, heightInch) {
        if (!tshirt || !texture) return;
        
        // NOT: Mevcut tasarÄ±mÄ± sadece yeni decal baÅŸarÄ±lÄ± olursa kaldÄ±rÄ±yoruz
        
        // T-shirt mesh'ini bul ve boyutlarÄ± cache'le
        if (!targetMeshRef) {
          tshirt.traverse((child) => {
            if (child.isMesh && !child.userData.isDesign) {
              targetMeshRef = child;
            }
          });
          
          if (targetMeshRef) {
            meshBBox = new THREE.Box3().setFromObject(targetMeshRef);
            meshSize = meshBBox.getSize(new THREE.Vector3());
            meshCenter = meshBBox.getCenter(new THREE.Vector3());
            console.log('Mesh dimensions:', meshSize, 'Center:', meshCenter);
          }
        }
        
        if (!targetMeshRef) {
          console.error('T-shirt mesh not found');
          return;
        }
        
        // Pozisyona gÃ¶re decal parametreleri hesapla
        const decalParams = calculateDecalParams(selectedPosition, widthInch, heightInch);
        
        try {
          // DecalGeometry dene
          const decalGeometry = new THREE.DecalGeometry(
            targetMeshRef,
            decalParams.position,
            decalParams.orientation,
            decalParams.size
          );
          
          // Decal boÅŸ mu kontrol et (mesh dÄ±ÅŸÄ±na Ã§Ä±kmÄ±ÅŸ olabilir)
          if (decalGeometry.attributes.position.count < 3) {
            console.warn('Decal out of bounds, keeping last position');
            return; // Son baÅŸarÄ±lÄ± pozisyonu koru
          }
          
          // Mevcut tasarÄ±mÄ± kaldÄ±r (sadece baÅŸarÄ±lÄ± olduÄŸunda)
          if (designMeshes['main']) {
            scene.remove(designMeshes['main']);
            if (tshirt) tshirt.remove(designMeshes['main']);
            if (designMeshes['main'].geometry) designMeshes['main'].geometry.dispose();
            if (designMeshes['main'].material) designMeshes['main'].material.dispose();
          }
          
          const decalMaterial = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({
            map: texture,
            transparent: true,
            depthTest: true,
            depthWrite: false,
            polygonOffset: true,
            polygonOffsetFactor: -10,
            polygonOffsetUnits: -10
          });
          
          const decalMesh = new THREE.Mesh(decalGeometry, decalMaterial);
          decalMesh.userData.isDesign = true;
          decalMesh.renderOrder = 100;
          
          scene.add(decalMesh);
          designMeshes['main'] = decalMesh;
          
          // BaÅŸarÄ±lÄ± pozisyonu kaydet
          lastSuccessfulParams = { ...decalParams };
          
          console.log(`Decal applied to ${selectedPosition}`, decalParams);
          
        } catch (error) {
          console.warn('DecalGeometry error, keeping last position:', error.message);
          // Hata olursa son baÅŸarÄ±lÄ± pozisyonu koru - tasarÄ±mÄ± silme
        }
      }
      
      // Mesh boyutlarÄ±na gÃ¶re hassas decal parametreleri
      function calculateDecalParams(position, widthInch, heightInch) {
        // Mesh'in gerÃ§ek boyutlarÄ±nÄ± kullan
        const mW = meshSize.x;  // GeniÅŸlik
        const mH = meshSize.y;  // YÃ¼kseklik
        const mD = meshSize.z;  // Derinlik
        const cX = meshCenter.x;
        const cY = meshCenter.y;
        const cZ = meshCenter.z;
        
        // T-shirt gerÃ§ek boyutu (inch) - tipik bir t-shirt ~20 inch geniÅŸlik
        const TSHIRT_WIDTH_INCH = 20;
        const TSHIRT_HEIGHT_INCH = 28;
        
        // Mesh birimini inch'e Ã§evir
        const meshToInchX = TSHIRT_WIDTH_INCH / mW;
        const meshToInchY = TSHIRT_HEIGHT_INCH / mH;
        
        // KullanÄ±cÄ±nÄ±n girdiÄŸi inch deÄŸerini mesh birimine Ã§evir
        const w = widthInch / meshToInchX;
        const h = heightInch / meshToInchY;
        
        // ULTRA DEEP - mesh derinliÄŸinin %60'Ä± (tam yÃ¼zeye yapÄ±ÅŸma iÃ§in)
        const depth = mD * 0.6;
        
        let pos, rot;
        
        switch (position) {
          case 'front':
            pos = new THREE.Vector3(
              cX,
              cY + mH * 0.05,      // Biraz yukarÄ± (gÃ¶ÄŸÃ¼s merkezi)
              cZ + mD * 0.5        // Mesh'in Ã¶n yÃ¼zeyi
            );
            rot = new THREE.Euler(0, 0, 0);
            break;
            
          case 'back':
            pos = new THREE.Vector3(
              cX,
              cY + mH * 0.05,
              cZ - mD * 0.5        // Mesh'in arka yÃ¼zeyi
            );
            rot = new THREE.Euler(0, Math.PI, 0);
            break;
            
          case 'left-sleeve':
            // Sol kol: KullanÄ±cÄ± koordinatlarÄ± - X:-0.404 Y:0.242 Z:0.028
            pos = new THREE.Vector3(
              cX - mW * 0.505,     // X: -0.404 iÃ§in ayarlandÄ±
              cY + mH * 0.14,      // Y: 0.242 iÃ§in ayarlandÄ±
              cZ + mD * 0.056      // Z: 0.028 iÃ§in ayarlandÄ±
            );
            rot = new THREE.Euler(0, Math.PI * 0.55, 0);
            break;
            
          case 'right-sleeve':
            // SaÄŸ kol: Simetrik koordinatlar
            pos = new THREE.Vector3(
              cX + mW * 0.505,     // X: +0.404 iÃ§in ayarlandÄ±
              cY + mH * 0.14,      // Y: 0.242 iÃ§in ayarlandÄ±
              cZ + mD * 0.056      // Z: 0.028 iÃ§in ayarlandÄ±
            );
            rot = new THREE.Euler(0, -Math.PI * 0.55, 0);
            break;
            
          default:
            pos = new THREE.Vector3(cX, cY, cZ);
            rot = new THREE.Euler(0, 0, 0);
        }
        
        // Slider offset'lerini uygula - ULTRA HASSAS (0.002 Ã§arpanÄ±)
        const offsetScale = mW * 0.002;  // Ultra hassas offset Ã¶lÃ§eÄŸi
        
        // Pozisyona gÃ¶re offset yÃ¶nÃ¼nÃ¼ ayarla - SINIRSIZ HAREKET
        let xMultiplier = 1;
        let yMultiplier = 1;
        
        // Sol kol iÃ§in X offset'i ters yÃ¶nde
        if (position === 'left-sleeve') {
          xMultiplier = -1;
        }
        
        // PlaneGeometry ile sÄ±nÄ±rsÄ±z hareket - kaybolma yok!
        pos.x += positionOffsetX * offsetScale * xMultiplier;
        pos.y += positionOffsetY * offsetScale * yMultiplier;
        
        // Update live coordinate display
        updateCoordinateDisplay();
        
        // Kol iÃ§in daha kÃ¼Ã§Ã¼k boyut
        const sizeMultiplier = (position.includes('sleeve')) ? 0.5 : 1.0;
        
        return {
          position: pos,
          orientation: rot,
          size: new THREE.Vector3(w * sizeMultiplier, h * sizeMultiplier, depth)
        };
      }
      
      // Fallback
      function applyFallbackDesign(texture, params) {
        const geometry = new THREE.PlaneGeometry(params.size.x, params.size.y, 24, 24);
        
        // Curve uygula
        const positions = geometry.attributes.position;
        const curveIntensity = 0.015;
        for (let i = 0; i < positions.count; i++) {
          const x = positions.getX(i);
          const y = positions.getY(i);
          const nx = x / (params.size.x / 2);
          const ny = y / (params.size.y / 2);
          positions.setZ(i, curveIntensity * (1 - nx * nx) + curveIntensity * 0.3 * (1 - ny * ny));
        }
        geometry.computeVertexNormals();
        
        const material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({
          map: texture,
          transparent: true,
          side: THREE.DoubleSide,
          depthWrite: false,
          polygonOffset: true,
          polygonOffsetFactor: -4
        });
        
        const mesh = new THREE.Mesh(geometry, material);
        mesh.position.copy(params.position);
        mesh.rotation.copy(params.orientation);
        mesh.userData.isDesign = true;
        mesh.renderOrder = 100;
        
        scene.add(mesh);
        designMeshes['main'] = mesh;
      }
      
      // Update coordinate display with current decal position
      function updateCoordinateDisplay() {
        if (!meshSize || !meshCenter) return;
        
        const mW = meshSize.x;
        const offsetScale = mW * 0.005;  // Ultra hassas Ã¶lÃ§ek
        
        // Calculate actual position based on selected position and offsets
        let baseX = 0, baseY = 0, baseZ = 0;
        
        switch (selectedPosition) {
          case 'front':
            baseX = meshCenter.x;
            baseY = meshCenter.y + meshSize.y * 0.05;
            baseZ = meshCenter.z + meshSize.z * 0.5;
            break;
          case 'back':
            baseX = meshCenter.x;
            baseY = meshCenter.y + meshSize.y * 0.05;
            baseZ = meshCenter.z - meshSize.z * 0.5;
            break;
          case 'left-sleeve':
            baseX = meshCenter.x - meshSize.x * 0.505;
            baseY = meshCenter.y + meshSize.y * 0.14;
            baseZ = meshCenter.z + meshSize.z * 0.056;
            break;
          case 'right-sleeve':
            baseX = meshCenter.x + meshSize.x * 0.505;
            baseY = meshCenter.y + meshSize.y * 0.14;
            baseZ = meshCenter.z + meshSize.z * 0.056;
            break;
        }
        
        // Apply offsets
        const finalX = baseX + (positionOffsetX * offsetScale);
        const finalY = baseY + (positionOffsetY * offsetScale);
        const finalZ = baseZ;
        
        // Update display
        const liveX = document.getElementById('liveX');
        const liveY = document.getElementById('liveY');
        const liveZ = document.getElementById('liveZ');
        
        if (liveX) liveX.textContent = finalX.toFixed(3);
        if (liveY) liveY.textContent = finalY.toFixed(3);
        if (liveZ) liveZ.textContent = finalZ.toFixed(3);
      }
      
      // TasarÄ±mÄ± kaldÄ±r
      function removeExistingDesign() {
        if (designMeshes['main']) {
          // Scene'den veya tshirt'den kaldÄ±r (kollar iÃ§in tshirt'e ekleniyor)
          scene.remove(designMeshes['main']);
          if (tshirt) tshirt.remove(designMeshes['main']);
          if (designMeshes['main'].geometry) designMeshes['main'].geometry.dispose();
          if (designMeshes['main'].material) designMeshes['main'].material.dispose();
          designMeshes['main'] = null;
        }
      }

      // ==================== MINI SCENE ULTRA-PRECISE DESIGN PLACEMENT ====================
      // Mini sahneler iÃ§in yÃ¼ksek hassasiyetli DecalGeometry
      function applyDesignToMiniScenes(texture, widthInch, heightInch) {
        const MINI_MAP = {
          'front': 'front',
          'back': 'back', 
          'left': 'left-sleeve',
          'right': 'right-sleeve'
        };
        
        const SCALE = 0.75;
        
        Object.entries(MINI_MAP).forEach(([miniKey, posKey]) => {
          const miniScene = miniScenes[miniKey];
          const miniTshirt = miniTshirts[miniKey];
          if (!miniScene || !miniTshirt) return;
          
          // Mevcut tasarÄ±mÄ± kaldÄ±r
          if (designMeshes[miniKey]) {
            miniScene.remove(designMeshes[miniKey]);
            designMeshes[miniKey] = null;
          }
          
          // Mini mesh'i bul
          let miniMesh = null;
          miniTshirt.traverse((child) => {
            if (child.isMesh && !child.userData.isDesign) {
              miniMesh = child;
            }
          });
          if (!miniMesh) return;
          
          // Mini mesh'in boyutlarÄ±nÄ± al
          const miniBBox = new THREE.Box3().setFromObject(miniMesh);
          const miniSize = miniBBox.getSize(new THREE.Vector3());
          const miniCenter = miniBBox.getCenter(new THREE.Vector3());
          
          // T-shirt gerÃ§ek boyutu (inch)
          const TSHIRT_WIDTH_INCH = 20;
          const TSHIRT_HEIGHT_INCH = 28;
          
          // Mesh birimini inch'e Ã§evir
          const meshToInchX = TSHIRT_WIDTH_INCH / miniSize.x;
          const meshToInchY = TSHIRT_HEIGHT_INCH / miniSize.y;
          
          // KullanÄ±cÄ±nÄ±n girdiÄŸi inch deÄŸerini mesh birimine Ã§evir
          const w = widthInch / meshToInchX;
          const h = heightInch / meshToInchY;
          const depth = miniSize.z * 0.3;
          
          let pos, rot;
          const sizeMultiplier = posKey.includes('sleeve') ? 0.5 : 1.0;
          
          switch (posKey) {
            case 'front':
              pos = new THREE.Vector3(miniCenter.x, miniCenter.y + miniSize.y * 0.05, miniCenter.z + miniSize.z * 0.5);
              rot = new THREE.Euler(0, 0, 0);
              break;
            case 'back':
              pos = new THREE.Vector3(miniCenter.x, miniCenter.y + miniSize.y * 0.05, miniCenter.z - miniSize.z * 0.5);
              rot = new THREE.Euler(0, Math.PI, 0);
              break;
            case 'left-sleeve':
              // Mini sahne: T-shirt dÃ¶nmedi, kamera soldan (-X) bakÄ±yor
              // Decal sol kola (X- tarafÄ±na) yerleÅŸmeli
              pos = new THREE.Vector3(miniCenter.x - miniSize.x * 0.48, miniCenter.y + miniSize.y * 0.28, miniCenter.z);
              rot = new THREE.Euler(0, Math.PI / 2, 0);  // Sola dÃ¶nÃ¼k
              break;
            case 'right-sleeve':
              // Mini sahne: T-shirt dÃ¶nmedi, kamera saÄŸdan (+X) bakÄ±yor
              // Decal saÄŸ kola (X+ tarafÄ±na) yerleÅŸmeli
              pos = new THREE.Vector3(miniCenter.x + miniSize.x * 0.48, miniCenter.y + miniSize.y * 0.28, miniCenter.z);
              rot = new THREE.Euler(0, -Math.PI / 2, 0);  // SaÄŸa dÃ¶nÃ¼k
              break;
          }
          
          try {
            const decalGeometry = new THREE.DecalGeometry(
              miniMesh, 
              pos, 
              rot, 
              new THREE.Vector3(w * sizeMultiplier, h * sizeMultiplier, depth)
            );
            
            const material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({
              map: texture,
              transparent: true,
              depthWrite: false,
              polygonOffset: true,
              polygonOffsetFactor: -4
            });
            
            const mesh = new THREE.Mesh(decalGeometry, material);
            mesh.userData.isDesign = true;
            mesh.renderOrder = 100;
            
            miniScene.add(mesh);
            designMeshes[miniKey] = mesh;
          } catch (error) {
            console.error('Mini DecalGeometry error:', error);
          }
        });
      }

      // Remove design from all scenes
      function removeDesign() {
        // Remove from main scene
        if (designMeshes['main']) {
          scene.remove(designMeshes['main']);
          designMeshes['main'] = null;
        }
        
        // Remove from mini scenes
        const positions = ['front', 'back', 'left', 'right'];
        positions.forEach(pos => {
          if (designMeshes[pos] && miniScenes[pos]) {
            miniScenes[pos].remove(designMeshes[pos]);
            designMeshes[pos] = null;
          }
        });
        
        uploadedDesignTexture = null;
        
        // Reset upload area
        const uploadArea = document.getElementById('uploadArea');
        uploadArea.innerHTML = `
          <div class="upload-row" style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 1rem; width: 100%;">
            <div class="upload-icon" style="flex-shrink: 0;">
              <i class="ti ti-cloud-upload"></i>
            </div>
            <div style="flex: 1; text-align: left;">
              <p class="upload-text">Drag your design here</p>
              <p class="upload-subtext">PNG, JPG, SVG up to 50MB</p>
            </div>
            <button class="upload-btn" style="flex-shrink: 0;">
              <i class="ti ti-device-desktop me-1"></i> My Device
            </button>
          </div>
        `;
        
        // Re-attach event listeners
        const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
        fileInput.type = 'file';
        fileInput.accept = 'image/*,.svg,.png,.jpg,.jpeg';
        fileInput.style.display = 'none';
        uploadArea.appendChild(fileInput);
        uploadArea.onclick = () => fileInput.click();
        fileInput.onchange = (e) => {
          if (e.target.files.length > 0) {
            handleFileUpload(e.target.files[0]);
          }
        };
      }

      // Update design size when inputs change
      function updateDesignSize() {
        if (!uploadedDesignTexture) return;
        
        const width = parseFloat(document.getElementById('widthInput').value) || 1;
        const height = parseFloat(document.getElementById('heightInput').value) || 1;
        
        applyDesignToMainScene(uploadedDesignTexture, width, height);
        applyDesignToMiniScenes(uploadedDesignTexture, width, height);
      }

      // Initialize on load
      document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
        initThreeJS();
        
        // Initialize mini previews after a short delay
        setTimeout(() => {
          initPositionPreviews();
        }, 100);
      });

      // ==================== OTHER FUNCTIONS ====================

      // Category Story Selector
      function selectCategory(element, categoryId) {
        // Remove active from all
        document.querySelectorAll('.story-item').forEach(item => item.classList.remove('active'));
        // Add active to clicked
        element.classList.add('active');
        
        // Navigate to category page (placeholder - implement actual navigation)
        console.log('Selected category:', categoryId);
        
        // You can add navigation logic here
        // window.location.href = `/category/${categoryId}`;
      }
      
      // Play Review Story Video
      function playReviewStory(storyId) {
        console.log('Playing review story:', storyId);
        // Here you would open a modal with the video review
        // For now, just show an alert
        alert(`Playing video review #${storyId}\n\nThis would open a fullscreen story viewer like Instagram!`);
      }
      
      // View Campaigns
      function viewCampaigns() {
        alert('ğŸ‰ Current Campaigns:\n\nâ€¢ 25% OFF on all DTF Transfers\nâ€¢ Buy 5 Get 1 FREE\nâ€¢ Free Shipping over $59\nâ€¢ Bulk Discount: 10+ items = Extra 10% OFF');
      }
      
      // Sync quantity between inputs
      function syncQuantity(value) {
        const qty = Math.max(1, Math.min(999, parseInt(value) || 1));
        document.getElementById('quickQuantity').value = qty;
        const mainQty = document.getElementById('quantityInput');
        if (mainQty) mainQty.value = qty;
        calculatePrice();
        updateFloatingPrice();
      }
      
      // Update floating price
      function updateFloatingPrice() {
        const priceEl = document.getElementById('quickPrice');
        const floatingPriceEl = document.getElementById('floatingPrice');
        if (priceEl && floatingPriceEl) {
          floatingPriceEl.textContent = priceEl.textContent;
        }
      }
      
      // Floating cart visibility
      document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        const floatingCart = document.getElementById('floatingCart');
        
        // Always visible - no scroll hiding
        if (floatingCart) {
          floatingCart.classList.remove('hidden');
        }
        
        // Sync quick quantity with main quantity on load
        const mainQty = document.getElementById('quantityInput');
        const quickQty = document.getElementById('quickQuantity');
        if (mainQty && quickQty) {
          mainQty.addEventListener('change', function() {
            quickQty.value = this.value;
            updateFloatingPrice();
          });
        }
      });

      // Change Quantity
      function changeQuantity(delta) {
        const input = document.getElementById('quantityInput');
        let val = parseInt(input.value) + delta;
        if (val < 1) val = 1;
        input.value = val;
        calculatePrice();
      }

      // Calculate Price
      function calculatePrice() {
        const width = parseInt(document.getElementById('widthInput').value) || 1;
        const height = parseInt(document.getElementById('heightInput').value) || 1;
        const quantity = parseInt(document.getElementById('quantityInput').value) || 1;
        const sqIn = width * height;
        let pricePerUnit = 2.85;

        if (sqIn > 100) pricePerUnit = 4.15;
        else if (sqIn > 50) pricePerUnit = 3.50;
        else if (sqIn > 25) pricePerUnit = 3.05;

        // Volume discount
        if (quantity >= 100) pricePerUnit *= 0.70;
        else if (quantity >= 25) pricePerUnit *= 0.80;
        else if (quantity >= 12) pricePerUnit *= 0.85;
        else if (quantity >= 6) pricePerUnit *= 0.90;
        else if (quantity >= 2) pricePerUnit *= 0.95;

        const total = (pricePerUnit * quantity).toFixed(2);
        document.getElementById('priceDisplay').textContent = '$' + total;
      }

      // Global File Upload Handler
      function handleFileUpload(file) {
        console.log('File uploaded:', file.name);
        const uploadArea = document.getElementById('uploadArea');
        
        // Read and process the image
        const reader = new FileReader();
        reader.onload = function(e) {
          const imageData = e.target.result;
          
          // Load texture and apply to t-shirt
          loadDesignTexture(imageData, file.name);
          
          // Show preview in upload area
          uploadArea.innerHTML = `
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 1rem; padding: 0.5rem;">
              <img src="${imageData}" style="max-width: 80px; max-height: 80px; border-radius: 8px; border: 2px solid var(--vuexy-primary);">
              <div style="flex: 1; text-align: left;">
                <p class="upload-text" style="color: var(--vuexy-success); margin-bottom: 0.25rem; font-size: 0.9rem;">
                  <i class="ti ti-circle-check me-1"></i>Design Uploaded!
                </p>
                <p class="upload-subtext" style="margin-bottom: 0.5rem; font-size: 0.75rem;">${file.name}</p>
                <button class="upload-btn" onclick="removeDesign()" style="background: var(--vuexy-danger); padding: 0.4rem 0.8rem; font-size: 0.75rem;">
                  <i class="ti ti-trash me-1"></i> Remove
                </button>
              </div>
            </div>
          `;
        };
        reader.readAsDataURL(file);
      }

      // Upload Area Events
      document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        const uploadArea = document.getElementById('uploadArea');
        const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
        fileInput.type = 'file';
        fileInput.accept = 'image/*,.svg,.png,.jpg,.jpeg';
        fileInput.style.display = 'none';
        uploadArea.appendChild(fileInput);

        uploadArea.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
          if (e.target.tagName !== 'BUTTON') {
            fileInput.click();
          }
        });

        uploadArea.addEventListener('dragover', (e) => {
          e.preventDefault();
          uploadArea.style.borderColor = 'var(--vuexy-primary)';
          uploadArea.style.background = 'var(--vuexy-primary-light)';
        });

        uploadArea.addEventListener('dragleave', () => {
          uploadArea.style.borderColor = '';
          uploadArea.style.background = '';
        });

        uploadArea.addEventListener('drop', (e) => {
          e.preventDefault();
          uploadArea.style.borderColor = '';
          uploadArea.style.background = '';
          const files = e.dataTransfer.files;
          if (files.length > 0) {
            handleFileUpload(files[0]);
          }
        });

        fileInput.addEventListener('change', (e) => {
          if (e.target.files.length > 0) {
            handleFileUpload(e.target.files[0]);
          }
        });

        // Add event listeners for price calculation and design size update
        document.getElementById('widthInput').addEventListener('input', () => {
          calculatePrice();
          updateDesignSize();
        });
        document.getElementById('heightInput').addEventListener('input', () => {
          calculatePrice();
          updateDesignSize();
        });
        document.getElementById('quantityInput').addEventListener('input', calculatePrice);
        
        // Position Offset Slider Event Listeners - ULTRA PRECISE
        const xSlider = document.getElementById('positionXSlider');
        const ySlider = document.getElementById('positionYSlider');
        const xValue = document.getElementById('positionXValue');
        const yValue = document.getElementById('positionYValue');
        
        if (xSlider && ySlider) {
          xSlider.addEventListener('input', (e) => {
            positionOffsetX = parseInt(e.target.value);
            xValue.textContent = positionOffsetX;
            updateCoordinateDisplay();
            // TasarÄ±mÄ± yeniden uygula
            if (uploadedDesignTexture) {
              const w = parseInt(document.getElementById('widthInput').value) || 9;
              const h = parseInt(document.getElementById('heightInput').value) || 9;
              applyDesignToMainScene(uploadedDesignTexture, w, h);
            }
          });
          
          ySlider.addEventListener('input', (e) => {
            positionOffsetY = parseInt(e.target.value);
            yValue.textContent = positionOffsetY;
            updateCoordinateDisplay();
            // TasarÄ±mÄ± yeniden uygula
            if (uploadedDesignTexture) {
              const w = parseInt(document.getElementById('widthInput').value) || 9;
              const h = parseInt(document.getElementById('heightInput').value) || 9;
              applyDesignToMainScene(uploadedDesignTexture, w, h);
            }
          });
        }
      });
    </script>

        --vuexy-card-spacer-x: 1.25rem;
        
        /* â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ TYPOGRAPHY â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ */
        --vuexy-font-family: 'Montserrat', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif;
        --vuexy-font-size-base: 1rem;
        --vuexy-font-size-sm: 0.857rem;
        --vuexy-font-size-lg: 1.143rem;
        --vuexy-font-weight-normal: 400;
        --vuexy-font-weight-medium: 500;
        --vuexy-font-weight-semibold: 600;
        --vuexy-font-weight-bold: 700;
        --vuexy-line-height-base: 1.45;
        
        /* â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ TRANSITIONS â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ */
        --vuexy-transition-base: all 0.25s ease;
        --vuexy-transition-fast: all 0.15s ease;
        --vuexy-transition-slow: all 0.35s ease;
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY GLOBAL STYLES
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      *, *::before, *::after {
        box-sizing: border-box;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }

      body {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-base);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-normal);
        line-height: var(--vuexy-line-height-base);
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        background-color: var(--vuexy-body-bg);
        min-height: 100vh;
        -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
        -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
        text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;
      }

      /* Vuexy Typography */
      h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .heading {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        line-height: 1.2;
        margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
      }

      h1 { font-size: 2rem; }
      h2 { font-size: 1.714rem; }
      h3 { font-size: 1.5rem; }
      h4 { font-size: 1.286rem; }
      h5 { font-size: 1.07rem; }
      h6 { font-size: 1rem; }

      p {
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
      }

      a {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        text-decoration: none;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-fast);
      }

      a:hover {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary-dark);
      }

      .mono {
        font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', 'SFMono-Regular', Consolas, monospace;
      }

      /* Vuexy Selection */
      ::selection {
        background-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        color: #fff;
      }

      /* Vuexy Scrollbar */
      ::-webkit-scrollbar {
        width: 8px;
        height: 8px;
      }
      ::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
        background: var(--vuexy-body-bg);
      }
      ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
        background: var(--vuexy-border-color);
        border-radius: 4px;
      }
      ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
        background: var(--vuexy-border-dark);
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY TOP BANNER
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .promo-banner {
        background: var(--vuexy-dark-bg);
        padding: 10px 0;
        color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-sm);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
      }

      .promo-banner .container {
        display: flex !important;
      }

      .promo-banner .promo-item {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 8px;
        padding: 0 1rem;
        border-right: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.15);
      }

      .promo-banner .promo-item:last-child {
        border-right: none;
      }

      .promo-banner .promo-item i {
        font-size: 1.125rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary-light);
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY NAVBAR
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .main-navbar {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-sm);
        position: sticky;
        top: 0;
        z-index: 1000;
        border-bottom: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .navbar-brand-logo {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-bold);
        font-size: 1.5rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        text-decoration: none;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
      }

      .navbar-brand-logo .logo-icon {
        width: 32px;
        height: 22px;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
      }

      .navbar-brand-logo span {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
      }

      .nav-category {
        display: flex;
        gap: 0.25rem;
        list-style: none;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }

      .nav-category a {
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        text-decoration: none;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-fast);
        padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out;
        font-size: 0.9375rem;
      }

      .nav-category a:hover {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary-dark);
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-light);
      }

      .nav-search {
        position: relative;
      }

      .nav-search input {
        padding: 0.5rem 1rem 0.5rem 2.5rem;
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        font-size: 0.9375rem;
        min-width: 220px;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        transition: all 0.2s;
      }

      .nav-search input:focus {
        outline: none;
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(122, 143, 166, 0.15);
        background: white;
      }

      .nav-search i {
        position: absolute;
        left: 0.875rem;
        top: 50%;
        transform: translateY(-50%);
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      /* ========== BREADCRUMB ========== */
      .breadcrumb-section {
        padding: 1rem 0;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        border-bottom: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .breadcrumb-custom {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        font-size: 0.875rem;
      }

      .breadcrumb-custom a {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        text-decoration: none;
        transition: color 0.2s;
      }

      .breadcrumb-custom a:hover {
        text-decoration: underline;
      }

      .breadcrumb-custom span {
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      /* ========== INSTAGRAM STORY STYLE CATEGORIES ========== */
      .category-story-section {
        padding: 1rem 0;
        background: var(--vuexy-body-bg);
        overflow: hidden;
      }
      
      .story-scroll-container {
        display: flex;
        gap: 1.25rem;
        overflow-x: auto;
        padding: 0.6rem 1rem;
        scrollbar-width: none;
        -ms-overflow-style: none;
        justify-content: center;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        margin: 0 1rem;
        position: relative;
        border: 1px solid transparent;
        background-clip: padding-box;
      }
      
      .story-scroll-container::before {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        inset: 0;
        border-radius: inherit;
        padding: 1px;
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.4), rgba(0, 207, 232, 0.3), rgba(40, 199, 111, 0.4), rgba(255, 159, 67, 0.3), rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.4));
        -webkit-mask: linear-gradient(#fff 0 0) content-box, linear-gradient(#fff 0 0);
        -webkit-mask-composite: xor;
        mask-composite: exclude;
        pointer-events: none;
      }
      
      .story-scroll-container::-webkit-scrollbar {
        display: none;
      }
      
      .story-item {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        cursor: pointer;
        min-width: 72px;
        transition: transform 0.2s ease;
      }
      
      .story-item:hover {
        transform: scale(1.05);
      }
      
      .story-ring {
        width: 64px;
        height: 64px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        padding: 3px;
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #d8d8d8, #a0a0a0);
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
      }
      
      .story-item.active .story-ring {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
        box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.4);
      }
      
      .story-item:not(.active):hover .story-ring {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--vuexy-primary-light), var(--vuexy-primary));
      }
      
      .story-avatar {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        border-radius: 50%;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        font-size: 1.5rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
      }
      
      .story-item.active .story-avatar {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter);
      }
      
      .story-item:not(.active):hover .story-avatar {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
      }
      
      .story-label {
        font-size: 0.7rem;
        font-weight: 500;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        text-align: center;
        white-space: nowrap;
        max-width: 72px;
        overflow: hidden;
        text-overflow: ellipsis;
        transition: color 0.2s;
      }
      
      .story-item.active .story-label {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        font-weight: 600;
      }
      
      .story-item:not(.active):hover .story-label {
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
      }
      
      /* Active story expanding effect */
      .story-item.active::after {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        bottom: -8px;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
        width: 6px;
        height: 6px;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary);
        border-radius: 50%;
      }
      
      .story-item {
        position: relative;
      }

      /* ========== REVIEW VIDEO STORIES ========== */
      .review-stories-section {
        margin-top: 1rem;
        padding: 1rem;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border-radius: 12px;
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }
      
      .review-stories-header {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
      }
      
      .review-stories-header i {
        color: #ea5455;
        font-size: 1.1rem;
      }
      
      .review-stories-header span {
        font-size: 0.85rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
      }
      
      .review-stories-header .count {
        color: #ea5455;
        font-weight: 700;
      }
      
      .review-stories-scroll {
        display: flex;
        gap: 0.75rem;
        overflow-x: auto;
        padding: 0.25rem 0;
        scrollbar-width: none;
        -ms-overflow-style: none;
      }
      
      .review-stories-scroll::-webkit-scrollbar {
        display: none;
      }
      
      .review-story-item {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.35rem;
        cursor: pointer;
        min-width: 56px;
        transition: transform 0.2s ease;
      }
      
      .review-story-item:hover {
        transform: scale(1.05);
      }
      
      .review-story-ring {
        transition: transform 0.2s ease, box-shadow 0.2s ease;
      }
      
      .review-story-ring {
        width: 52px;
        height: 52px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        padding: 3px;
        background: linear-gradient(45deg, #feda75, #fa7e1e, #d62976, #962fbf, #4f5bd5);
        position: relative;
      }
      
      .review-story-item:hover .review-story-ring {
        transform: scale(1.05);
        box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(214, 41, 118, 0.5);
      }
      
      .review-story-avatar {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        border-radius: 50%;
        background: var(--vuexy-body-bg);
        padding: 2px;
        overflow: hidden;
      }
      
      .review-story-avatar img {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        border-radius: 50%;
        object-fit: cover;
      }
      
      .review-story-name {
        font-size: 0.65rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        text-align: center;
        white-space: nowrap;
        max-width: 56px;
        overflow: hidden;
        text-overflow: ellipsis;
      }
      
      /* ========== MINI VIDEO REVIEWS BAR ========== */
      .mini-video-reviews {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.75rem;
        margin-top: 0.25rem;
        margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        padding: 0.25rem 0;
      }
      
      .mini-video-reviews-inline {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.2rem;
        margin-left: 0.5rem;
        padding-left: 0.5rem;
        border-left: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }
      
      .mini-video-reviews-inline .mini-story {
        width: 26px;
        height: 26px;
      }
      
      .mini-video-reviews-inline .mini-video-label {
        font-size: 0.65rem;
        margin-left: 0.25rem;
      }

      /* ========== PRICE ALERT BOX ========== */
      .price-alert-box {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border: 1px solid rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.2);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
        overflow: hidden;
        position: relative;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.08);
      }
      
      .price-alert-header {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.1), rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.05));
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        padding: 0.4rem 0.75rem;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.4rem;
        font-size: 0.7rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: 0.5px;
        border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.1);
      }
      
      .price-alert-header i {
        font-size: 0.85rem;
        color: #ff9f43;
      }
      
      .price-alert-content {
        padding: 0.75rem;
      }
      
      .quick-qty-label {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.3rem;
        font-weight: 500;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        font-size: 0.65rem;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: 0.3px;
        opacity: 0.7;
        margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
      }
      
      .quick-qty-label i {
        font-size: 0.75rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        opacity: 0.6;
      }
      
      .quick-qty-controls {
        display: inline-flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0;
        background: rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.04);
        border-radius: 50px;
        padding: 0.15rem;
        border: 1px solid rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.1);
      }
      
      .quick-qty-btn {
        width: 26px;
        height: 26px;
        border: none;
        background: transparent;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        border-radius: 50%;
        font-size: 0.9rem;
        font-weight: 400;
        cursor: pointer;
        transition: all 0.2s;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        opacity: 0.6;
      }
      
      .quick-qty-btn:hover {
        background: rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.15);
        opacity: 1;
      }
      
      .quick-qty-input {
        width: 40px;
        text-align: center;
        border: none;
        background: transparent;
        font-size: 0.9rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        padding: 0.15rem;
      }
      
      .quick-qty-input:focus {
        outline: none;
      }
      
      .quick-price-wrapper {
        display: flex;
        align-items: baseline;
        gap: 0.4rem;
        margin-top: 0.35rem;
        position: relative;
      }
      
      .quick-price {
        font-size: 1.75rem;
        font-weight: 700;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        line-height: 1;
      }
      
      .old-price {
        font-size: 0.9rem;
        color: #ff9f43;
        text-decoration: line-through;
        font-weight: 600;
        position: relative;
        top: 0;
      }
      
      .discount-badge {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff9f43, #ff6b35);
        color: white;
        font-size: 0.6rem;
        font-weight: 700;
        padding: 0.15rem 0.35rem;
        border-radius: 20px;
        position: relative;
        top: 0;
      }
      
      .view-campaigns-btn {
        display: inline-flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        gap: 0.35rem;
        margin-top: 0.5rem;
        padding: 0.35rem 0.75rem;
        background: transparent;
        border: none;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        font-size: 0.7rem;
        font-weight: 500;
        cursor: pointer;
        transition: all 0.2s ease;
        opacity: 0.7;
      }
      
      .view-campaigns-btn:hover {
        opacity: 1;
        text-decoration: underline;
      }
      
      .view-campaigns-btn i {
        font-size: 0.85rem;
      }

      /* ========== FLOATING CART BUTTON ========== */
      .floating-cart-container {
        position: fixed;
        top: 200px;
        right: 30px;
        z-index: 9999;
        opacity: 1;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
      }
      
      .floating-cart-container.hidden {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateX(100px);
        pointer-events: none;
      }
      
      .floating-cart-btn {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.6rem;
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--vuexy-primary), var(--vuexy-primary-dark));
        color: white;
        border: none;
        border-radius: 50px;
        padding: 0.75rem 1.25rem;
        font-size: 0.85rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        cursor: pointer;
        box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.4);
        transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
      }
      
      .floating-cart-btn:hover {
        transform: scale(1.05);
        box-shadow: 0 12px 35px rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.5);
      }
      
      .floating-cart-icon {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        width: 26px;
        height: 26px;
        background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
        border-radius: 50%;
        position: relative;
        overflow: hidden;
      }
      
      .floating-cart-icon i {
        font-size: 0.95rem;
        animation: truckDrive 3s ease-in-out infinite;
      }
      
      @keyframes truckDrive {
        0%, 70%, 100% { transform: translateX(0); }
        75% { transform: translateX(4px); }
        80% { transform: translateX(-2px); }
        85% { transform: translateX(3px); }
        90% { transform: translateX(-1px); }
        95% { transform: translateX(2px); }
      }
      
      .floating-cart-text {
        white-space: nowrap;
      }
      
      .floating-cart-price {
        background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
        padding: 0.2rem 0.6rem;
        border-radius: 20px;
        font-weight: 700;
        font-size: 0.8rem;
      }
      
      .mini-stories-container {
        display: flex;
        gap: 0.35rem;
      }
      
      .mini-story {
        width: 32px;
        height: 32px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        padding: 2px;
        background: linear-gradient(45deg, #feda75, #fa7e1e, #d62976, #962fbf, #4f5bd5);
        cursor: pointer;
        transition: transform 0.2s ease, box-shadow 0.2s ease;
      }
      
      .mini-story:hover {
        transform: scale(1.15);
        box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(214, 41, 118, 0.4);
      }
      
      .mini-story img {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        border-radius: 50%;
        object-fit: cover;
        border: 2px solid var(--vuexy-card-bg);

         VUEXY CARD STYLES

      }

      .upload-text {
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-semibold);
        margin-bottom: 0.125rem;
        font-size: 0.875rem;
      }

      .upload-subtext {
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: 0.7rem;
        margin-bottom: 0;
      }

      .upload-btn {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
        color: white;
        border: none;
        padding: 0.5rem 1.25rem;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        font-size: 0.8rem;
        margin-top: 0;
        cursor: pointer;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-primary-lg);
      }

      .upload-btn:hover {
        box-shadow: 0 0 12px 0 rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.5);
        transform: translateY(-1px);
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY SIZE INPUTS
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .size-inputs {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: 1fr auto 1fr 1fr;
        gap: 1rem;
        align-items: end;
      }

      .size-input-group label {
        display: block;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: 0.75rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        letter-spacing: 0.6px;
      }

      .size-input-group input {
        width: 100%;
        padding: 0.625rem 0.875rem;
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-input-border);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-base);
        text-align: center;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-fast);
        background: var(--vuexy-input-bg);
      }

      .size-input-group input:focus {
        outline: none;
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        box-shadow: 0 3px 10px 0 rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.1);
      }

      .size-multiply {
        font-size: 1.25rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        padding-bottom: 0.625rem;
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY QUANTITY CONTROL
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .quantity-control {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-input-border);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        overflow: hidden;
        background: var(--vuexy-input-bg);
      }

      .quantity-control button {
        width: 40px;
        height: 40px;
        border: none;
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.08);
        cursor: pointer;
        font-size: 1.125rem;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-fast);
      }

      .quantity-control button:hover {
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.15);
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
      }

      .quantity-control input {
        width: 55px;
        text-align: center;
        border: none;
        border-left: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        border-right: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-base);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        background: var(--vuexy-input-bg);
      }

      .price-display {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: 1.75rem;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-bold);
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        text-align: right;
        padding-bottom: 0.25rem;
      }

      /* ========== PRICING TABLE ========== */
      .pricing-section {
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
      }

      .pricing-header {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: space-between;
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
      }

      .pricing-title {
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-success);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        font-size: 1rem;
      }

      .pricing-title i {
        font-size: 1.25rem;
      }

      .pricing-table {
        width: 100%;
        border-collapse: separate;
        border-spacing: 0;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        overflow: hidden;
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .pricing-table th {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--vuexy-primary), var(--vuexy-primary-dark));
        color: white;
        padding: 0.875rem 1rem;
        font-weight: 500;
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
        text-align: center;
      }

      .pricing-table td {
        padding: 0.875rem 1rem;
        text-align: center;
        border-bottom: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        font-size: 0.875rem;
      }

      .pricing-table tr:last-child td {
        border-bottom: none;
      }

      .pricing-table tbody tr {
        transition: background 0.15s;
      }

      .pricing-table tbody tr:hover {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter);
      }

      .price-original {
        text-decoration: line-through;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
        margin-right: 0.25rem;
      }

      .price-sale {
        color: var(--vuexy-success);
        font-weight: 600;
      }

      .discount-badge {
        background: var(--vuexy-warning-light);
        color: #c9a227;
        font-size: 0.6875rem;
        padding: 0.2em 0.5em;
        border-radius: 4px;
        font-weight: 600;
        margin-left: 0.25rem;
      }

      /* ========== BULK DISCOUNT ========== */
      .bulk-section {
        background: var(--vuexy-info-light);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        padding: 1.25rem;
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
        border: 1px solid rgba(93, 173, 226, 0.2);
      }

      .bulk-title {
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-info);
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        font-size: 1rem;
      }

      .bulk-title i {
        font-size: 1.25rem;
      }

      .bulk-table {
        width: 100%;
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
      }

      .bulk-table th {
        text-align: left;
        padding: 0.625rem 0.5rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        font-weight: 500;
        border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(93, 173, 226, 0.2);
      }

      .bulk-table td {
        padding: 0.625rem 0.5rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
      }

      /* ========== INSTRUCTIONS ========== */
      .instructions-section {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        padding: 1.5rem;
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-md);
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .instructions-title {
        font-size: 1.25rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
      }

      .instructions-title i {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
      }

      .instruction-steps {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
        gap: 1rem;
      }

      .instruction-step {
        text-align: center;
        padding: 1.5rem 1rem;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        transition: all 0.2s;
      }

      .instruction-step:hover {
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(122, 143, 166, 0.15);
        transform: translateY(-2px);
      }

      .instruction-number {
        width: 50px;
        height: 50px;
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--vuexy-primary), var(--vuexy-primary-dark));
        color: white;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        font-size: 1.25rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        margin: 0 auto 1rem;
        box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(122, 143, 166, 0.3);
      }

      .instruction-title {
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        margin-bottom: 0.375rem;
        font-size: 0.9375rem;
      }

      .instruction-desc {
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      .instruction-time {
        font-size: 0.75rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-warning);
        font-weight: 600;
        margin-top: 0.5rem;
        display: inline-block;
        padding: 0.25em 0.5em;
        background: var(--vuexy-warning-light);
        border-radius: 4px;
      }

      /* ========== SETTINGS GRID ========== */
      .settings-grid {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(150px, 1fr));
        gap: 1rem;
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
        padding-top: 1.5rem;
        border-top: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .setting-item {
        text-align: center;
        padding: 1rem;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
      }

      .setting-label {
        font-size: 0.6875rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        text-transform: uppercase;
        margin-bottom: 0.375rem;
        letter-spacing: 0.5px;
      }

      .setting-value {
        font-weight: 700;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary-dark);
        font-size: 1.125rem;
      }

      .setting-note {
        font-size: 0.6875rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        margin-top: 0.25rem;
      }

      /* ========== REVIEWS ========== */
      .reviews-section {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        padding: 1.5rem;
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-md);
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .reviews-header {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: space-between;
        margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        gap: 1rem;
        padding-bottom: 1rem;
        border-bottom: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .reviews-title {
        font-size: 1.25rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
      }

      .reviews-title i {
        color: var(--vuexy-warning);
      }

      .reviews-summary {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 1rem;
      }

      .reviews-score {
        font-size: 2.5rem;
        font-weight: 700;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        line-height: 1;
      }

      .reviews-details {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
      }

      .reviews-stars {
        color: var(--vuexy-warning);
        display: flex;
        gap: 2px;
      }

      .reviews-count {
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      .review-bars {
        flex: 1;
        max-width: 280px;
      }

      .review-bar-item {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        margin-bottom: 0.375rem;
        font-size: 0.75rem;
      }

      .review-bar-label {
        width: 48px;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      .review-bar-track {
        flex: 1;
        height: 6px;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter);
        border-radius: 3px;
        overflow: hidden;
      }

      .review-bar-fill {
        height: 100%;
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--vuexy-warning), #f8c957);
        border-radius: 3px;
      }

      .review-bar-percent {
        width: 32px;
        text-align: right;
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        font-weight: 500;
      }

      /* ========== REVIEW CARDS ========== */
      .review-cards {
        display: grid;
        gap: 1rem;
      }

      .review-card {
        padding: 1.25rem;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        transition: all 0.2s;
      }

      .review-card:hover {
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
      }

      .review-card-header {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.75rem;
        margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
      }

      .review-avatar {
        width: 42px;
        height: 42px;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--vuexy-primary), var(--vuexy-primary-dark));
        color: white;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 0.875rem;
      }

      .review-author {
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        font-size: 0.9375rem;
      }

      .review-date {
        font-size: 0.75rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      .review-text {
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        font-size: 0.875rem;
        line-height: 1.6;
      }

      /* ========== RELATED PRODUCTS ========== */
      .related-section {
        margin-top: 2rem;
        padding-bottom: 2rem;
      }

      .section-title {
        font-size: 1.375rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        margin-bottom: 1.25rem;
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY PRODUCT CARDS
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .product-cards {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(180px, 1fr));
        gap: 1.25rem;
      }

      .product-card {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        overflow: hidden;
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-sm);
        border: none;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
        text-decoration: none;
      }

      .product-card:hover {
        transform: translateY(-5px);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-lg);
      }

      .product-card-image {
        aspect-ratio: 1;
        background: var(--vuexy-body-bg);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        padding: 1rem;
      }

      .product-card-image img {
        max-width: 100%;
        max-height: 100%;
        object-fit: contain;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-slow);
      }

      .product-card:hover .product-card-image img {
        transform: scale(1.08);
      }

      .product-card-body {
        padding: 1rem;
        border-top: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .product-card-title {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-semibold);
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-base);
        margin-bottom: 0.375rem;
      }

      .product-card-rating {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.375rem;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-sm);
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      .product-card-rating i {
        color: var(--vuexy-warning);
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY BUTTON STYLES
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      /* Base Button */
      .btn {
        display: inline-flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        padding: 0.786rem 1.5rem;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-base);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        line-height: 1;
        text-align: center;
        white-space: nowrap;
        vertical-align: middle;
        cursor: pointer;
        user-select: none;
        border: 1px solid transparent;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
      }

      /* Primary Button - Add to Cart */
      .add-cart-btn, .btn-primary {
        width: 100%;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
        color: #fff;
        border: none;
        padding: 0.9rem 1.75rem;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        font-size: 1rem;
        letter-spacing: 0.3px;
        cursor: pointer;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        gap: 0.625rem;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-primary-lg);
        position: relative;
        overflow: hidden;
      }

      .add-cart-btn::before {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: -100%;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.25), transparent);
        transition: left 0.5s ease;
      }

      .add-cart-btn:hover {
        box-shadow: 0 0 20px 0 rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.5);
        transform: translateY(-3px);
      }

      .add-cart-btn:hover::before {
        left: 100%;
      }

      .add-cart-btn:active {
        transform: translateY(-1px);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-primary);
      }

      /* Outline Button */
      .btn-outline-primary {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        background: transparent;
      }

      .btn-outline-primary:hover {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary);
        color: #fff;
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-primary);
      }

      /* Flat Button */
      .btn-flat-primary {
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.12);
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        border: none;
      }

      .btn-flat-primary:hover {
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.2);
      }

      /* Relief Button */
      .btn-relief-primary {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary);
        color: #fff;
        box-shadow: inset 0 -3px 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
      }

      .btn-relief-primary:active {
        box-shadow: none;
        transform: translateY(3px);
      }

      .desktop-cart-btn {
        display: block;
        width: 100%;
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY STICKY ADD TO CART
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .add-to-cart-section {
        position: sticky;
        bottom: 0;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        padding: 1rem;
        border-top: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-lg);
        z-index: 100;
        display: none;
      }

      @media (max-width: 991px) {
        .add-to-cart-section {
          display: block;

      /* ========== T-SHIRT MOCKUP ========== */
      .tshirt-mockup {
