        `;
        
        // Re-attach event listeners
        const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
        fileInput.type = 'file';
        fileInput.accept = 'image/*,.svg,.png,.jpg,.jpeg';
        fileInput.style.display = 'none';
        uploadArea.appendChild(fileInput);
        uploadArea.onclick = () => fileInput.click();
        fileInput.onchange = (e) => {
          if (e.target.files.length > 0) {
            handleFileUpload(e.target.files[0]);
          }
        };
      }

      // Update design size when inputs change
      function updateDesignSize() {
        if (!uploadedDesignTexture) return;
        
        const width = parseFloat(document.getElementById('widthInput').value) || 1;
        const height = parseFloat(document.getElementById('heightInput').value) || 1;
        
        applyDesignToMainScene(uploadedDesignTexture, width, height);
        applyDesignToMiniScenes(uploadedDesignTexture, width, height);
      }

      // Initialize on load
      document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
        initThreeJS();
        
        // Initialize mini previews after a short delay
        setTimeout(() => {
          initPositionPreviews();
        }, 100);
      });

      // ==================== OTHER FUNCTIONS ====================

      // Category Story Selector
      function selectCategory(element, categoryId) {
        // Remove active from all
        document.querySelectorAll('.story-item').forEach(item => item.classList.remove('active'));
        // Add active to clicked
        element.classList.add('active');
        
        // Navigate to category page (placeholder - implement actual navigation)
        console.log('Selected category:', categoryId);
        
        // You can add navigation logic here
        // window.location.href = `/category/${categoryId}`;
      }
      
      // Play Review Story Video
      function playReviewStory(storyId) {
        console.log('Playing review story:', storyId);
        // Here you would open a modal with the video review
        // For now, just show an alert
        alert(`Playing video review #${storyId}\n\nThis would open a fullscreen story viewer like Instagram!`);
      }
      
      // View Campaigns
      function viewCampaigns() {
        alert('ğŸ‰ Current Campaigns:\n\nâ€¢ 25% OFF on all DTF Transfers\nâ€¢ Buy 5 Get 1 FREE\nâ€¢ Free Shipping over $59\nâ€¢ Bulk Discount: 10+ items = Extra 10% OFF');
      }
      
      // Sync quantity between inputs
      function syncQuantity(value) {
        const qty = Math.max(1, Math.min(999, parseInt(value) || 1));
        document.getElementById('quickQuantity').value = qty;
        const mainQty = document.getElementById('quantityInput');
        if (mainQty) mainQty.value = qty;
        calculatePrice();
        updateFloatingPrice();
      }
      
      // Update floating price
      function updateFloatingPrice() {
        const priceEl = document.getElementById('quickPrice');
        const floatingPriceEl = document.getElementById('floatingPrice');
        if (priceEl && floatingPriceEl) {
          floatingPriceEl.textContent = priceEl.textContent;
        }
      }
      
      // Floating cart visibility
      document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        const floatingCart = document.getElementById('floatingCart');
        
        // Always visible - no scroll hiding
        if (floatingCart) {
          floatingCart.classList.remove('hidden');
        }
        
        // Sync quick quantity with main quantity on load
        const mainQty = document.getElementById('quantityInput');
        const quickQty = document.getElementById('quickQuantity');
        if (mainQty && quickQty) {
          mainQty.addEventListener('change', function() {
            quickQty.value = this.value;
            updateFloatingPrice();
          });
        }
      });

      // Change Quantity
      function changeQuantity(delta) {
        const input = document.getElementById('quantityInput');
        let val = parseInt(input.value) + delta;
        if (val < 1) val = 1;
        input.value = val;
        calculatePrice();
      }

      // Calculate Price
      function calculatePrice() {
        const width = parseInt(document.getElementById('widthInput').value) || 1;
        const height = parseInt(document.getElementById('heightInput').value) || 1;
        const quantity = parseInt(document.getElementById('quantityInput').value) || 1;
        const sqIn = width * height;
        let pricePerUnit = 2.85;

        if (sqIn > 100) pricePerUnit = 4.15;
        else if (sqIn > 50) pricePerUnit = 3.50;
        else if (sqIn > 25) pricePerUnit = 3.05;

        // Volume discount
        if (quantity >= 100) pricePerUnit *= 0.70;
        else if (quantity >= 25) pricePerUnit *= 0.80;
        else if (quantity >= 12) pricePerUnit *= 0.85;
        else if (quantity >= 6) pricePerUnit *= 0.90;
        else if (quantity >= 2) pricePerUnit *= 0.95;

        const total = (pricePerUnit * quantity).toFixed(2);
        document.getElementById('priceDisplay').textContent = '$' + total;
      }

      // Global File Upload Handler
      function handleFileUpload(file) {
        console.log('File uploaded:', file.name);

        const reader = new FileReader();
        reader.onload = function(e) {

          // Load texture and apply to t-shirt

          uploadArea.innerHTML = `

                </p>
                <p class="upload-subtext" style="margin-bottom: 0.5rem; font-size: 0.75rem;">${file.name}</p>
                <button class="upload-btn" onclick="removeDesign()" style="background: var(--vuexy-danger); padding: 0.4rem 0.8rem; font-size: 0.75rem;">
                  <i class="ti ti-trash me-1"></i> Remove
                </button>
              </div>
            </div>
          `;
        };
        reader.readAsDataURL(file);
      }

      // Upload Area Events
      document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        const uploadArea = document.getElementById('uploadArea');
        const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
        fileInput.type = 'file';
        fileInput.accept = 'image/*,.svg,.png,.jpg,.jpeg';
        fileInput.style.display = 'none';
        uploadArea.appendChild(fileInput);

        uploadArea.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
          if (e.target.tagName !== 'BUTTON') {
            fileInput.click();
          }
        });

        uploadArea.addEventListener('dragover', (e) => {
          e.preventDefault();
          uploadArea.style.borderColor = 'var(--vuexy-primary)';
          uploadArea.style.background = 'var(--vuexy-primary-light)';
        });

        uploadArea.addEventListener('dragleave', () => {
          uploadArea.style.borderColor = '';
          uploadArea.style.background = '';
        });

        uploadArea.addEventListener('drop', (e) => {
          e.preventDefault();
          uploadArea.style.borderColor = '';
          uploadArea.style.background = '';
          const files = e.dataTransfer.files;
          if (files.length > 0) {
            handleFileUpload(files[0]);
          }
        });

        fileInput.addEventListener('change', (e) => {
          if (e.target.files.length > 0) {
            handleFileUpload(e.target.files[0]);
          }
        });

        // Add event listeners for price calculation and design size update
        document.getElementById('widthInput').addEventListener('input', () => {
          calculatePrice();
          updateDesignSize();
        });
        document.getElementById('heightInput').addEventListener('input', () => {
          calculatePrice();
          updateDesignSize();
        });
        document.getElementById('quantityInput').addEventListener('input', calculatePrice);
        
        // Position Offset Slider Event Listeners - ULTRA PRECISE
        const xSlider = document.getElementById('positionXSlider');
        const ySlider = document.getElementById('positionYSlider');
        const xValue = document.getElementById('positionXValue');
        const yValue = document.getElementById('positionYValue');
        
        if (xSlider && ySlider) {
          xSlider.addEventListener('input', (e) => {
            positionOffsetX = parseInt(e.target.value);
            xValue.textContent = positionOffsetX;
            updateCoordinateDisplay();
            // TasarÄ±mÄ± yeniden uygula
            if (uploadedDesignTexture) {
              const w = parseInt(document.getElementById('widthInput').value) || 9;
              const h = parseInt(document.getElementById('heightInput').value) || 9;
              applyDesignToMainScene(uploadedDesignTexture, w, h);
            }
          });
          
          ySlider.addEventListener('input', (e) => {
            positionOffsetY = parseInt(e.target.value);
            yValue.textContent = positionOffsetY;
            updateCoordinateDisplay();
            // TasarÄ±mÄ± yeniden uygula
            if (uploadedDesignTexture) {
              const w = parseInt(document.getElementById('widthInput').value) || 9;
              const h = parseInt(document.getElementById('heightInput').value) || 9;
              applyDesignToMainScene(uploadedDesignTexture, w, h);
            }
          });
        }
      });
    </script>

        /* â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ SEMANTIC COLORS â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ */
        --vuexy-secondary: #82868b;
        --vuexy-secondary-light: rgba(130, 134, 139, 0.12);
        
        --vuexy-success: #28c76f;
        --vuexy-success-dark: #1f9d57;
        --vuexy-success-light: rgba(40, 199, 111, 0.12);
        --vuexy-success-gradient: linear-gradient(118deg, #28c76f, rgba(40, 199, 111, 0.7));
        
        --vuexy-danger: #ea5455;
        --vuexy-danger-dark: #e42728;
        --vuexy-danger-light: rgba(234, 84, 85, 0.12);
        --vuexy-danger-gradient: linear-gradient(118deg, #ea5455, rgba(234, 84, 85, 0.7));
        
        --vuexy-warning: #ff9f43;
        --vuexy-warning-dark: #ff8510;
        --vuexy-warning-light: rgba(255, 159, 67, 0.12);
        --vuexy-warning-gradient: linear-gradient(118deg, #ff9f43, rgba(255, 159, 67, 0.7));
        
        --vuexy-info: #00cfe8;
        --vuexy-info-dark: #00a1b5;
        --vuexy-info-light: rgba(0, 207, 232, 0.12);
        --vuexy-info-gradient: linear-gradient(118deg, #00cfe8, rgba(0, 207, 232, 0.7));
        
        /* â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ BACKGROUNDS â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ */
        --vuexy-body-bg: #f8f8f8;
        --vuexy-card-bg: #ffffff;
        --vuexy-component-bg: #ffffff;
        --vuexy-modal-bg: #ffffff;
        --vuexy-input-bg: #ffffff;
        --vuexy-dark-bg: #283046;
        --vuexy-darker-bg: #161d31;
        
        /* â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ BORDERS â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ */
        --vuexy-border-color: #ebe9f1;
        --vuexy-border-dark: #d8d6de;
        --vuexy-input-border: #d8d6de;
        --vuexy-input-border-focus: var(--vuexy-primary);
        
        /* â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ TEXT COLORS â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ */
        --vuexy-heading-color: #5e5873;
        --vuexy-body-color: #6e6b7b;
        --vuexy-muted-color: #b9b9c3;
        --vuexy-placeholder-color: #b9b9c3;
        --vuexy-label-color: #5e5873;
        
        /* â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ SHADOWS - VUEXY SPECIFIC â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ */
        --vuexy-shadow-xs: 0 2px 4px 0 rgba(34, 41, 47, 0.08);
        --vuexy-shadow-sm: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(34, 41, 47, 0.1);
        --vuexy-shadow-md: 0 4px 18px 0 rgba(34, 41, 47, 0.1);
        --vuexy-shadow-lg: 0 8px 25px 0 rgba(34, 41, 47, 0.12);
        --vuexy-shadow-xl: 0 12px 35px 0 rgba(34, 41, 47, 0.14);
        --vuexy-shadow-primary: 0 0 10px 0 rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.5);
        --vuexy-shadow-primary-lg: 0 4px 18px 0 rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.4);
        
        /* â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ BORDER RADIUS â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ */
        --vuexy-radius-xs: 0.25rem;
        --vuexy-radius-sm: 0.357rem;
        --vuexy-radius-md: 0.428rem;
        --vuexy-radius-lg: 0.5rem;
        --vuexy-radius-xl: 0.625rem;
        --vuexy-radius-pill: 1.5rem;
        
        /* â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ SPACING â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ */
        --vuexy-spacer: 1rem;
        --vuexy-card-spacer-y: 1.25rem;
        --vuexy-card-spacer-x: 1.25rem;
        
        /* â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ TYPOGRAPHY â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ */
        --vuexy-font-family: 'Montserrat', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif;
        --vuexy-font-size-base: 1rem;
        --vuexy-font-size-sm: 0.857rem;
        --vuexy-font-size-lg: 1.143rem;
        --vuexy-font-weight-normal: 400;
        --vuexy-font-weight-medium: 500;
        --vuexy-font-weight-semibold: 600;
        --vuexy-font-weight-bold: 700;
        --vuexy-line-height-base: 1.45;
        
        /* â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ TRANSITIONS â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ */
        --vuexy-transition-base: all 0.25s ease;
        --vuexy-transition-fast: all 0.15s ease;
        --vuexy-transition-slow: all 0.35s ease;
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY GLOBAL STYLES
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      *, *::before, *::after {
        box-sizing: border-box;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }

      body {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-base);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-normal);
        line-height: var(--vuexy-line-height-base);
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        background-color: var(--vuexy-body-bg);
        min-height: 100vh;
        -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
        -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
        text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;
      }

      /* Vuexy Typography */
      h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .heading {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        line-height: 1.2;
        margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
      }

      h1 { font-size: 2rem; }
      h2 { font-size: 1.714rem; }
      h3 { font-size: 1.5rem; }
      h4 { font-size: 1.286rem; }
      h5 { font-size: 1.07rem; }
      h6 { font-size: 1rem; }

      p {
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
      }

      a {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        text-decoration: none;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-fast);
      }

      a:hover {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary-dark);
      }

      .mono {
        font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', 'SFMono-Regular', Consolas, monospace;
      }

      /* Vuexy Selection */
      ::selection {
        background-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        color: #fff;
      }

      /* Vuexy Scrollbar */
      ::-webkit-scrollbar {
        width: 8px;
        height: 8px;
      }
      ::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
        background: var(--vuexy-body-bg);
      }
      ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
        background: var(--vuexy-border-color);
        border-radius: 4px;
      }
      ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
        background: var(--vuexy-border-dark);
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY TOP BANNER
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .promo-banner {
        background: var(--vuexy-dark-bg);
        padding: 10px 0;
        color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-sm);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
      }

      .promo-banner .container {
        display: flex !important;
      }

      .promo-banner .promo-item {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 8px;
        padding: 0 1rem;
        border-right: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.15);
      }

      .promo-banner .promo-item:last-child {
        border-right: none;
      }

      .promo-banner .promo-item i {
        font-size: 1.125rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary-light);
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY NAVBAR
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .main-navbar {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-sm);
        position: sticky;
        top: 0;
        z-index: 1000;
        border-bottom: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .navbar-brand-logo {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-bold);
        font-size: 1.5rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        text-decoration: none;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
      }

      .navbar-brand-logo .logo-icon {
        width: 32px;
        height: 22px;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
      }

      .navbar-brand-logo span {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
      }

      .nav-category {
        display: flex;
        gap: 0.25rem;
        list-style: none;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }

      .nav-category a {
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        text-decoration: none;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-fast);
        padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out;
        font-size: 0.9375rem;
      }

      .nav-category a:hover {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary-dark);
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-light);
      }

      .nav-search {
        position: relative;
      }

      .nav-search input {
        padding: 0.5rem 1rem 0.5rem 2.5rem;
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        font-size: 0.9375rem;
        min-width: 220px;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        transition: all 0.2s;
      }

      .nav-search input:focus {
        outline: none;
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(122, 143, 166, 0.15);
        background: white;
      }

      .nav-search i {
        position: absolute;
        left: 0.875rem;
        top: 50%;
        transform: translateY(-50%);
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      /* ========== BREADCRUMB ========== */
      .breadcrumb-section {
        padding: 1rem 0;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        border-bottom: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .breadcrumb-custom {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        font-size: 0.875rem;
      }

      .breadcrumb-custom a {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        text-decoration: none;
        transition: color 0.2s;
      }

      .breadcrumb-custom a:hover {
        text-decoration: underline;
      }

      .breadcrumb-custom span {
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      /* ========== INSTAGRAM STORY STYLE CATEGORIES ========== */
      .category-story-section {
        padding: 1rem 0;
        background: var(--vuexy-body-bg);
        overflow: hidden;
      }
      
      .story-scroll-container {
        display: flex;
        gap: 1.25rem;
        overflow-x: auto;
        padding: 0.6rem 1rem;
        scrollbar-width: none;
        -ms-overflow-style: none;
        justify-content: center;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        margin: 0 1rem;
        position: relative;
        border: 1px solid transparent;
        background-clip: padding-box;
      }
      
      .story-scroll-container::before {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        inset: 0;
        border-radius: inherit;
        padding: 1px;
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.4), rgba(0, 207, 232, 0.3), rgba(40, 199, 111, 0.4), rgba(255, 159, 67, 0.3), rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.4));
        -webkit-mask: linear-gradient(#fff 0 0) content-box, linear-gradient(#fff 0 0);
        -webkit-mask-composite: xor;
        mask-composite: exclude;
        pointer-events: none;
      }
      
      .story-scroll-container::-webkit-scrollbar {
        display: none;
      }
      
      .story-item {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        cursor: pointer;
        min-width: 72px;
        transition: transform 0.2s ease;
      }
      
      .story-item:hover {
        transform: scale(1.05);
      }
      
      .story-ring {
        width: 64px;
        height: 64px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        padding: 3px;
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #d8d8d8, #a0a0a0);
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
      }
      
      .story-item.active .story-ring {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
        box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.4);
      }
      
      .story-item:not(.active):hover .story-ring {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--vuexy-primary-light), var(--vuexy-primary));
      }
      
      .story-avatar {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        border-radius: 50%;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        font-size: 1.5rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
      }
      
      .story-item.active .story-avatar {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter);
      }
      
      .story-item:not(.active):hover .story-avatar {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
      }
      
      .story-label {
        font-size: 0.7rem;
        font-weight: 500;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        text-align: center;
        white-space: nowrap;
        max-width: 72px;
        overflow: hidden;
        text-overflow: ellipsis;
        transition: color 0.2s;
      }
      
      .story-item.active .story-label {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        font-weight: 600;
      }
      
      .story-item:not(.active):hover .story-label {
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
      }
      
      /* Active story expanding effect */
      .story-item.active::after {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        bottom: -8px;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
        width: 6px;
        height: 6px;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary);
        border-radius: 50%;
      }
      
      .story-item {
        position: relative;
      }

      /* ========== REVIEW VIDEO STORIES ========== */
      .review-stories-section {
        margin-top: 1rem;
        padding: 1rem;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border-radius: 12px;
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }
      
      .review-stories-header {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
      }
      
      .review-stories-header i {
        color: #ea5455;
        font-size: 1.1rem;
      }
      
      .review-stories-header span {
        font-size: 0.85rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
      }
      
      .review-stories-header .count {
        color: #ea5455;
        font-weight: 700;
      }
      
      .review-stories-scroll {
        display: flex;
        gap: 0.75rem;
        overflow-x: auto;
        padding: 0.25rem 0;
        scrollbar-width: none;
        -ms-overflow-style: none;
      }
      
      .review-stories-scroll::-webkit-scrollbar {
        display: none;
      }
      
      .review-story-item {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.35rem;
        cursor: pointer;
        min-width: 56px;
        transition: transform 0.2s ease;
      }
      
      .review-story-item:hover {
        transform: scale(1.05);
      }
      
      .review-story-ring {
        transition: transform 0.2s ease, box-shadow 0.2s ease;
      }
      
      .review-story-ring {
        width: 52px;
        height: 52px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        padding: 3px;
        background: linear-gradient(45deg, #feda75, #fa7e1e, #d62976, #962fbf, #4f5bd5);
        position: relative;
      }
      
      .review-story-item:hover .review-story-ring {
        transform: scale(1.05);
        box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(214, 41, 118, 0.5);
      }
      
      .review-story-avatar {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        border-radius: 50%;
        background: var(--vuexy-body-bg);
        padding: 2px;
        overflow: hidden;
      }
      
      .review-story-avatar img {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        border-radius: 50%;
        object-fit: cover;
      }
      
      .review-story-name {
        font-size: 0.65rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        text-align: center;
        white-space: nowrap;
        max-width: 56px;
        overflow: hidden;
        text-overflow: ellipsis;
      }
      
      /* ========== MINI VIDEO REVIEWS BAR ========== */
      .mini-video-reviews {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.75rem;
        margin-top: 0.25rem;
        margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        padding: 0.25rem 0;
      }
      
      .mini-video-reviews-inline {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.2rem;
        margin-left: 0.5rem;
        padding-left: 0.5rem;
        border-left: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }
      
      .mini-video-reviews-inline .mini-story {
        width: 26px;
        height: 26px;
      }
      
      .mini-video-reviews-inline .mini-video-label {
        font-size: 0.65rem;
        margin-left: 0.25rem;
      }

      /* ========== PRICE ALERT BOX ========== */
      .price-alert-box {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border: 1px solid rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.2);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
        overflow: hidden;
        position: relative;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.08);
      }
      
      .price-alert-header {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.1), rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.05));
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        padding: 0.4rem 0.75rem;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.4rem;
        font-size: 0.7rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: 0.5px;
        border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.1);
      }
      
      .price-alert-header i {
        font-size: 0.85rem;
        color: #ff9f43;
      }
      
      .price-alert-content {
        padding: 0.75rem;
      }
      
      .quick-qty-label {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.3rem;
        font-weight: 500;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        font-size: 0.65rem;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: 0.3px;
        opacity: 0.7;
        margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
      }
      
      .quick-qty-label i {
        font-size: 0.75rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        opacity: 0.6;
      }
      
      .quick-qty-controls {
        display: inline-flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0;
        background: rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.04);
        border-radius: 50px;
        padding: 0.15rem;
        border: 1px solid rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.1);
      }
      
      .quick-qty-btn {
        width: 26px;
        height: 26px;
        border: none;
        background: transparent;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        border-radius: 50%;
        font-size: 0.9rem;
        font-weight: 400;
        cursor: pointer;
        transition: all 0.2s;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        opacity: 0.6;
      }
      
      .quick-qty-btn:hover {
        background: rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.15);
        opacity: 1;
      }
      
      .quick-qty-input {
        width: 40px;
        text-align: center;
        border: none;
        background: transparent;
        font-size: 0.9rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        padding: 0.15rem;
      }
      
      .quick-qty-input:focus {
        outline: none;
      }
      
      .quick-price-wrapper {
        display: flex;
        align-items: baseline;
        gap: 0.4rem;
        margin-top: 0.35rem;
        position: relative;
      }
      
      .quick-price {

        color: var(--vuexy-primary);

      /* ========== FLOATING CART BUTTON ========== */
      .floating-cart-container {
        position: fixed;
        top: 200px;
        right: 30px;
        z-index: 9999;
        opacity: 1;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
      }
      
      .floating-cart-container.hidden {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateX(100px);
        pointer-events: none;
      }
      
      .floating-cart-btn {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.6rem;
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--vuexy-primary), var(--vuexy-primary-dark));
        color: white;
        border: none;
        border-radius: 50px;

        cursor: pointer;

      }
      
      .floating-cart-btn:hover {

        box-shadow: 0 12px 35px rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.5);
      }
      
      .floating-cart-icon {

        height: 26px;

        overflow: hidden;
      }
      
      .floating-cart-icon i {
        font-size: 0.95rem;
        animation: truckDrive 3s ease-in-out infinite;
      }
      
      @keyframes truckDrive {
        0%, 70%, 100% { transform: translateX(0); }
        75% { transform: translateX(4px); }
        80% { transform: translateX(-2px); }
        85% { transform: translateX(3px); }
        90% { transform: translateX(-1px); }
        95% { transform: translateX(2px); }
      }
      
      .floating-cart-text {
        white-space: nowrap;
      }
      
      .floating-cart-price {

        font-weight: 700;

      }
      
      .mini-stories-container {

      }
      
      .mini-story {
        width: 32px;
        height: 32px;
        border-radius: 50%;

      }

      }

        top: 50%;

      .review-story-item:hover .review-story-avatar::after {

      /* ========== PRODUCT SECTION ========== */

      /* ========== GLASS CARD STYLES ========== */

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY 3D GALLERY
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .product-gallery {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        padding: 1.25rem;
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-md);
        border: 1px solid transparent;
        background-clip: padding-box;
        position: relative;
      }
      
      .product-gallery::before {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        inset: 0;
        border-radius: inherit;
        padding: 1px;
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.25), rgba(255, 152, 0, 0.15), rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2), rgba(218, 165, 32, 0.15));
        -webkit-mask: linear-gradient(#fff 0 0) content-box, linear-gradient(#fff 0 0);
        -webkit-mask-composite: xor;
        mask-composite: exclude;
        pointer-events: none;
      }

      .threejs-container {
        position: relative;
        width: 100%;
        aspect-ratio: 1;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        overflow: hidden;
        background: linear-gradient(180deg, #ffffff 0%, #f8f8f8 50%, #f4f4f4 100%);
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      #tshirt-canvas {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        display: block;
        cursor: grab;
      }

      #tshirt-canvas:active {
        cursor: grabbing;
      }

      .canvas-controls {
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 1rem;
        left: 50%;

        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);

        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .canvas-controls button {
        width: 36px;
        height: 36px;
        border-radius: 8px;
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);

        cursor: pointer;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        transition: all 0.2s;
      }

      .canvas-controls button:hover {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-light);

      }

      .canvas-controls button.active {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary);

      }

      .wishlist-btn {

      .wishlist-btn:hover {
        background: var(--vuexy-danger-light);

        border-color: var(--vuexy-danger);
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY COLOR PICKER
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .color-picker-section {

      .color-options {

      .color-option {

         VUEXY PRODUCT TABS
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .product-tabs-section {

      .product-tab-btn.active {

        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-semibold);
      }

      .product-tab-btn.active::after {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        height: 2px;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
      }

      .product-tab-btn i {
        font-size: 1rem;
      }

      .product-tabs-content {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        border-top: none;
        border-radius: 0 0 var(--vuexy-radius-md) var(--vuexy-radius-md);

      .product-tab-pane {
        display: none;
      }

      .product-tab-pane.active {

      @keyframes fadeIn {
        from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(5px); }
        to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }

      .tab-content-title {

        gap: 0.5rem;
      }

      .tab-content-title i {

      .tab-spec-list {
        list-style: none;

      }

      .tab-spec-list li {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        padding: 0.625rem 0;

      .tab-spec-list .spec-label {
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);

      .tab-spec-list .spec-value {

      .tab-description p {

      .tab-feature-item {

      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY PRODUCT INFO
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .product-info {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        padding: 1.5rem;

        background-clip: padding-box;

      .product-info::before {
        content: '';

        background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.25), rgba(255, 152, 0, 0.15), rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.2), rgba(218, 165, 32, 0.15));

        -webkit-mask-composite: xor;
        mask-composite: exclude;
        pointer-events: none;

         VUEXY BADGES
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */

      }

      .badge-info {

        border: 1px solid transparent;
        background-clip: padding-box;

      }

        inset: 0;

         VUEXY DELIVERY CARD
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .delivery-card {
        background: var(--vuexy-success-light);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        padding: 1rem 1.25rem;
        margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        border: 1px solid rgba(40, 199, 111, 0.15);
      }

      .delivery-title {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-semibold);
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
      }

      .delivery-title i {
        color: var(--vuexy-success);
        font-size: 1.25rem;
      }

      .delivery-time {
        color: var(--vuexy-success);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-bold);
      }

      .delivery-location {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-sm);
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.25rem;
        margin-top: 0.5rem;
      }

      .delivery-location i {
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY CARD STYLES
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .vuexy-card, .step-card {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border: none;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-md);
        padding: var(--vuexy-card-spacer-y) var(--vuexy-card-spacer-x);
        margin-bottom: var(--vuexy-spacer);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
        position: relative;
      }

      .step-card:hover {
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-lg);
        transform: translateY(-2px);
      }

      .step-card::before {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        left: 0;
        top: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 4px;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg) 0 0 var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        opacity: 0;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-fast);
      }

      .step-card:hover::before {
        opacity: 1;
      }

      .step-header {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-semibold);
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        margin-bottom: 1.25rem;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.875rem;
        font-size: 1.07rem;
      }

      .step-number {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
        color: white;
        width: 34px;
        height: 34px;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        font-size: 0.9rem;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-semibold);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-primary-lg);
        box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(122, 143, 166, 0.3);
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY UPLOAD AREA
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .upload-area {
        border: 2px dashed var(--vuexy-border-color);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        padding: 0.875rem 1rem;
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.04);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
        cursor: pointer;
      }

      .upload-area:hover {
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.08);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-sm);
      }

      .upload-icon {
        font-size: 2rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        opacity: 0.7;
        line-height: 1;
      }

      .upload-text {
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-semibold);
        margin-bottom: 0.125rem;
        font-size: 0.875rem;
      }

      .upload-subtext {
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: 0.7rem;
        margin-bottom: 0;
      }

      .upload-btn {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
        color: white;
        border: none;
        padding: 0.5rem 1.25rem;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        font-size: 0.8rem;
        margin-top: 0;
        cursor: pointer;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-primary-lg);
      }

      .upload-btn:hover {
        box-shadow: 0 0 12px 0 rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.5);
        transform: translateY(-1px);
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY SIZE INPUTS
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .size-inputs {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: 1fr auto 1fr 1fr;
        gap: 1rem;
        align-items: end;
      }

      .size-input-group label {
        display: block;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: 0.75rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        letter-spacing: 0.6px;
      }

      .size-input-group input {
        width: 100%;
        padding: 0.625rem 0.875rem;
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-input-border);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-base);
        text-align: center;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-fast);
        background: var(--vuexy-input-bg);
      }

      .size-input-group input:focus {
        outline: none;
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        box-shadow: 0 3px 10px 0 rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.1);
      }

      .size-multiply {
        font-size: 1.25rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        padding-bottom: 0.625rem;
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY QUANTITY CONTROL
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .quantity-control {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-input-border);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        overflow: hidden;
        background: var(--vuexy-input-bg);
      }

      .quantity-control button {
        width: 40px;
        height: 40px;
        border: none;
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.08);
        cursor: pointer;
        font-size: 1.125rem;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-fast);
      }

      .quantity-control button:hover {
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.15);
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
      }

      .quantity-control input {
        width: 55px;
        text-align: center;
        border: none;
        border-left: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        border-right: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-base);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        background: var(--vuexy-input-bg);
      }

      .price-display {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: 1.75rem;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-bold);
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        text-align: right;
        padding-bottom: 0.25rem;
      }

      /* ========== PRICING TABLE ========== */
      .pricing-section {
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
      }

      .pricing-header {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: space-between;
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
      }

      .pricing-title {
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-success);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        font-size: 1rem;
      }

      .pricing-title i {
        font-size: 1.25rem;
      }

      .pricing-table {
        width: 100%;
        border-collapse: separate;
        border-spacing: 0;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        overflow: hidden;
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .pricing-table th {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--vuexy-primary), var(--vuexy-primary-dark));
        color: white;
        padding: 0.875rem 1rem;
        font-weight: 500;
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
        text-align: center;
      }

      .pricing-table td {
        padding: 0.875rem 1rem;
        text-align: center;
        border-bottom: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        font-size: 0.875rem;
      }

      .pricing-table tr:last-child td {
        border-bottom: none;
      }

      .pricing-table tbody tr {
        transition: background 0.15s;
      }

      .pricing-table tbody tr:hover {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter);
      }

      .price-original {
        text-decoration: line-through;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
        margin-right: 0.25rem;
      }

      .price-sale {
        color: var(--vuexy-success);
        font-weight: 600;
      }

      .discount-badge {
        background: var(--vuexy-warning-light);
        color: #c9a227;
        font-size: 0.6875rem;
        padding: 0.2em 0.5em;
        border-radius: 4px;
        font-weight: 600;
        margin-left: 0.25rem;
      }

      /* ========== BULK DISCOUNT ========== */
      .bulk-section {
        background: var(--vuexy-info-light);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        padding: 1.25rem;
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
        border: 1px solid rgba(93, 173, 226, 0.2);
      }

      .bulk-title {
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-info);
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        font-size: 1rem;
      }

      .bulk-title i {
        font-size: 1.25rem;
      }

      .bulk-table {
        width: 100%;
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
      }

      .bulk-table th {
        text-align: left;
        padding: 0.625rem 0.5rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        font-weight: 500;
        border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(93, 173, 226, 0.2);
      }

      .bulk-table td {
        padding: 0.625rem 0.5rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
      }

      /* ========== INSTRUCTIONS ========== */
      .instructions-section {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        padding: 1.5rem;
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-md);
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .instructions-title {
        font-size: 1.25rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
      }

      .instructions-title i {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
      }

      .instruction-steps {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
        gap: 1rem;
      }

      .instruction-step {
        text-align: center;
        padding: 1.5rem 1rem;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        transition: all 0.2s;
      }

      .instruction-step:hover {
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(122, 143, 166, 0.15);
        transform: translateY(-2px);
      }

      .instruction-number {
        width: 50px;
        height: 50px;
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--vuexy-primary), var(--vuexy-primary-dark));
        color: white;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        font-size: 1.25rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        margin: 0 auto 1rem;
        box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(122, 143, 166, 0.3);
      }

      .instruction-title {
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        margin-bottom: 0.375rem;
        font-size: 0.9375rem;
      }

      .instruction-desc {
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      .instruction-time {
        font-size: 0.75rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-warning);
        font-weight: 600;
        margin-top: 0.5rem;
        display: inline-block;
        padding: 0.25em 0.5em;
        background: var(--vuexy-warning-light);
        border-radius: 4px;
      }

      /* ========== SETTINGS GRID ========== */
      .settings-grid {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(150px, 1fr));
        gap: 1rem;
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
        padding-top: 1.5rem;
        border-top: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .setting-item {
        text-align: center;
        padding: 1rem;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
      }

      .setting-label {
        font-size: 0.6875rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        text-transform: uppercase;
        margin-bottom: 0.375rem;
        letter-spacing: 0.5px;
      }

      .setting-value {
        font-weight: 700;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary-dark);
        font-size: 1.125rem;
      }

      .setting-note {
        font-size: 0.6875rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        margin-top: 0.25rem;
      }

      /* ========== REVIEWS ========== */
      .reviews-section {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        padding: 1.5rem;
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-md);
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .reviews-header {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: space-between;
        margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        gap: 1rem;
        padding-bottom: 1rem;
        border-bottom: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .reviews-title {
        font-size: 1.25rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
      }

      .reviews-title i {
        color: var(--vuexy-warning);
      }

      .reviews-summary {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 1rem;
      }

      .reviews-score {
        font-size: 2.5rem;
        font-weight: 700;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        line-height: 1;
      }

      .reviews-details {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
      }

      .reviews-stars {
        color: var(--vuexy-warning);
        display: flex;
        gap: 2px;
      }

      .reviews-count {
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      .review-bars {
        flex: 1;
        max-width: 280px;
      }

      .review-bar-item {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        margin-bottom: 0.375rem;
        font-size: 0.75rem;
      }

      .review-bar-label {
        width: 48px;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      .review-bar-track {
        flex: 1;
        height: 6px;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter);
        border-radius: 3px;
        overflow: hidden;
      }

      .review-bar-fill {
        height: 100%;
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--vuexy-warning), #f8c957);
        border-radius: 3px;
      }

      .review-bar-percent {
        width: 32px;
        text-align: right;
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        font-weight: 500;
      }

      /* ========== REVIEW CARDS ========== */
      .review-cards {
        display: grid;
        gap: 1rem;
      }

      .review-card {
        padding: 1.25rem;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        transition: all 0.2s;
      }

      .review-card:hover {
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
      }

      .review-card-header {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.75rem;
        margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
      }

      .review-avatar {
        width: 42px;
        height: 42px;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--vuexy-primary), var(--vuexy-primary-dark));
        color: white;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 0.875rem;
      }

      .review-author {
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        font-size: 0.9375rem;
      }

      .review-date {
        font-size: 0.75rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      .review-text {
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        font-size: 0.875rem;
        line-height: 1.6;
      }

      /* ========== RELATED PRODUCTS ========== */
      .related-section {
        margin-top: 2rem;
        padding-bottom: 2rem;
      }

      .section-title {
        font-size: 1.375rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        margin-bottom: 1.25rem;
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY PRODUCT CARDS
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .product-cards {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(180px, 1fr));
        gap: 1.25rem;
      }

      .product-card {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        overflow: hidden;
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-sm);
        border: none;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
        text-decoration: none;
      }

      .product-card:hover {
        transform: translateY(-5px);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-lg);
      }

      .product-card-image {
        aspect-ratio: 1;
        background: var(--vuexy-body-bg);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        padding: 1rem;
      }

      .product-card-image img {
        max-width: 100%;
        max-height: 100%;
        object-fit: contain;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-slow);
      }

      .product-card:hover .product-card-image img {
        transform: scale(1.08);
      }

      .product-card-body {
        padding: 1rem;
        border-top: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .product-card-title {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-semibold);
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-base);
        margin-bottom: 0.375rem;
      }

      .product-card-rating {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.375rem;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-sm);
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      .product-card-rating i {

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY BUTTON STYLES
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      /* Base Button */
      .btn {
        display: inline-flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        padding: 0.786rem 1.5rem;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-base);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        line-height: 1;
        text-align: center;
        white-space: nowrap;
        vertical-align: middle;
        cursor: pointer;
        user-select: none;
        border: 1px solid transparent;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
      }

      /* Primary Button - Add to Cart */
      .add-cart-btn, .btn-primary {
        width: 100%;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
        color: #fff;
        border: none;
        padding: 0.9rem 1.75rem;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        font-size: 1rem;
        letter-spacing: 0.3px;
        cursor: pointer;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        gap: 0.625rem;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-primary-lg);
        position: relative;
        overflow: hidden;
      }

      .add-cart-btn::before {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: -100%;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.25), transparent);
        transition: left 0.5s ease;
      }

      .add-cart-btn:hover {
        box-shadow: 0 0 20px 0 rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.5);
        transform: translateY(-3px);
      }

      .add-cart-btn:hover::before {
        left: 100%;
      }

      .add-cart-btn:active {
        transform: translateY(-1px);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-primary);
      }

      /* Outline Button */
      .btn-outline-primary {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        background: transparent;
      }

      .btn-outline-primary:hover {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary);
        color: #fff;
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-primary);
      }

      /* Flat Button */
      .btn-flat-primary {
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.12);
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        border: none;
      }

      .btn-flat-primary:hover {
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.2);
      }

      /* Relief Button */
      .btn-relief-primary {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary);
        color: #fff;
        box-shadow: inset 0 -3px 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
      }

      .btn-relief-primary:active {
        box-shadow: none;
        transform: translateY(3px);
      }

      .desktop-cart-btn {
        display: block;
        width: 100%;
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY STICKY ADD TO CART

      .add-to-cart-section {
        position: sticky;
        bottom: 0;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        padding: 1rem;
        border-top: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);

         VUEXY FOOTER

      .site-footer {

      /* ========== T-SHIRT MOCKUP ========== */
      .tshirt-mockup {

      /* ========== BUTTON STYLES ========== */
      .btn-cloudy-primary {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--vuexy-primary), var(--vuexy-primary-dark));
        border: none;
        color: white;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(122, 143, 166, 0.35);
      }

      /* Loading Animation */
      .loading-spinner {
        position: absolute;
        top: 50%;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 1rem;
      }

      .spinner {
        width: 40px;
        height: 40px;
        border: 3px solid var(--vuexy-primary-light);
        border-top-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        border-radius: 50%;
        animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
      }

      @keyframes spin {
        to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY POSITION SELECTOR
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .position-selector {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
        gap: 1rem;
        margin-top: 1rem;
      }

      .position-box {
        position: relative;
        aspect-ratio: 1;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border: 2px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        cursor: pointer;
        overflow: hidden;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
      }

      .position-box:hover {
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-md);
        transform: translateY(-4px);
      }

      .position-box.active {
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        border-width: 2px;
        box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.12), var(--vuexy-shadow-md);
      }

      .position-box.active::after {
        content: 'âœ“';
        position: absolute;
        top: 8px;
        right: 8px;
        width: 24px;
        height: 24px;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
        color: white;
        border-radius: 50%;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        font-size: 12px;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-bold);
        z-index: 10;
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-primary);
        animation: scaleIn 0.2s ease;
      }

      @keyframes scaleIn {
        from { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }
        to { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
      }

      .position-canvas-container {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        position: relative;
      }

      .position-canvas {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        display: block;
      }

      .position-label {
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        background: linear-gradient(transparent, rgba(40, 48, 70, 0.9));
        color: white;
        font-size: 0.75rem;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        text-align: center;
        padding: 18px 6px 10px;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: 0.8px;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
      }

      .position-coords {
        position: absolute;
        top: 8px;
        left: 8px;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary);
        color: white;
        font-size: 0.625rem;
        padding: 4px 8px;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-sm);
        font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-xs);
      }

      @media (max-width: 575px) {
        .position-selector {
          grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
        }
        .position-label {
          font-size: 0.7rem;
        }
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY FORM INPUTS
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .form-control, input[type="number"], input[type="text"] {
        display: block;
        width: 100%;
        padding: 0.571rem 1rem;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-base);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-normal);
        line-height: 1.45;
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        background-color: var(--vuexy-input-bg);
        background-clip: padding-box;
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-input-border);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
      }

      .form-control:focus, input[type="number"]:focus, input[type="text"]:focus {
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        background-color: var(--vuexy-input-bg);
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        outline: 0;
        box-shadow: 0 3px 10px 0 rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.1);
      }

      .form-control::placeholder {
        color: var(--vuexy-placeholder-color);
        opacity: 1;
      }

      label {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-sm);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-normal);
        color: var(--vuexy-label-color);
        margin-bottom: 0.357rem;
        display: inline-block;
      }
    </style>

    <!-- Core JS -->
    <script src="./assets/vendor/libs/popper/popper.js"></script>
