```liquid
      // Change Quantity
      function changeQuantity(delta) {
        const input = document.getElementById('quantityInput');
        let val = parseInt(input.value) + delta;
        if (val < 1) val = 1;
        input.value = val;
        calculatePrice();
      }

      // Calculate Price
      function calculatePrice() {
        const width = parseInt(document.getElementById('widthInput').value) || 1;
        const height = parseInt(document.getElementById('heightInput').value) || 1;
        const quantity = parseInt(document.getElementById('quantityInput').value) || 1;
        const sqIn = width * height;
        let pricePerUnit = 2.85;

        if (sqIn > 100) pricePerUnit = 4.15;
        else if (sqIn > 50) pricePerUnit = 3.50;
        else if (sqIn > 25) pricePerUnit = 3.05;

        // Volume discount
        if (quantity >= 100) pricePerUnit *= 0.70;
        else if (quantity >= 25) pricePerUnit *= 0.80;
        else if (quantity >= 12) pricePerUnit *= 0.85;
        else if (quantity >= 6) pricePerUnit *= 0.90;
        else if (quantity >= 2) pricePerUnit *= 0.95;

        const total = (pricePerUnit * quantity).toFixed(2);
        document.getElementById('priceDisplay').textContent = '$' + total;
      }

      // Global File Upload Handler
      function handleFileUpload(file) {
        console.log('File uploaded:', file.name);
        const uploadArea = document.getElementById('uploadArea');
        
        // Read and process the image
        const reader = new FileReader();
        reader.onload = function(e) {
          const imageData = e.target.result;
          
          // Load texture and apply to t-shirt
          loadDesignTexture(imageData, file.name);
          
          // Show preview in upload area
          uploadArea.innerHTML = `
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 1rem; padding: 0.5rem;">
              <img src="${imageData}" style="max-width: 80px; max-height: 80px; border-radius: 8px; border: 2px solid var(--vuexy-primary);">
              <div style="flex: 1; text-align: left;">
                <p class="upload-text" style="color: var(--vuexy-success); margin-bottom: 0.25rem; font-size: 0.9rem;">
                  <i class="ti ti-circle-check me-1"></i>Design Uploaded!
                </p>
                <p class="upload-subtext" style="margin-bottom: 0.5rem; font-size: 0.75rem;">${file.name}</p>
                <button class="upload-btn" onclick="removeDesign()" style="background: var(--vuexy-danger); padding: 0.4rem 0.8rem; font-size: 0.75rem;">
                  <i class="ti ti-trash me-1"></i> Remove
                </button>
              </div>
            </div>
          `;
        };
        reader.readAsDataURL(file);
      }

      // Upload Area Events
      document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        const uploadArea = document.getElementById('uploadArea');
        const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
        fileInput.type = 'file';
        fileInput.accept = 'image/*,.svg,.png,.jpg,.jpeg';
        fileInput.style.display = 'none';
        uploadArea.appendChild(fileInput);

        uploadArea.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
          if (e.target.tagName !== 'BUTTON') {
            fileInput.click();
          }
        });

        uploadArea.addEventListener('dragover', (e) => {
          e.preventDefault();
          uploadArea.style.borderColor = 'var(--vuexy-primary)';
          uploadArea.style.background = 'var(--vuexy-primary-light)';
        });

        uploadArea.addEventListener('dragleave', () => {
          uploadArea.style.borderColor = '';
          uploadArea.style.background = '';
        });

        uploadArea.addEventListener('drop', (e) => {
          e.preventDefault();
          uploadArea.style.borderColor = '';
          uploadArea.style.background = '';
          const files = e.dataTransfer.files;
          if (files.length > 0) {
            handleFileUpload(files[0]);
          }
        });

        fileInput.addEventListener('change', (e) => {
          if (e.target.files.length > 0) {
            handleFileUpload(e.target.files[0]);
          }
        });

        // Add event listeners for price calculation and design size update
        document.getElementById('widthInput').addEventListener('input', () => {
          calculatePrice();
          updateDesignSize();
        });
        document.getElementById('heightInput').addEventListener('input', () => {
          calculatePrice();
          updateDesignSize();
        });
        document.getElementById('quantityInput').addEventListener('input', calculatePrice);
        
        // Position Offset Slider Event Listeners - ULTRA PRECISE
        const xSlider = document.getElementById('positionXSlider');
        const ySlider = document.getElementById('positionYSlider');
        const xValue = document.getElementById('positionXValue');
        const yValue = document.getElementById('positionYValue');
        
        if (xSlider && ySlider) {
          xSlider.addEventListener('input', (e) => {
            positionOffsetX = parseInt(e.target.value);
            xValue.textContent = positionOffsetX;
            updateCoordinateDisplay();
            // TasarÄ±mÄ± yeniden uygula
            if (uploadedDesignTexture) {
              const w = parseInt(document.getElementById('widthInput').value) || 9;
              const h = parseInt(document.getElementById('heightInput').value) || 9;
              applyDesignToMainScene(uploadedDesignTexture, w, h);
            }
          });
          
          ySlider.addEventListener('input', (e) => {
            positionOffsetY = parseInt(e.target.value);
            yValue.textContent = positionOffsetY;
            updateCoordinateDisplay();
            // TasarÄ±mÄ± yeniden uygula
            if (uploadedDesignTexture) {
              const w = parseInt(document.getElementById('widthInput').value) || 9;
              const h = parseInt(document.getElementById('heightInput').value) || 9;
              applyDesignToMainScene(uploadedDesignTexture, w, h);
            }
          });
        }
      });
    </script>
```

```liquid
<!-- Product Tabs Section - Fully Customizable -->
<style>
  .product-tabs-wrapper {
    padding: 2rem 0;
    background: var(--vuexy-body-bg, #f8f8f8);
  }

  .product-tabs-section {
    background: var(--vuexy-card-bg, #fff);
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg, 0.5rem);
    box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-md, 0 4px 18px 0 rgba(34, 41, 47, 0.1));
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .product-tabs-nav {
    display: flex;
    gap: 0;
    background: {{ section.settings.nav_bg_color }};
    border-bottom: 2px solid var(--vuexy-border-color, #ebe9f1);
    overflow-x: auto;
    scrollbar-width: none;
  }

  .product-tabs-nav::-webkit-scrollbar { display: none; }

  .product-tab-btn {
    flex: 1;
    min-width: 120px;
    padding: {{ section.settings.tab_padding }};
    background: transparent;
    border: none;
    font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family, 'Montserrat', sans-serif);
    font-size: {{ section.settings.tab_font_size }};
    font-weight: 500;
    color: {{ section.settings.tab_text_color }};
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.25s ease;
    position: relative;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    white-space: nowrap;
  }

  .product-tab-btn:hover {
    color: {{ section.settings.tab_active_color }};
    background: {{ section.settings.tab_hover_bg }};
  }

  .product-tab-btn.active {
    color: {{ section.settings.tab_active_color }};
    background: {{ section.settings.tab_active_bg }};
    font-weight: 600;
  }

  .product-tab-btn.active::after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    bottom: -2px;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    height: 3px;
    background: {{ section.settings.tab_indicator_color }};
    border-radius: 3px 3px 0 0;
  }

  .product-tab-btn i {
    font-size: 1.125rem;
  }

  .product-tabs-content {
    padding: {{ section.settings.content_padding }};
  }

  .product-tab-pane {
    display: none;
  }

  .product-tab-pane.active {
    display: block;
    animation: tabFadeIn 0.3s ease;
  }

  @keyframes tabFadeIn {
    from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(8px); }
    to { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
  }

  .tab-content-header {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.75rem;
    margin-bottom: 1.25rem;
    padding-bottom: 0.75rem;
    border-bottom: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color, #ebe9f1);
  }

  .tab-content-header i {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    color: {{ section.settings.tab_active_color }};
  }

  .tab-content-header h4 {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 1.125rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--vuexy-heading-color, #5e5873);
  }

  .tab-spec-list {
    list-style: none;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
  }

  .tab-spec-list li {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 0.875rem 0;
    border-bottom: 1px dashed var(--vuexy-border-color, #ebe9f1);
  }

  .tab-spec-list li:last-child {
    border-bottom: none;
  }

  .spec-label {
    color: var(--vuexy-muted-color, #b9b9c3);
    font-weight: 500;
    font-size: 0.875rem;
  }

  .spec-value {
    color: var(--vuexy-heading-color, #5e5873);
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    text-align: right;
  }

  .tab-description {
    font-size: 0.9375rem;
    line-height: 1.7;
    color: var(--vuexy-body-color, #6e6b7b);
  }

  .tab-description p {
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }

  .tab-features-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
    gap: 1rem;
    margin-top: 1.5rem;
  }

  .tab-feature-item {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.625rem;
    padding: 0.75rem 1rem;
    background: {{ section.settings.feature_bg_color }};
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md, 0.428rem);
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    color: var(--vuexy-body-color, #6e6b7b);
  }

  .tab-feature-item i {
    color: {{ section.settings.feature_icon_color }};
    font-size: 1.125rem;
  }

  @media (max-width: 768px) {
    .product-tab-btn {
      padding: 0.75rem 1rem;
      font-size: 0.8125rem;
    }
    .product-tabs-content {
      padding: 1.25rem;
    }
    .tab-features-grid {
      grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    }
  }
</style>

<div class="product-tabs-wrapper">
  <div class="container">
    <div class="product-tabs-section">
      <div class="product-tabs-nav">
        {% for block in section.blocks %}
          {% if block.type == 'tab' %}
            <button class="product-tab-btn{% if forloop.first %} active{% endif %}" 
                    onclick="switchProductTab('{{ block.id }}', this)"
                    {{ block.shopify_attributes }}>
              {% if block.settings.icon != blank %}
                <i class="ti ti-{{ block.settings.icon }}"></i>
              {% endif %}
              <span>{{ block.settings.title }}</span>
            </button>
          {% endif %}
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
      
      <div class="product-tabs-content">
        {% for block in section.blocks %}
          {% if block.type == 'tab' %}
            <div class="product-tab-pane{% if forloop.first %} active{% endif %}" id="tab-{{ block.id }}">
              {% if block.settings.show_header %}
                <div class="tab-content-header">
                  {% if block.settings.icon != blank %}
                    <i class="ti ti-{{ block.settings.icon }}"></i>
                  {% endif %}
                  <h4>{{ block.settings.header_title | default: block.settings.title }}</h4>
                </div>
              {% endif %}

              {% case block.settings.content_type %}
                {% when 'specs' %}
                  <ul class="tab-spec-list">
                    {% if block.settings.spec_1_label != blank %}
                      <li>
                        <span class="spec-label">{{ block.settings.spec_1_label }}</span>
                        <span class="spec-value">{{ block.settings.spec_1_value }}</span>
                      </li>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.spec_2_label != blank %}
                      <li>
                        <span class="spec-label">{{ block.settings.spec_2_label }}</span>
                        <span class="spec-value">{{ block.settings.spec_2_value }}</span>
                      </li>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.spec_3_label != blank %}
                      <li>
                        <span class="spec-label">{{ block.settings.spec_3_label }}</span>
                        <span class="spec-value">{{ block.settings.spec_3_value }}</span>
                      </li>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.spec_4_label != blank %}
                      <li>
                        <span class="spec-label">{{ block.settings.spec_4_label }}</span>
                        <span class="spec-value">{{ block.settings.spec_4_value }}</span>
                      </li>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.spec_5_label != blank %}
                      <li>
                        <span class="spec-label">{{ block.settings.spec_5_label }}</span>
                        <span class="spec-value">{{ block.settings.spec_5_value }}</span>
                      </li>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.spec_6_label != blank %}
                      <li>
                        <span class="spec-label">{{ block.settings.spec_6_label }}</span>
                        <span class="spec-value">{{ block.settings.spec_6_value }}</span>
                      </li>
                    {% endif %}
                  </ul>

                {% when 'description' %}
                  <div class="tab-description">
                    {{ block.settings.description_text }}
                  </div>
                  {% if block.settings.show_features %}
                    <div class="tab-features-grid">
                      {% if block.settings.feature_1 != blank %}
                        <div class="tab-feature-item">
                          <i class="ti ti-{{ block.settings.feature_1_icon | default: 'check' }}"></i>
                          <span>{{ block.settings.feature_1 }}</span>
                        </div>
                      {% endif %}
                      {% if block.settings.feature_2 != blank %}
                        <div class="tab-feature-item">
                          <i class="ti ti-{{ block.settings.feature_2_icon | default: 'check' }}"></i>
                          <span>{{ block.settings.feature_2 }}</span>
                        </div>
                      {% endif %}
                      {% if block.settings.feature_3 != blank %}
                        <div class="tab-feature-item">
                          <i class="ti ti-{{ block.settings.feature_3_icon | default: 'check' }}"></i>
                          <span>{{ block.settings.feature_3 }}</span>
                        </div>
                      {% endif %}
                      {% if block.settings.feature_4 != blank %}
                        <div class="tab-feature-item">
                          <i class="ti ti-{{ block.settings.feature_4_icon | default: 'check' }}"></i>
                          <span>{{ block.settings.feature_4 }}</span>
                        </div>
                      {% endif %}
                      {% if block.settings.feature_5 != blank %}
                        <div class="tab-feature-item">
                          <i class="ti ti-{{ block.settings.feature_5_icon | default: 'check' }}"></i>
                          <span>{{ block.settings.feature_5 }}</span>
                        </div>
                      {% endif %}
                      {% if block.settings.feature_6 != blank %}
                        <div class="tab-feature-item">
                          <i class="ti ti-{{ block.settings.feature_6_icon | default: 'check' }}"></i>
                          <span>{{ block.settings.feature_6 }}</span>
                        </div>
                      {% endif %}
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}

                {% when 'custom' %}
                  <div class="tab-description">
                    {{ block.settings.custom_html }}
                  </div>

              {% endcase %}
            </div>
          {% endif %}
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<script>
  function switchProductTab(tabId, button) {
    // Remove active from all buttons
    document.querySelectorAll('.product-tabs-section .product-tab-btn').forEach(btn => {
      btn.classList.remove('active');
    });
    
    // Add active to clicked button
    button.classList.add('active');
    
    // Hide all panes
    document.querySelectorAll('.product-tabs-section .product-tab-pane').forEach(pane => {
      pane.classList.remove('active');
    });
    
    // Show selected pane
    const selectedPane = document.getElementById('tab-' + tabId);
    if (selectedPane) {
      selectedPane.classList.add('active');
    }
  }
</script>
```

```liquid
<style>
  .price-offer-section {
    background: {{ section.settings.bg_color }};
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg, 0.5rem);

    gap: 0.5rem;
    margin-top: 1rem;
    font-size: 0.875rem;
  }

  .stock-dot {
    width: 8px;
    height: 8px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: {{ section.settings.stock_color }};
  }

  .stock-text {
    color: {{ section.settings.stock_color }};
    font-weight: 500;
  }
</style>

<div class="price-offer-section">
  {% if section.settings.show_badge %}
    <div class="offer-badge">
      <i class="ti ti-{{ section.settings.badge_icon }}"></i>
      {{ section.settings.badge_text }}
    </div>
  {% endif %}

  <div class="price-row">
    <span class="current-price">{{ section.settings.current_price }}</span>
    {% if section.settings.original_price != blank %}
      <span class="original-price">{{ section.settings.original_price }}</span>
    {% endif %}
    {% if section.settings.discount_text != blank %}
      <span class="discount-badge">{{ section.settings.discount_text }}</span>
    {% endif %}
  </div>

  {% if section.settings.price_per_unit != blank %}
    <div class="price-per-unit">{{ section.settings.price_per_unit }}</div>
  {% endif %}

  {% if section.settings.show_stock %}
    <div class="stock-info">
      <span class="stock-dot"></span>
      <span class="stock-text">{{ section.settings.stock_text }}</span>
    </div>
  {% endif %}

  {% if section.settings.show_bulk_discounts %}
    <div class="bulk-discounts">
      <div class="bulk-title">{{ section.settings.bulk_title }}</div>
      <div class="bulk-items">
        {% for block in section.blocks %}
          {% if block.type == 'bulk_tier' %}
            <div class="bulk-item" {{ block.shopify_attributes }}>
              {{ block.settings.quantity }} â†’ <strong>{{ block.settings.discount }}</strong>
            </div>
          {% endif %}
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
    </div>
  {% endif %}
</div>
```

```liquid
<!-- Product Delivery & Pickup Section -->
<style>
  .delivery-section {
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }

  .delivery-card {
    background: {{ section.settings.card_bg }};
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg, 0.5rem);
    padding: 1rem 1.25rem;
    border: 1px solid {{ section.settings.border_color }};
    margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
  }

  .delivery-card-header {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.75rem;
  }

  .delivery-icon {
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md, 0.428rem);
    background: {{ section.settings.icon_bg }};
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
  }

  .delivery-icon i {
    font-size: 1.25rem;
    color: {{ section.settings.icon_color }};
  }

  .delivery-info {
    flex: 1;
  }

  .delivery-label {
    font-size: 0.75rem;
    color: var(--vuexy-muted-color, #b9b9c3);
    text-transform: uppercase;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    margin-bottom: 0.125rem;
  }

  .delivery-value {
    font-size: 0.9375rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--vuexy-heading-color, #5e5873);
  }

  .delivery-value .highlight {
    color: {{ section.settings.highlight_color }};
  }

  .delivery-action {
    font-size: 0.813rem;
    color: {{ section.settings.link_color }};
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: 500;
  }

  .delivery-action:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
  }

  .pickup-card {
    background: {{ section.settings.pickup_bg }};
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg, 0.5rem);
    padding: 1rem 1.25rem;
    border: 1px solid {{ section.settings.pickup_border }};
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 1rem;
  }

  .pickup-icon {
    width: 48px;
    height: 48px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: {{ section.settings.pickup_icon_bg }};
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    flex-shrink: 0;
  }

  .pickup-icon i {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    color: {{ section.settings.pickup_icon_color }};
  }

  .pickup-content {
    flex: 1;
  }

  .pickup-title {
    font-size: 0.9375rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--vuexy-heading-color, #5e5873);
    margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
  }

  .pickup-details {
    font-size: 0.813rem;
    color: var(--vuexy-muted-color, #b9b9c3);
  }

  .pickup-details strong {
    color: {{ section.settings.pickup_highlight }};
  }

  .pickup-badge {
    background: {{ section.settings.pickup_badge_bg }};
    color: {{ section.settings.pickup_badge_color }};
    padding: 0.375rem 0.75rem;
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-pill, 1.5rem);
    font-size: 0.75rem;
    font-weight: 600;
  }
</style>

<div class="delivery-section">
  {% for block in section.blocks %}
    {% case block.type %}
      {% when 'delivery' %}
        <div class="delivery-card" {{ block.shopify_attributes }}>
          <div class="delivery-card-header">
            <div class="delivery-icon">
              <i class="ti ti-{{ block.settings.icon }}"></i>
            </div>
            <div class="delivery-info">
              <div class="delivery-label">{{ block.settings.label }}</div>
              <div class="delivery-value">
                {{ block.settings.text_before }}
                <span class="highlight">{{ block.settings.highlight_text }}</span>
                {{ block.settings.text_after }}
              </div>
            </div>
            {% if block.settings.action_text != blank %}
              <a href="{{ block.settings.action_link }}" class="delivery-action">{{ block.settings.action_text }}</a>
            {% endif %}
          </div>
        </div>

      {% when 'pickup' %}
        <div class="pickup-card" {{ block.shopify_attributes }}>
          <div class="pickup-icon">
            <i class="ti ti-{{ block.settings.icon }}"></i>
          </div>
          <div class="pickup-content">
            <div class="pickup-title">{{ block.settings.title }}</div>
            <div class="pickup-details">
              {{ block.settings.location }} â€¢ <strong>{{ block.settings.time }}</strong>
            </div>
          </div>
          {% if block.settings.badge_text != blank %}
            <div class="pickup-badge">{{ block.settings.badge_text }}</div>
          {% endif %}
        </div>

    {% endcase %}
  {% endfor %}
</div>
```

```liquid
<!-- Product Reviews & Trust Bar Section -->
<style>
  .reviews-trust-section {
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }

  .rating-bar {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 1rem;
    padding: 1rem 1.25rem;
    background: {{ section.settings.bg_color }};
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg, 0.5rem);
    border: 1px solid {{ section.settings.border_color }};
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }

  .rating-stars {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.25rem;
  }

  .rating-stars i {
    font-size: 1.125rem;
    color: {{ section.settings.star_color }};
  }

  .rating-stars i.empty {
    color: var(--vuexy-border-color, #dce0e6);
  }

  .rating-score {
    font-size: 1.125rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    color: var(--vuexy-heading-color, #5e5873);
    margin-left: 0.25rem;
  }

  .rating-divider {
    width: 1px;
    height: 24px;
    background: var(--vuexy-border-color, #ebe9f1);
  }

  .rating-stat {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    color: var(--vuexy-body-color, #6e6b7b);
  }

  .rating-stat i {
    font-size: 1rem;
    color: {{ section.settings.stat_icon_color }};
  }

  .rating-stat strong {
    color: var(--vuexy-heading-color, #5e5873);
    font-weight: 600;
  }

  .rating-stat a {
    color: {{ section.settings.link_color }};
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: 500;
  }

  .rating-stat a:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
  }

  .trust-badges {
    display: flex;
    gap: 0.75rem;
    padding: 1rem 1.25rem;
    background: {{ section.settings.trust_bg }};
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg, 0.5rem);
    border: 1px solid {{ section.settings.border_color }};
    margin-top: 0.75rem;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }

  .trust-badge {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    background: {{ section.settings.badge_bg }};
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-pill, 1.5rem);
    font-size: 0.813rem;
    color: var(--vuexy-body-color, #6e6b7b);
  }

  .trust-badge i {
    font-size: 1rem;
    color: {{ section.settings.badge_icon_color }};
  }

  .avatars-group {
    display: flex;
    margin-right: 0.5rem;
  }

  .avatar-circle {
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    border: 2px solid {{ section.settings.bg_color }};
    margin-left: -8px;
    object-fit: cover;
    background: var(--vuexy-border-color, #dce0e6);
  }

  .avatar-circle:first-child {
    margin-left: 0;
  }

  .avatar-more {
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: {{ section.settings.avatar_more_bg }};
    border: 2px solid {{ section.settings.bg_color }};
    margin-left: -8px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    font-size: 0.625rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: {{ section.settings.avatar_more_color }};
  }
</style>

<div class="reviews-trust-section">
  <div class="rating-bar">
    <!-- Stars -->
    <div class="rating-stars">
      {% for i in (1..5) %}
        {% if i <= section.settings.rating %}
          <i class="ti ti-star-filled"></i>
        {% else %}
          <i class="ti ti-star empty"></i>
        {% endif %}
      {% endfor %}
      <span class="rating-score">{{ section.settings.rating_text }}</span>
    </div>

    <span class="rating-divider"></span>

    <!-- Reviews Count -->
    <div class="rating-stat">
      <i class="ti ti-message-circle"></i>
      <a href="{{ section.settings.reviews_link }}">
        <strong>{{ section.settings.reviews_count }}</strong> {{ section.settings.reviews_label }}
      </a>
    </div>

    {% if section.settings.show_videos %}
      <span class="rating-divider"></span>
      <div class="rating-stat">
        <i class="ti ti-video"></i>
        <strong>{{ section.settings.videos_count }}</strong> {{ section.settings.videos_label }}
      </div>
    {% endif %}

    {% if section.settings.show_recommended %}
      <span class="rating-divider"></span>
      <div class="rating-stat">
        <i class="ti ti-thumb-up"></i>
        <strong>{{ section.settings.recommended_percent }}</strong> {{ section.settings.recommended_label }}
      </div>
    {% endif %}

    {% if section.settings.show_avatars %}
      <span class="rating-divider"></span>
      <div class="rating-stat">
        <div class="avatars-group">
          {% if section.settings.avatar_1 != blank %}
            <img src="{{ section.settings.avatar_1 | image_url: width: 56 }}" class="avatar-circle" alt="Customer">
          {% else %}
            <div class="avatar-circle"></div>
          {% endif %}
          {% if section.settings.avatar_2 != blank %}
            <img src="{{ section.settings.avatar_2 | image_url: width: 56 }}" class="avatar-circle" alt="Customer">
          {% endif %}
          {% if section.settings.avatar_3 != blank %}
            <img src="{{ section.settings.avatar_3 | image_url: width: 56 }}" class="avatar-circle" alt="Customer">
          {% endif %}
          {% if section.settings.more_count != blank %}
            <div class="avatar-more">+{{ section.settings.more_count }}</div>
          {% endif %}
        </div>
        {{ section.settings.avatars_text }}
      </div>
    {% endif %}
  </div>

  {% if section.settings.show_trust_badges %}
    <div class="trust-badges">
      {% for block in section.blocks %}
        {% if block.type == 'trust_badge' %}
          <div class="trust-badge" {{ block.shopify_attributes }}>
            <i class="ti ti-{{ block.settings.icon }}"></i>
            {{ block.settings.text }}
          </div>
        {% endif %}
      {% endfor %}
    </div>
  {% endif %}
</div>

{% schema %}
{
  "name": "DeÄŸerlendirmeler Bar",
  "tag": "section",
  "class": "product-reviews-bar-section",
  "settings": [
```

```liquid
<!-- Product Reviews & Trust Bar Section -->
<style>
  .reviews-trust-section {
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }

  .rating-bar {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 1rem;
    padding: 1rem 1.25rem;
    background: {{ section.settings.bg_color }};
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg, 0.5rem);
    border: 1px solid {{ section.settings.border_color }};
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }

  .rating-stars {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.25rem;
  }

  .rating-stars i {
    font-size: 1.125rem;
    color: {{ section.settings.star_color }};
  }

  .rating-stars i.empty {
    color: var(--vuexy-border-color, #dce0e6);
  }

  .rating-score {
    font-size: 1.125rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    color: var(--vuexy-heading-color, #5e5873);
    margin-left: 0.25rem;
  }

  .rating-divider {
    width: 1px;
    height: 24px;
    background: var(--vuexy-border-color, #ebe9f1);
  }

  .rating-stat {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    color: var(--vuexy-body-color, #6e6b7b);
  }

  .rating-stat i {
    font-size: 1rem;
    color: {{ section.settings.stat_icon_color }};
  }

  .rating-stat strong {
    color: var(--vuexy-heading-color, #5e5873);
    font-weight: 600;
  }

  .trust-badges {
    display: flex;
    gap: 0.75rem;
    padding: 1rem 1.25rem;
    background: {{ section.settings.trust_bg }};
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg, 0.5rem);
    border: 1px solid {{ section.settings.border_color }};
    margin-top: 0.75rem;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }

  .trust-badge {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    background: {{ section.settings.badge_bg }};
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-pill, 1.5rem);
    font-size: 0.813rem;
    color: var(--vuexy-body-color, #6e6b7b);
  }

  .trust-badge i {
    font-size: 1rem;
    color: {{ section.settings.badge_icon_color }};
  }
</style>

<div class="reviews-trust-section">
  <div class="rating-bar">
    <div class="rating-stars">
      {% for i in (1..5) %}
        {% if i <= section.settings.rating %}
          <i class="ti ti-star-filled"></i>
        {% else %}
          <i class="ti ti-star empty"></i>
        {% endif %}
      {% endfor %}
      <span class="rating-score">{{ section.settings.rating_text }}</span>
    </div>

    <span class="rating-divider"></span>

    <div class="rating-stat">
      <i class="ti ti-message-circle"></i>
      <strong>{{ section.settings.reviews_count }}</strong> {{ section.settings.reviews_label }}
    </div>

    {% if section.settings.show_videos %}
      <span class="rating-divider"></span>
      <div class="rating-stat">
        <i class="ti ti-video"></i>
        <strong>{{ section.settings.videos_count }}</strong> {{ section.settings.videos_label }}
      </div>
    {% endif %}

    {% if section.settings.show_recommended %}
      <span class="rating-divider"></span>
      <div class="rating-stat">
        <i class="ti ti-thumb-up"></i>
        <strong>{{ section.settings.recommended_percent }}</strong> {{ section.settings.recommended_label }}
      </div>
    {% endif %}
  </div>

  {% if section.settings.show_trust_badges %}
    <div class="trust-badges">
      {% for block in section.blocks %}
        {% if block.type == 'trust_badge' %}
          <div class="trust-badge" {{ block.shopify_attributes }}>
            <i class="ti ti-{{ block.settings.icon }}"></i>
            {{ block.settings.text }}
          </div>
        {% endif %}
      {% endfor %}
    </div>
  {% endif %}
</div>

{% schema %}
```

```liquid
<!-- Product Upload Design Section -->
<style>
  .upload-design-section {
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }

  .upload-step {
    background: {{ section.settings.bg_color }};
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg, 0.5rem);
    padding: 1.25rem;
    border: 1px solid {{ section.settings.border_color }};
    margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
  }

  .upload-step-header {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.75rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }

  .step-number {
    width: 32px;
    height: 32px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: {{ section.settings.step_bg }};
    color: {{ section.settings.step_color }};
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .step-title {
    font-size: 0.9375rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--vuexy-heading-color, #5e5873);
  }

  .upload-dropzone {
    border: 2px dashed {{ section.settings.dropzone_border }};
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md, 0.428rem);
    padding: 2rem;
    text-align: center;
    background: {{ section.settings.dropzone_bg }};
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
  }

  .upload-dropzone:hover {
    border-color: {{ section.settings.primary_color }};
    background: {{ section.settings.dropzone_hover_bg }};
  }

  .dropzone-icon {
    font-size: 2.5rem;
    color: {{ section.settings.primary_color }};
    margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
  }

  .dropzone-text {
    font-size: 0.9375rem;
    color: var(--vuexy-heading-color, #5e5873);
    margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
  }

  .dropzone-hint {
    font-size: 0.75rem;
    color: var(--vuexy-muted-color, #b9b9c3);
  }

  .dropzone-hint a {
    color: {{ section.settings.primary_color }};
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: 500;
  }

  .position-options {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(100px, 1fr));
    gap: 0.75rem;
  }

  .position-option {
    position: relative;
    padding: 0.75rem;
    background: {{ section.settings.option_bg }};
    border: 2px solid {{ section.settings.border_color }};
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md, 0.428rem);
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
  }

  .position-option:hover {
    border-color: {{ section.settings.primary_color }};
  }

  .position-option.selected {
    border-color: {{ section.settings.primary_color }};
    background: {{ section.settings.option_selected_bg }};
  }

  .position-option input {
    position: absolute;
    opacity: 0;
  }

  .position-option i {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    color: {{ section.settings.option_icon_color }};
    display: block;
    margin-bottom: 0.375rem;
  }

  .position-option span {
    font-size: 0.75rem;
    color: var(--vuexy-body-color, #6e6b7b);
    font-weight: 500;
  }

  .size-options {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(80px, 1fr));
    gap: 0.5rem;
  }

  .size-option {
    position: relative;
    padding: 0.625rem 0.5rem;
    background: {{ section.settings.option_bg }};
    border: 2px solid {{ section.settings.border_color }};
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md, 0.428rem);
    cursor: pointer;
    text-align: center;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
  }

  .size-option:hover {
    border-color: {{ section.settings.primary_color }};
  }

  .size-option.selected {
    border-color: {{ section.settings.primary_color }};
    background: {{ section.settings.option_selected_bg }};
  }

  .size-option input {
    position: absolute;
    opacity: 0;
  }

  .size-name {
    font-size: 0.813rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--vuexy-heading-color, #5e5873);
    display: block;
  }

  .size-dim {
    font-size: 0.6875rem;
    color: var(--vuexy-muted-color, #b9b9c3);
    display: block;
    margin-top: 0.125rem;
  }

  .size-price {
    font-size: 0.75rem;
    color: {{ section.settings.primary_color }};
    font-weight: 600;
    display: block;
    margin-top: 0.25rem;
  }
</style>

<div class="upload-design-section">
  {% for block in section.blocks %}
    {% case block.type %}
      {% when 'upload_step' %}
        <div class="upload-step" {{ block.shopify_attributes }}>
          <div class="upload-step-header">
            <div class="step-number">{{ block.settings.step_number }}</div>
            <div class="step-title">{{ block.settings.title }}</div>
          </div>
          <div class="upload-dropzone" onclick="document.getElementById('design-upload').click()">
            <i class="ti ti-{{ block.settings.icon }} dropzone-icon"></i>
            <div class="dropzone-text">{{ block.settings.main_text }}</div>
            <div class="dropzone-hint">{{ block.settings.hint_text }} <a href="#">{{ block.settings.link_text }}</a></div>
          </div>
          <input type="file" id="design-upload" accept=".png,.jpg,.jpeg,.svg,.pdf" style="display:none;">
        </div>

      {% when 'position_step' %}
        <div class="upload-step" {{ block.shopify_attributes }}>
          <div class="upload-step-header">
            <div class="step-number">{{ block.settings.step_number }}</div>
            <div class="step-title">{{ block.settings.title }}</div>
          </div>
          <div class="position-options">
            {% if block.settings.pos_1_label != blank %}
              <label class="position-option selected">
                <input type="radio" name="position" value="front-center" checked>
                <i class="ti ti-{{ block.settings.pos_1_icon }}"></i>
                <span>{{ block.settings.pos_1_label }}</span>
              </label>
            {% endif %}
            {% if block.settings.pos_2_label != blank %}
              <label class="position-option">
                <input type="radio" name="position" value="back-center">
                <i class="ti ti-{{ block.settings.pos_2_icon }}"></i>
                <span>{{ block.settings.pos_2_label }}</span>
              </label>
            {% endif %}
            {% if block.settings.pos_3_label != blank %}
              <label class="position-option">
                <input type="radio" name="position" value="left-chest">
                <i class="ti ti-{{ block.settings.pos_3_icon }}"></i>
                <span>{{ block.settings.pos_3_label }}</span>
              </label>
            {% endif %}
            {% if block.settings.pos_4_label != blank %}
              <label class="position-option">
                <input type="radio" name="position" value="sleeve">
                <i class="ti ti-{{ block.settings.pos_4_icon }}"></i>
                <span>{{ block.settings.pos_4_label }}</span>
              </label>
            {% endif %}
          </div>
        </div>

      {% when 'size_step' %}
        <div class="upload-step" {{ block.shopify_attributes }}>
          <div class="upload-step-header">
            <div class="step-number">{{ block.settings.step_number }}</div>
            <div class="step-title">{{ block.settings.title }}</div>
          </div>
          <div class="size-options">
            {% if block.settings.size_1_name != blank %}
              <label class="size-option selected">
                <input type="radio" name="size" value="small" checked>
                <span class="size-name">{{ block.settings.size_1_name }}</span>
                <span class="size-dim">{{ block.settings.size_1_dim }}</span>
                <span class="size-price">{{ block.settings.size_1_price }}</span>
              </label>
            {% endif %}
            {% if block.settings.size_2_name != blank %}
              <label class="size-option">
                <input type="radio" name="size" value="medium">
                <span class="size-name">{{ block.settings.size_2_name }}</span>
                <span class="size-dim">{{ block.settings.size_2_dim }}</span>
                <span class="size-price">{{ block.settings.size_2_price }}</span>
              </label>
            {% endif %}
            {% if block.settings.size_3_name != blank %}
              <label class="size-option">
                <input type="radio" name="size" value="large">
                <span class="size-name">{{ block.settings.size_3_name }}</span>
                <span class="size-dim">{{ block.settings.size_3_dim }}</span>
                <span class="size-price">{{ block.settings.size_3_price }}</span>
              </label>
            {% endif %}
            {% if block.settings.size_4_name != blank %}
              <label class="size-option">
                <input type="radio" name="size" value="xlarge">
                <span class="size-name">{{ block.settings.size_4_name }}</span>
                <span class="size-dim">{{ block.settings.size_4_dim }}</span>
                <span class="size-price">{{ block.settings.size_4_price }}</span>
              </label>
            {% endif %}
          </div>
        </div>

    {% endcase %}
  {% endfor %}
</div>

<script>
document.querySelectorAll('.position-option, .size-option').forEach(opt => {
  opt.addEventListener('click', function() {
    const group = this.closest('.position-options, .size-options');
    group.querySelectorAll('.position-option, .size-option').forEach(o => o.classList.remove('selected'));
    this.classList.add('selected');
  });
});
</script>

{% schema %}
{
  "name": "Upload Design",
  "tag": "section",
  "settings": [
    {
      "type": "header",
      "content": "Colors"
    },
    {
      "type": "color",
      "id": "bg_color",
      "label": "Background",
      "default": "#ffffff"
    },
    {
```

```liquid
<!-- Product Add to Cart Section -->
<style>
  .add-to-cart-section {
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }

  .quantity-row {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 1rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }

  .quantity-label {
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    font-weight: 500;
    color: var(--vuexy-body-color, #6e6b7b);
  }

  .quantity-selector {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    background: {{ section.settings.qty_bg }};
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md, 0.428rem);
    border: 1px solid {{ section.settings.border_color }};
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .qty-btn {
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
    background: transparent;
    border: none;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    color: var(--vuexy-body-color, #6e6b7b);
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
  }

  .qty-btn:hover {
    background: {{ section.settings.qty_hover_bg }};
    color: {{ section.settings.primary_color }};
  }

  .qty-input {
    width: 60px;
    height: 40px;
    border: none;
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 1rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--vuexy-heading-color, #5e5873);
    background: transparent;
  }

  .qty-input:focus {
    outline: none;
  }

  .main-cart-btn {
    width: 100%;
    padding: {{ section.settings.btn_padding }};
    background: {{ section.settings.btn_bg }};
    color: {{ section.settings.btn_color }};
    border: none;
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md, 0.428rem);
    font-size: {{ section.settings.btn_font_size }};
    font-weight: 600;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 0.75rem;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
    box-shadow: {{ section.settings.btn_shadow }};
  }

  .main-cart-btn:hover {
    background: {{ section.settings.btn_hover_bg }};
    transform: translateY(-2px);
    box-shadow: {{ section.settings.btn_hover_shadow }};
  }

  .main-cart-btn i {
    font-size: 1.25rem;
  }

  .btn-price {
    margin-left: auto;
    background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
    padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-pill, 1.5rem);
    font-size: 0.875rem;
  }

  @keyframes vibrate {
    0%, 100% { transform: translateX(0); }
    10%, 30%, 50%, 70%, 90% { transform: translateX(-2px); }
    20%, 40%, 60%, 80% { transform: translateX(2px); }
  }

  .main-cart-btn.vibrating {
    animation: vibrate 0.5s ease;
  }

  .secondary-actions {
    display: flex;
    gap: 0.75rem;
    margin-top: 0.75rem;
  }

  .secondary-btn {
    flex: 1;
    padding: 0.75rem 1rem;
    background: {{ section.settings.secondary_bg }};
    color: {{ section.settings.secondary_color }};
    border: 1px solid {{ section.settings.secondary_border }};
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md, 0.428rem);
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    font-weight: 500;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
  }

  .secondary-btn:hover {
    background: {{ section.settings.secondary_hover_bg }};
    border-color: {{ section.settings.primary_color }};
    color: {{ section.settings.primary_color }};
  }

  .payment-methods {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 1rem;
    margin-top: 1rem;
    padding-top: 1rem;
    border-top: 1px solid {{ section.settings.border_color }};
  }

  .payment-label {
    font-size: 0.75rem;
    color: var(--vuexy-muted-color, #b9b9c3);
  }

  .payment-icons {
    display: flex;
    gap: 0.5rem;
  }

  .payment-icon {
    width: 40px;
    height: 24px;
    background: {{ section.settings.payment_bg }};
    border-radius: 4px;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    font-size: 0.625rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--vuexy-body-color, #6e6b7b);
    border: 1px solid {{ section.settings.border_color }};
  }

  .urgency-bar {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    padding: 0.75rem 1rem;
    background: {{ section.settings.urgency_bg }};
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md, 0.428rem);
    margin-top: 0.75rem;
    font-size: 0.813rem;
  }

  .urgency-bar i {
    color: {{ section.settings.urgency_color }};
    font-size: 1rem;
  }

  .urgency-text {
    color: {{ section.settings.urgency_color }};
    font-weight: 500;
  }

  .urgency-timer {
    margin-left: auto;
    font-weight: 700;
    color: var(--vuexy-heading-color, #5e5873);
  }
</style>

<div class="add-to-cart-section">
  {% if section.settings.show_quantity %}
    <div class="quantity-row">
      <span class="quantity-label">{{ section.settings.qty_label }}</span>
      <div class="quantity-selector">
        <button type="button" class="qty-btn" onclick="updateQty(-1)">
          <i class="ti ti-minus"></i>
        </button>
        <input type="number" class="qty-input" value="1" min="1" id="qty-input">
        <button type="button" class="qty-btn" onclick="updateQty(1)">
          <i class="ti ti-plus"></i>
        </button>
      </div>
    </div>
  {% endif %}

  <button type="button" class="main-cart-btn" id="main-cart-btn">
    <i class="ti ti-{{ section.settings.btn_icon }}"></i>
    <span>{{ section.settings.btn_text }}</span>
    {% if section.settings.show_price_on_btn %}
      <span class="btn-price">{{ section.settings.btn_price }}</span>
    {% endif %}
  </button>

  {% if section.settings.show_secondary_actions %}
    <div class="secondary-actions">
      {% if section.settings.show_wishlist %}
        <button type="button" class="secondary-btn">
          <i class="ti ti-heart"></i>
          {{ section.settings.wishlist_text }}
        </button>
      {% endif %}
      {% if section.settings.show_compare %}
        <button type="button" class="secondary-btn">
          <i class="ti ti-git-compare"></i>
          {{ section.settings.compare_text }}
        </button>
      {% endif %}
      {% if section.settings.show_share %}
        <button type="button" class="secondary-btn">
          <i class="ti ti-share"></i>
          {{ section.settings.share_text }}
        </button>
      {% endif %}
    </div>
  {% endif %}

  {% if section.settings.show_urgency %}
    <div class="urgency-bar">
      <i class="ti ti-{{ section.settings.urgency_icon }}"></i>
      <span class="urgency-text">{{ section.settings.urgency_text }}</span>
      <span class="urgency-timer" id="urgency-timer">{{ section.settings.urgency_time }}</span>
    </div>
  {% endif %}

  {% if section.settings.show_payment_methods %}
    <div class="payment-methods">
      <span class="payment-label">{{ section.settings.payment_label }}</span>
      <div class="payment-icons">
        {% for block in section.blocks %}
          {% if block.type == 'payment_icon' %}
            <div class="payment-icon" {{ block.shopify_attributes }}>{{ block.settings.text }}</div>
          {% endif %}
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
    </div>
  {% endif %}
</div>

<script>
function updateQty(change) {
  const input = document.getElementById('qty-input');
  let val = parseInt(input.value) + change;
  if (val < 1) val = 1;
  input.value = val;
}

// Vibrating button
{% if section.settings.enable_vibration %}
setInterval(() => {
  const btn = document.getElementById('main-cart-btn');
  if (btn) {
    btn.classList.add('vibrating');
    setTimeout(() => btn.classList.remove('vibrating'), 500);
  }
}, {{ section.settings.vibration_interval }});
{% endif %}
</script>
```

```liquid
<!-- Product Press/Application Instructions Section -->
<style>
  .press-info-section {
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }

  .press-info-card {
    background: {{ section.settings.bg_color }};
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg, 0.5rem);
    padding: 1.25rem;
    border: 1px solid {{ section.settings.border_color }};
  }

  .press-header {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.75rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }

  .press-icon {
    width: 40px;
    height: 40px;
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md, 0.428rem);
    background: {{ section.settings.icon_bg }};
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
  }

  .press-icon i {
    font-size: 1.25rem;
    color: {{ section.settings.icon_color }};
  }

  .press-title {
    font-size: 1rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--vuexy-heading-color, #5e5873);
  }

  .press-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(120px, 1fr));
    gap: 0.75rem;
  }

  .press-item {
    background: {{ section.settings.item_bg }};
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md, 0.428rem);
    padding: 1rem;
    text-align: center;
    border: 1px solid {{ section.settings.item_border }};
  }

  .press-item-icon {
    width: 36px;
    height: 36px;
    margin: 0 auto 0.5rem;
    background: {{ section.settings.item_icon_bg }};
    border-radius: 50%;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
  }

  .press-item-icon i {
    font-size: 1rem;
    color: {{ section.settings.item_icon_color }};
  }

  .press-item-label {
    font-size: 0.6875rem;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    color: var(--vuexy-muted-color, #b9b9c3);
    margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
  }

  .press-item-value {
    font-size: 0.9375rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    color: var(--vuexy-heading-color, #5e5873);
  }

  .instructions-list {
    margin-top: 1rem;
    padding-top: 1rem;
    border-top: 1px dashed {{ section.settings.border_color }};
  }

  .instructions-title {
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--vuexy-heading-color, #5e5873);
    margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
  }

  .instructions-title i {
    color: {{ section.settings.icon_color }};
  }

  .instruction-step {
    display: flex;
    align-items: flex-start;
    gap: 0.75rem;
    margin-bottom: 0.625rem;
    font-size: 0.8125rem;
    color: var(--vuexy-body-color, #6e6b7b);
  }

  .step-num {
    width: 20px;
    height: 20px;
    background: {{ section.settings.step_bg }};
    color: {{ section.settings.step_color }};
    border-radius: 50%;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    font-size: 0.6875rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    flex-shrink: 0;
  }

  .warning-box {
    background: {{ section.settings.warning_bg }};
    border-left: 3px solid {{ section.settings.warning_border }};
    padding: 0.75rem 1rem;
    margin-top: 1rem;
    border-radius: 0 var(--vuexy-radius-md, 0.428rem) var(--vuexy-radius-md, 0.428rem) 0;
    font-size: 0.8125rem;
    color: var(--vuexy-body-color, #6e6b7b);
    display: flex;
    align-items: flex-start;
    gap: 0.5rem;
  }

  .warning-box i {
    color: {{ section.settings.warning_icon }};
    font-size: 1rem;
    flex-shrink: 0;
  }
</style>

<div class="press-info-section">
  <div class="press-info-card">
    <div class="press-header">
      <div class="press-icon">
        <i class="ti ti-{{ section.settings.main_icon }}"></i>
      </div>
      <h4 class="press-title">{{ section.settings.title }}</h4>
    </div>

    <div class="press-grid">
      {% for block in section.blocks %}
        {% if block.type == 'spec_item' %}
          <div class="press-item" {{ block.shopify_attributes }}>
            <div class="press-item-icon">
              <i class="ti ti-{{ block.settings.icon }}"></i>
            </div>
            <div class="press-item-label">{{ block.settings.label }}</div>
            <div class="press-item-value">{{ block.settings.value }}</div>
          </div>
        {% endif %}
      {% endfor %}
    </div>

    {% if section.settings.show_instructions %}
      <div class="instructions-list">
        <div class="instructions-title">
          <i class="ti ti-list-check"></i>
          {{ section.settings.instructions_title }}
        </div>
        {% if section.settings.step_1 != blank %}
          <div class="instruction-step">
            <span class="step-num">1</span>
            <span>{{ section.settings.step_1 }}</span>
          </div>
        {% endif %}
        {% if section.settings.step_2 != blank %}
          <div class="instruction-step">
            <span class="step-num">2</span>
            <span>{{ section.settings.step_2 }}</span>
          </div>
        {% endif %}
        {% if section.settings.step_3 != blank %}
          <div class="instruction-step">
            <span class="step-num">3</span>
            <span>{{ section.settings.step_3 }}</span>
          </div>
        {% endif %}
        {% if section.settings.step_4 != blank %}
          <div class="instruction-step">
            <span class="step-num">4</span>
            <span>{{ section.settings.step_4 }}</span>
          </div>
        {% endif %}
        {% if section.settings.step_5 != blank %}
          <div class="instruction-step">
            <span class="step-num">5</span>
            <span>{{ section.settings.step_5 }}</span>
          </div>
        {% endif %}
      </div>
    {% endif %}

    {% if section.settings.warning_text != blank %}
      <div class="warning-box">
        <i class="ti ti-alert-triangle"></i>
        <span>{{ section.settings.warning_text }}</span>
      </div>
    {% endif %}
  </div>
</div>
```

```liquid
  .pickup-icon i {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    color: {{ section.settings.pickup_icon_color }};
  }

  .pickup-content {
    flex: 1;
  }

  .pickup-title {
    font-size: 0.9375rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--vuexy-heading-color, #5e5873);
    margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
  }

  .pickup-details {
    font-size: 0.813rem;
    color: var(--vuexy-muted-color, #b9b9c3);
  }

  .pickup-details strong {
    color: {{ section.settings.pickup_highlight }};
  }

  .pickup-badge {
    background: {{ section.settings.pickup_badge_bg }};
    color: {{ section.settings.pickup_badge_color }};
    padding: 0.375rem 0.75rem;
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-pill, 1.5rem);
    font-size: 0.75rem;
    font-weight: 600;
  }
</style>

<div class="delivery-section">
  {% for block in section.blocks %}
    {% case block.type %}
      {% when 'delivery' %}
        <div class="delivery-card" {{ block.shopify_attributes }}>
          <div class="delivery-card-header">
            <div class="delivery-icon">
              <i class="ti ti-{{ block.settings.icon }}"></i>
            </div>
            <div class="delivery-info">
              <div class="delivery-label">{{ block.settings.label }}</div>
              <div class="delivery-value">
                {{ block.settings.text_before }}
                <span class="highlight">{{ block.settings.highlight_text }}</span>
                {{ block.settings.text_after }}
              </div>
            </div>
            {% if block.settings.action_text != blank %}
              <a href="{{ block.settings.action_link }}" class="delivery-action">{{ block.settings.action_text }}</a>
            {% endif %}
          </div>
        </div>

      {% when 'pickup' %}
        <div class="pickup-card" {{ block.shopify_attributes }}>
          <div class="pickup-icon">
            <i class="ti ti-{{ block.settings.icon }}"></i>
          </div>
          <div class="pickup-content">
            <div class="pickup-title">{{ block.settings.title }}</div>
            <div class="pickup-details">
              {{ block.settings.location }} â€¢ <strong>{{ block.settings.time }}</strong>
            </div>
          </div>
          {% if block.settings.badge_text != blank %}
            <div class="pickup-badge">{{ block.settings.badge_text }}</div>
          {% endif %}
        </div>

    {% endcase %}
  {% endfor %}
</div>
```

```liquid
        --vuexy-shadow-xs: 0 2px 4px 0 rgba(34, 41, 47, 0.08);
        --vuexy-shadow-sm: 0 4px 8px 0 rgba(34, 41, 47, 0.1);
        --vuexy-shadow-md: 0 4px 18px 0 rgba(34, 41, 47, 0.1);
        --vuexy-shadow-lg: 0 8px 25px 0 rgba(34, 41, 47, 0.12);
        --vuexy-shadow-xl: 0 12px 35px 0 rgba(34, 41, 47, 0.14);
        --vuexy-shadow-primary: 0 0 10px 0 rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.5);
        --vuexy-shadow-primary-lg: 0 4px 18px 0 rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.4);
        
        /* â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ BORDER RADIUS â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ */
        --vuexy-radius-xs: 0.25rem;
        --vuexy-radius-sm: 0.357rem;
        --vuexy-radius-md: 0.428rem;
        --vuexy-radius-lg: 0.5rem;
        --vuexy-radius-xl: 0.625rem;
        --vuexy-radius-pill: 1.5rem;
        
        /* â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ SPACING â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ */
        --vuexy-spacer: 1rem;
        --vuexy-card-spacer-y: 1.25rem;
        --vuexy-card-spacer-x: 1.25rem;
        
        /* â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ TYPOGRAPHY â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ */
        --vuexy-font-family: 'Montserrat', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif;
        --vuexy-font-size-base: 1rem;
        --vuexy-font-size-sm: 0.857rem;
        --vuexy-font-size-lg: 1.143rem;
        --vuexy-font-weight-normal: 400;
        --vuexy-font-weight-medium: 500;
        --vuexy-font-weight-semibold: 600;
        --vuexy-font-weight-bold: 700;
        --vuexy-line-height-base: 1.45;
        
        /* â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ TRANSITIONS â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€ */
        --vuexy-transition-base: all 0.25s ease;
        --vuexy-transition-fast: all 0.15s ease;
        --vuexy-transition-slow: all 0.35s ease;
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY GLOBAL STYLES
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      *, *::before, *::after {
        box-sizing: border-box;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }

      body {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-base);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-normal);
        line-height: var(--vuexy-line-height-base);
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        background-color: var(--vuexy-body-bg);
        min-height: 100vh;
        -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
        -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
        text-rendering: optimizeLegibility;
      }

      /* Vuexy Typography */
      h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, .heading {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        line-height: 1.2;
        margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
      }

      h1 { font-size: 2rem; }
      h2 { font-size: 1.714rem; }
      h3 { font-size: 1.5rem; }
      h4 { font-size: 1.286rem; }
      h5 { font-size: 1.07rem; }
      h6 { font-size: 1rem; }

      p {
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
      }

      a {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        text-decoration: none;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-fast);
      }

      a:hover {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary-dark);
      }

      .mono {
        font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', 'SFMono-Regular', Consolas, monospace;
      }

      /* Vuexy Selection */
      ::selection {
        background-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        color: #fff;
      }

      /* Vuexy Scrollbar */
      ::-webkit-scrollbar {
        width: 8px;
        height: 8px;
      }
      ::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
        background: var(--vuexy-body-bg);
      }
      ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
        background: var(--vuexy-border-color);
        border-radius: 4px;
      }
      ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
        background: var(--vuexy-border-dark);
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY TOP BANNER
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .promo-banner {
        background: var(--vuexy-dark-bg);
        padding: 10px 0;
        color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-sm);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
      }

      .promo-banner .container {
        display: flex !important;
      }

      .promo-banner .promo-item {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 8px;
        padding: 0 1rem;
        border-right: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.15);
      }

      .promo-banner .promo-item:last-child {
        border-right: none;
      }

      .promo-banner .promo-item i {
        font-size: 1.125rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary-light);
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY NAVBAR
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .main-navbar {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-sm);
        position: sticky;
        top: 0;
        z-index: 1000;
        border-bottom: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .navbar-brand-logo {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-bold);
        font-size: 1.5rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        text-decoration: none;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
      }

      .navbar-brand-logo .logo-icon {
        width: 32px;
        height: 22px;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
      }

      .navbar-brand-logo span {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
      }

      .nav-category {
        display: flex;
        gap: 0.25rem;
        list-style: none;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }

      .nav-category a {
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        text-decoration: none;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-fast);
        padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out;
        font-size: 0.9375rem;
      }

      .nav-category a:hover {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary-dark);
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-light);
      }

      .nav-search {
        position: relative;
      }

      .nav-search input {
        padding: 0.5rem 1rem 0.5rem 2.5rem;
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        font-size: 0.9375rem;
        min-width: 220px;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        transition: all 0.2s;
      }

      .nav-search input:focus {
        outline: none;
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(122, 143, 166, 0.15);
        background: white;
      }

      .nav-search i {
        position: absolute;
        left: 0.875rem;
        top: 50%;
        transform: translateY(-50%);
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      /* ========== BREADCRUMB ========== */
      .breadcrumb-section {
        padding: 1rem 0;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        border-bottom: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .breadcrumb-custom {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        font-size: 0.875rem;
      }

      .breadcrumb-custom a {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        text-decoration: none;
        transition: color 0.2s;
      }

      .breadcrumb-custom a:hover {
        text-decoration: underline;
      }

      .breadcrumb-custom span {
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      /* ========== INSTAGRAM STORY STYLE CATEGORIES ========== */
      .category-story-section {
        padding: 1rem 0;
        background: var(--vuexy-body-bg);
        overflow: hidden;
      }
      
      .story-scroll-container {
        display: flex;
        gap: 1.25rem;
        overflow-x: auto;
        padding: 0.6rem 1rem;
        scrollbar-width: none;
        -ms-overflow-style: none;
        justify-content: center;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        margin: 0 1rem;
        position: relative;
        border: 1px solid transparent;
        background-clip: padding-box;
      }
      
      .story-scroll-container::before {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        inset: 0;
        border-radius: inherit;
        padding: 1px;
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.4), rgba(0, 207, 232, 0.3), rgba(40, 199, 111, 0.4), rgba(255, 159, 67, 0.3), rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.4));
        -webkit-mask: linear-gradient(#fff 0 0) content-box, linear-gradient(#fff 0 0);
        -webkit-mask-composite: xor;
        mask-composite: exclude;
        pointer-events: none;
      }
      
      .story-scroll-container::-webkit-scrollbar {
        display: none;
      }
      
      .story-item {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        cursor: pointer;
        min-width: 72px;
        transition: transform 0.2s ease;
      }
      
      .story-item:hover {
        transform: scale(1.05);
      }
      
      .story-ring {
        width: 64px;
        height: 64px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        padding: 3px;
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #d8d8d8, #a0a0a0);
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
      }
      
      .story-item.active .story-ring {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
        box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.4);
      }
      
      .story-item:not(.active):hover .story-ring {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--vuexy-primary-light), var(--vuexy-primary));
      }
      
      .story-avatar {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        border-radius: 50%;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        font-size: 1.5rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
      }
      
      .story-item.active .story-avatar {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter);
      }
      
      .story-item:not(.active):hover .story-avatar {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
      }
      
      .story-label {
        font-size: 0.7rem;
        font-weight: 500;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        text-align: center;
        white-space: nowrap;
        max-width: 72px;
        overflow: hidden;
        text-overflow: ellipsis;
        transition: color 0.2s;
      }
      
      .story-item.active .story-label {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        font-weight: 600;
      }
      
      .story-item:not(.active):hover .story-label {
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
      }
      
      /* Active story expanding effect */
      .story-item.active::after {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        bottom: -8px;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
        width: 6px;
        height: 6px;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary);
        border-radius: 50%;
      }
      
      .story-item {
        position: relative;
      }

      /* ========== REVIEW VIDEO STORIES ========== */
      .review-stories-section {
        margin-top: 1rem;
        padding: 1rem;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border-radius: 12px;
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }
      
      .review-stories-header {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
      }
      
      .review-stories-header i {
        color: #ea5455;
        font-size: 1.1rem;
      }
      
      .review-stories-header span {
        font-size: 0.85rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
      }
      
      .review-stories-header .count {
        color: #ea5455;
        font-weight: 700;
      }
      
      .review-stories-scroll {
        display: flex;
        gap: 0.75rem;
        overflow-x: auto;
        padding: 0.25rem 0;
        scrollbar-width: none;
        -ms-overflow-style: none;
      }
      
      .review-stories-scroll::-webkit-scrollbar {
        display: none;
      }
      
      .review-story-item {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.35rem;
        cursor: pointer;
        min-width: 56px;
        transition: transform 0.2s ease;
      }
      
      .review-story-item:hover {
        transform: scale(1.05);
      }
      
      .review-story-ring {
        transition: transform 0.2s ease, box-shadow 0.2s ease;
      }
      
      .review-story-ring {
        width: 52px;
        height: 52px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        padding: 3px;
        background: linear-gradient(45deg, #feda75, #fa7e1e, #d62976, #962fbf, #4f5bd5);
        position: relative;
      }
      
      .review-story-item:hover .review-story-ring {
        transform: scale(1.05);
        box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(214, 41, 118, 0.5);
      }
      
      .review-story-avatar {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        border-radius: 50%;
        background: var(--vuexy-body-bg);
        padding: 2px;
        overflow: hidden;
      }
      
      .review-story-avatar img {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        border-radius: 50%;
        object-fit: cover;
      }
      
      .review-story-name {
        font-size: 0.65rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        text-align: center;
        white-space: nowrap;
        max-width: 56px;
        overflow: hidden;
        text-overflow: ellipsis;
      }
      
      /* ========== MINI VIDEO REVIEWS BAR ========== */
      .mini-video-reviews {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.75rem;
        margin-top: 0.25rem;
        margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        padding: 0.25rem 0;
      }
      
      .mini-video-reviews-inline {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.2rem;
        margin-left: 0.5rem;
        padding-left: 0.5rem;
        border-left: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }
      
      .mini-video-reviews-inline .mini-story {
        width: 26px;
        height: 26px;
      }
      
      .mini-video-reviews-inline .mini-video-label {
        font-size: 0.65rem;
        margin-left: 0.25rem;
      }

      /* ========== PRICE ALERT BOX ========== */
      .price-alert-box {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border: 1px solid rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.2);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
        overflow: hidden;
        position: relative;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.08);
      }
      
      .price-alert-header {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.1), rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.05));
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        padding: 0.4rem 0.75rem;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.4rem;
        font-size: 0.7rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: 0.5px;
        border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.1);
      }
      
      .price-alert-header i {
        font-size: 0.85rem;
        color: #ff9f43;
      }
      
      .price-alert-content {
        padding: 0.75rem;
      }
      
      .quick-qty-label {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.3rem;
        font-weight: 500;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        font-size: 0.65rem;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: 0.3px;
        opacity: 0.7;
        margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
      }
      
      .quick-qty-label i {
        font-size: 0.75rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        opacity: 0.6;
      }
      
      .quick-qty-controls {
        display: inline-flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0;
        background: rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.04);
        border-radius: 50px;
        padding: 0.15rem;
        border: 1px solid rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.1);
      }
      
      .quick-qty-btn {
        width: 26px;
        height: 26px;
        border: none;
        background: transparent;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        border-radius: 50%;
        font-size: 0.9rem;
        font-weight: 400;
        cursor: pointer;
        transition: all 0.2s;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        opacity: 0.6;
      }
      
      .quick-qty-btn:hover {
        background: rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.15);
        opacity: 1;
      }
      
      .quick-qty-input {
        width: 40px;
        text-align: center;
        border: none;
        background: transparent;
        font-size: 0.9rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        padding: 0.15rem;
      }
      
      .quick-qty-input:focus {
        outline: none;
      }
      
      .quick-price-wrapper {
        display: flex;
        align-items: baseline;
        gap: 0.4rem;
        margin-top: 0.35rem;
        position: relative;
      }
      
      .quick-price {
        font-size: 1.75rem;
        font-weight: 700;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        line-height: 1;
      }
      
      .old-price {
        font-size: 0.9rem;
        color: #ff9f43;
        text-decoration: line-through;
        font-weight: 600;
        position: relative;
        top: 0;
      }
      
      .discount-badge {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff9f43, #ff6b35);
        color: white;
        font-size: 0.6rem;
        font-weight: 700;
        padding: 0.15rem 0.35rem;
        border-radius: 20px;
        position: relative;
        top: 0;
      }
      
      .view-campaigns-btn {
        display: inline-flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        gap: 0.35rem;
        margin-top: 0.5rem;
        padding: 0.35rem 0.75rem;
        background: transparent;
        border: none;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        font-size: 0.7rem;
        font-weight: 500;
        cursor: pointer;
        transition: all 0.2s ease;
        opacity: 0.7;
      }
      
      .view-campaigns-btn:hover {
        opacity: 1;
        text-decoration: underline;
      }
      
      .view-campaigns-btn i {
        font-size: 0.85rem;
      }

      /* ========== FLOATING CART BUTTON ========== */
      .floating-cart-container {
        position: fixed;
        top: 200px;
        right: 30px;
        z-index: 9999;
        opacity: 1;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
      }
      
      .floating-cart-container.hidden {
        opacity: 0;
        transform: translateX(100px);
        pointer-events: none;
      }
      
      .floating-cart-btn {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.6rem;
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--vuexy-primary), var(--vuexy-primary-dark));
        color: white;
        border: none;
        border-radius: 50px;
        padding: 0.75rem 1.25rem;
        font-size: 0.85rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        cursor: pointer;
        box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.4);
        transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
      }
      
      .floating-cart-btn:hover {
        transform: scale(1.05);
        box-shadow: 0 12px 35px rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.5);
      }
      
      .floating-cart-icon {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        width: 26px;
        height: 26px;
        background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);

      @keyframes truckDrive {
        0%, 70%, 100% { transform: translateX(0); }
        75% { transform: translateX(4px); }
        80% { transform: translateX(-2px); }
        85% { transform: translateX(3px); }
```
