      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY BADGES
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .cloudy-badge, .badge {
        display: inline-flex;
        align-items: center;
        padding: 0.4em 0.7em;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-sm);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-sm);
        line-height: 1;
      }

      .badge-primary {
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.12);
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
      }

      .badge-success {
        background: var(--vuexy-success-light);
        color: var(--vuexy-success);
      }

      .badge-warning {
        background: var(--vuexy-warning-light);
        color: #c9a227;
      }

      .badge-info {
        background: var(--vuexy-info-light);
        color: var(--vuexy-info);
      }

      .badge-danger {
        background: var(--vuexy-danger-light);
        color: var(--vuexy-danger);
      }

      /* ========== RATING ========== */
      .rating-section {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.625rem;
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
        padding: 0.6rem 0.8rem;
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.03), rgba(40, 199, 111, 0.03));
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        border: 1px solid transparent;
        background-clip: padding-box;
        position: relative;
      }
      
      .rating-section::before {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        inset: 0;
        border-radius: inherit;
        padding: 1px;
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(255, 186, 0, 0.5), rgba(40, 199, 111, 0.4), rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.3));
        -webkit-mask: linear-gradient(#fff 0 0) content-box, linear-gradient(#fff 0 0);
        -webkit-mask-composite: xor;
        mask-composite: exclude;
        pointer-events: none;
      }

      .rating-stars {
        color: var(--vuexy-warning) !important;
        display: flex;
        gap: 2px;
      }

      .rating-stars i {
        color: var(--vuexy-warning) !important;
        font-size: 1rem;
      }

      .rating-count {
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-sm);
      }

      .rating-count a {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        text-decoration: none;
      }

      /* ========== PRODUCT TITLE ========== */
      .product-category {
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: 0.5px;
        margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
      }

      .product-title {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: 1.75rem;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-semibold);
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
        line-height: 1.3;
      }

      .product-description {
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-base);
        line-height: 1.7;
        margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY DELIVERY CARD
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .delivery-card {
        background: var(--vuexy-success-light);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        padding: 1rem 1.25rem;
        margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        border: 1px solid rgba(40, 199, 111, 0.15);
      }

      .delivery-title {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-semibold);
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
      }

      .delivery-title i {
        color: var(--vuexy-success);
        font-size: 1.25rem;
      }

      .delivery-time {
        color: var(--vuexy-success);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-bold);
      }

      .delivery-location {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-sm);
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.25rem;
        margin-top: 0.5rem;
      }

      .delivery-location i {
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY CARD STYLES
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .vuexy-card, .step-card {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border: none;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-md);
        padding: var(--vuexy-card-spacer-y) var(--vuexy-card-spacer-x);
        margin-bottom: var(--vuexy-spacer);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
        position: relative;
      }

      .step-card:hover {
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-lg);
        transform: translateY(-2px);
      }

      .step-card::before {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        left: 0;
        top: 0;
        bottom: 0;
        width: 4px;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg) 0 0 var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        opacity: 0;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-fast);
      }

      .step-card:hover::before {
        opacity: 1;
      }

      .step-header {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-semibold);
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        margin-bottom: 1.25rem;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.875rem;
        font-size: 1.07rem;
      }

      .step-number {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
        color: white;
        width: 34px;
        height: 34px;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        font-size: 0.9rem;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-semibold);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-primary-lg);
        box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(122, 143, 166, 0.3);
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY UPLOAD AREA
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .upload-area {
        border: 2px dashed var(--vuexy-border-color);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        padding: 0.875rem 1rem;
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.04);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
        cursor: pointer;
      }

      .upload-area:hover {
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.08);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-sm);
      }

      .upload-icon {
        font-size: 2rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        opacity: 0.7;
        line-height: 1;
      }

      .upload-text {
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-semibold);
        margin-bottom: 0.125rem;
        font-size: 0.875rem;
      }

      .upload-subtext {
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: 0.7rem;
        margin-bottom: 0;
      }

      .upload-btn {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
        color: white;
        border: none;
        padding: 0.5rem 1.25rem;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        font-size: 0.8rem;
        margin-top: 0;
        cursor: pointer;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-primary-lg);
      }

      .upload-btn:hover {
        box-shadow: 0 0 12px 0 rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.5);
        transform: translateY(-1px);
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY SIZE INPUTS
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .size-inputs {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: 1fr auto 1fr 1fr;
        gap: 1rem;
        align-items: end;
      }

      .size-input-group label {
        display: block;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: 0.75rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        letter-spacing: 0.6px;
      }

      .size-input-group input {
        width: 100%;
        padding: 0.625rem 0.875rem;
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-input-border);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-base);
        text-align: center;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-fast);
        background: var(--vuexy-input-bg);
      }

      .size-input-group input:focus {
        outline: none;
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        box-shadow: 0 3px 10px 0 rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.1);
      }

      .size-multiply {
        font-size: 1.25rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        padding-bottom: 0.625rem;
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY QUANTITY CONTROL
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .quantity-control {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-input-border);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        overflow: hidden;
        background: var(--vuexy-input-bg);
      }

      .quantity-control button {
        width: 40px;
        height: 40px;
        border: none;
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.08);
        cursor: pointer;
        font-size: 1.125rem;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-fast);
      }

      .quantity-control button:hover {
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.15);
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
      }

      .quantity-control input {
        width: 55px;
        text-align: center;
        border: none;
        border-left: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        border-right: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-base);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        background: var(--vuexy-input-bg);
      }

      .price-display {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: 1.75rem;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-bold);
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        text-align: right;
        padding-bottom: 0.25rem;
      }

      /* ========== PRICING TABLE ========== */
      .pricing-section {
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
      }

      .pricing-header {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: space-between;
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
      }

      .pricing-title {
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-success);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        font-size: 1rem;
      }

      .pricing-title i {
        font-size: 1.25rem;
      }

      .pricing-table {
        width: 100%;
        border-collapse: separate;
        border-spacing: 0;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        overflow: hidden;
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .pricing-table th {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--vuexy-primary), var(--vuexy-primary-dark));
        color: white;
        padding: 0.875rem 1rem;
        font-weight: 500;
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
        text-align: center;
      }

      .pricing-table td {
        padding: 0.875rem 1rem;
        text-align: center;
        border-bottom: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        font-size: 0.875rem;
      }

      .pricing-table tr:last-child td {
        border-bottom: none;
      }

      .pricing-table tbody tr {
        transition: background 0.15s;
      }

      .pricing-table tbody tr:hover {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter);
      }

      .price-original {
        text-decoration: line-through;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
        margin-right: 0.25rem;
      }

      .price-sale {
        color: var(--vuexy-success);
        font-weight: 600;
      }

      .discount-badge {
        background: var(--vuexy-warning-light);
        color: #c9a227;
        font-size: 0.6875rem;
        padding: 0.2em 0.5em;
        border-radius: 4px;
        font-weight: 600;
        margin-left: 0.25rem;
      }

      /* ========== BULK DISCOUNT ========== */
      .bulk-section {
        background: var(--vuexy-info-light);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        padding: 1.25rem;
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
        border: 1px solid rgba(93, 173, 226, 0.2);
      }

      .bulk-title {
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-info);
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        font-size: 1rem;
      }

      .bulk-title i {
        font-size: 1.25rem;
      }

      .bulk-table {
        width: 100%;
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
      }

      .bulk-table th {
        text-align: left;
        padding: 0.625rem 0.5rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        font-weight: 500;
        border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(93, 173, 226, 0.2);
      }

      .bulk-table td {
        padding: 0.625rem 0.5rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
      }

      /* ========== INSTRUCTIONS ========== */
      .instructions-section {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        padding: 1.5rem;
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-md);
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .instructions-title {
        font-size: 1.25rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
      }

      .instructions-title i {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
      }

      .instruction-steps {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
        gap: 1rem;
      }

      .instruction-step {
        text-align: center;
        padding: 1.5rem 1rem;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        transition: all 0.2s;
      }

      .instruction-step:hover {
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(122, 143, 166, 0.15);
        transform: translateY(-2px);
      }

      .instruction-number {
        width: 50px;
        height: 50px;
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--vuexy-primary), var(--vuexy-primary-dark));
        color: white;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        font-size: 1.25rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        margin: 0 auto 1rem;
        box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(122, 143, 166, 0.3);
      }

      .instruction-title {
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        margin-bottom: 0.375rem;
        font-size: 0.9375rem;
      }

      .instruction-desc {
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      .instruction-time {
        font-size: 0.75rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-warning);
        font-weight: 600;
        margin-top: 0.5rem;
        display: inline-block;
        padding: 0.25em 0.5em;
        background: var(--vuexy-warning-light);
        border-radius: 4px;
      }

      /* ========== SETTINGS GRID ========== */
      .settings-grid {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(150px, 1fr));
        gap: 1rem;
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
        padding-top: 1.5rem;
        border-top: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .setting-item {
        text-align: center;
        padding: 1rem;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
      }

      .setting-label {
        font-size: 0.6875rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        text-transform: uppercase;
        margin-bottom: 0.375rem;
        letter-spacing: 0.5px;
      }

      .setting-value {
        font-weight: 700;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary-dark);
        font-size: 1.125rem;
      }

      .setting-note {
        font-size: 0.6875rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        margin-top: 0.25rem;
      }

      /* ========== REVIEWS ========== */
      .reviews-section {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        padding: 1.5rem;
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-md);
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .reviews-header {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: space-between;
        margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        gap: 1rem;
        padding-bottom: 1rem;
        border-bottom: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .reviews-title {
        font-size: 1.25rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
      }

      .reviews-title i {
        color: var(--vuexy-warning);
      }

      .reviews-summary {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 1rem;
      }

      .reviews-score {
        font-size: 2.5rem;
        font-weight: 700;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        line-height: 1;
      }

      .reviews-details {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
      }

      .reviews-stars {
        color: var(--vuexy-warning);
        display: flex;
        gap: 2px;
      }

      .reviews-count {
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      .review-bars {
        flex: 1;
        max-width: 280px;
      }

      .review-bar-item {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        margin-bottom: 0.375rem;
        font-size: 0.75rem;
      }

      .review-bar-label {
        width: 48px;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      .review-bar-track {
        flex: 1;
        height: 6px;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter);
        border-radius: 3px;
        overflow: hidden;
      }

      .review-bar-fill {
        height: 100%;
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--vuexy-warning), #f8c957);
        border-radius: 3px;
      }

      .review-bar-percent {
        width: 32px;
        text-align: right;
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        font-weight: 500;
      }

      /* ========== REVIEW CARDS ========== */
      .review-cards {

         VUEXY PRODUCT CARDS
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .product-cards {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(180px, 1fr));
        gap: 1.25rem;
      }

      .product-card {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        overflow: hidden;
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-sm);
        border: none;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
        text-decoration: none;
      }

      .product-card:hover {
        transform: translateY(-5px);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-lg);
      }

      .product-card-image {
        aspect-ratio: 1;
        background: var(--vuexy-body-bg);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        padding: 1rem;
      }

      .product-card-image img {
        max-width: 100%;
        max-height: 100%;
        object-fit: contain;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-slow);
      }

      .product-card:hover .product-card-image img {
        transform: scale(1.08);
      }

      .product-card-body {
        padding: 1rem;
        border-top: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .product-card-title {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-semibold);
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-base);
        margin-bottom: 0.375rem;
      }

      .product-card-rating {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.375rem;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-sm);
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      .product-card-rating i {
        color: var(--vuexy-warning);
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY BUTTON STYLES
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      /* Base Button */
      .btn {
        display: inline-flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        padding: 0.786rem 1.5rem;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-base);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        line-height: 1;
        text-align: center;
        white-space: nowrap;
        vertical-align: middle;
        cursor: pointer;
        user-select: none;
        border: 1px solid transparent;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
      }

      /* Primary Button - Add to Cart */
      .add-cart-btn, .btn-primary {
        width: 100%;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
        color: #fff;
        border: none;
        padding: 0.9rem 1.75rem;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        font-size: 1rem;
        letter-spacing: 0.3px;
        cursor: pointer;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        gap: 0.625rem;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-primary-lg);
        position: relative;
        overflow: hidden;
      }

      .add-cart-btn::before {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: -100%;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.25), transparent);
        transition: left 0.5s ease;
      }

      .add-cart-btn:hover {
        box-shadow: 0 0 20px 0 rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.5);
        transform: translateY(-3px);
      }

      .add-cart-btn:hover::before {
        left: 100%;
      }

      .add-cart-btn:active {
        transform: translateY(-1px);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-primary);
      }

      /* Outline Button */
      .btn-outline-primary {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        background: transparent;
      }

      .btn-outline-primary:hover {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary);
        color: #fff;
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-primary);
      }

      /* Flat Button */
      .btn-flat-primary {
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.12);
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        border: none;
      }

      .btn-flat-primary:hover {
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.2);
      }

      /* Relief Button */
      .btn-relief-primary {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary);
        color: #fff;
        box-shadow: inset 0 -3px 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
      }

      .btn-relief-primary:active {
        box-shadow: none;
        transform: translateY(3px);
      }

      .desktop-cart-btn {
        display: block;
        width: 100%;
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY POSITION SELECTOR
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .position-selector {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
        gap: 1rem;
        margin-top: 1rem;
      }

      .position-box {
        position: relative;
        aspect-ratio: 1;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border: 2px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        cursor: pointer;
        overflow: hidden;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
      }

      .position-box:hover {
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-md);
        transform: translateY(-4px);
      }

      .position-box.active {
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        border-width: 2px;
        box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.12), var(--vuexy-shadow-md);
      }

      .position-box.active::after {
        content: 'âœ“';
        position: absolute;
        top: 8px;
        right: 8px;
        width: 24px;
        height: 24px;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
        color: white;
        border-radius: 50%;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        font-size: 12px;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-bold);
        z-index: 10;
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-primary);
        animation: scaleIn 0.2s ease;
      }

      @keyframes scaleIn {
        from { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }
        to { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
      }

      .position-canvas-container {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        position: relative;
      }

      .position-canvas {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        display: block;
      }

      .position-label {
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        background: linear-gradient(transparent, rgba(40, 48, 70, 0.9));
        color: white;
        font-size: 0.75rem;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        text-align: center;
        padding: 18px 6px 10px;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: 0.8px;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
      }

      .position-coords {
        position: absolute;
        top: 8px;
        left: 8px;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary);
        color: white;
        font-size: 0.625rem;
        padding: 4px 8px;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-sm);
        font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-xs);
      }

      @media (max-width: 575px) {
        .position-selector {
          grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
        }
        .position-label {
          font-size: 0.7rem;
        }
      }

    <!-- Product Section -->
    <section class="product-section">
      <div class="container">
        <div class="row">
          <!-- Left Column - 3D Gallery -->
          <div class="col-lg-5">
            <div class="product-gallery">
              <div class="threejs-container">
                <canvas id="tshirt-canvas"></canvas>
                <button class="wishlist-btn" title="Add to wishlist">
                  <i class="ti ti-heart" style="font-size: 1.125rem;"></i>
                </button>
                <span class="position-absolute cloudy-badge badge-success" style="top: 1rem; left: 1rem; z-index: 10;">
                  <i class="ti ti-check me-1"></i>In Stock
                </span>
                <div class="loading-spinner" id="loadingSpinner">
                  <div class="spinner"></div>
                  <span class="loading-text">Loading 3D Model...</span>
                </div>
                <div class="canvas-controls">
                  <button onclick="resetCamera()" title="Reset View">
                    <i class="ti ti-refresh"></i>
                  </button>
                  <button onclick="rotateLeft()" title="Rotate Left">
                    <i class="ti ti-rotate-clockwise"></i>
                  </button>
                  <button onclick="rotateRight()" title="Rotate Right">
                    <i class="ti ti-rotate-2"></i>
                  </button>
                  <button onclick="zoomIn()" title="Zoom In">
                    <i class="ti ti-zoom-in"></i>
                  </button>
                  <button onclick="zoomOut()" title="Zoom Out">
                    <i class="ti ti-zoom-out"></i>
                  </button>
                </div>
              </div>

              <!-- Color Picker -->
              <div class="color-picker-section">
                <div class="color-picker-title">T-Shirt Color</div>
                <div class="color-options">
                  <div class="color-option" style="background: #ffffff;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#ffffff', this)" title="White"></div>
                  <div class="color-option" style="background: #1a1a1a;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#1a1a1a', this)" title="Black"></div>
                  <div class="color-option" style="background: #2d3748;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#2d3748', this)" title="Dark Gray"></div>
                  <div class="color-option" style="background: #e53e3e;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#e53e3e', this)" title="Red"></div>
                  <div class="color-option active" style="background: #3b82f6;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#3b82f6', this)" title="Blue"></div>
                  <div class="color-option" style="background: #38a169;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#38a169', this)" title="Green"></div>
                  <div class="color-option" style="background: #d69e2e;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#d69e2e', this)" title="Gold"></div>
                  <div class="color-option" style="background: #805ad5;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#805ad5', this)" title="Purple"></div>
                  <div class="color-option" style="background: #ed64a6;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#ed64a6', this)" title="Pink"></div>
                  <div class="color-option" style="background: #dd6b20;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#dd6b20', this)" title="Orange"></div>
                </div>
              </div>

            </div>
          </div>

          <!-- Right Column - Product Info -->
          <div class="col-lg-7">
            <div class="product-info">
              <!-- Rating -->
              <div class="rating-section">
                <div class="rating-stars">
                  {% for i in (1..section.settings.rating_stars) %}
                    <i class="ti ti-star-filled"></i>
                  {% endfor %}
                </div>
                <span class="rating-count"><a href="#reviews">{{ section.settings.review_count }} reviews</a></span>
                
                <!-- Mini Video Reviews - Inline -->
                <div class="mini-video-reviews-inline">
                  {% if section.settings.avatar_1 != blank %}
                    <div class="mini-story" onclick="playReviewStory(1)">
                      <img src="{{ section.settings.avatar_1 | image_url: width: 60 }}" alt="">
                    </div>
                  {% else %}
                    <div class="mini-story" onclick="playReviewStory(1)">
                      <img src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108377-be9c29b29330?w=60&h=60&fit=crop" alt="">
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
                  {% if section.settings.avatar_2 != blank %}
                    <div class="mini-story" onclick="playReviewStory(2)">
                      <img src="{{ section.settings.avatar_2 | image_url: width: 60 }}" alt="">
                    </div>
                  {% else %}
                    <div class="mini-story" onclick="playReviewStory(2)">
                      <img src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507003211169-0a1dd7228f2d?w=60&h=60&fit=crop" alt="">
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
                  {% if section.settings.avatar_3 != blank %}
                    <div class="mini-story" onclick="playReviewStory(3)">
                      <img src="{{ section.settings.avatar_3 | image_url: width: 60 }}" alt="">
                    </div>
                  {% else %}
                    <div class="mini-story" onclick="playReviewStory(3)">
                      <img src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1438761681033-6461ffad8d80?w=60&h=60&fit=crop" alt="">
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
                  {% if section.settings.avatar_4 != blank %}
                    <div class="mini-story" onclick="playReviewStory(4)">
                      <img src="{{ section.settings.avatar_4 | image_url: width: 60 }}" alt="">
                    </div>
                  {% else %}
                    <div class="mini-story" onclick="playReviewStory(4)">
                      <img src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1500648767791-00dcc994a43e?w=60&h=60&fit=crop" alt="">
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
                  {% if section.settings.avatar_5 != blank %}
                    <div class="mini-story" onclick="playReviewStory(5)">
                      <img src="{{ section.settings.avatar_5 | image_url: width: 60 }}" alt="">
                    </div>
                  {% else %}
                    <div class="mini-story" onclick="playReviewStory(5)">
                      <img src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1544005313-94ddf0286df2?w=60&h=60&fit=crop" alt="">
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
                  <span class="mini-video-label"><i class="ti ti-video"></i> {{ section.settings.video_count }}</span>
                </div>
                
                <span class="cloudy-badge badge-success ms-2">
                  <i class="ti ti-thumb-up me-1"></i>{{ section.settings.recommended_percent }} Recommended
                </span>
              </div>

              <!-- Product Title -->
              <p class="product-category">{{ section.settings.product_category }}</p>
              <h1 class="product-title">{{ section.settings.product_title }}</h1>

              <!-- Delivery Card -->
              <div class="delivery-card">
                <div class="delivery-title">
                  <i class="ti ti-truck-delivery"></i>
                  Get it <span class="delivery-time">{{ section.settings.delivery_time }}</span>
                </div>
                <div style="font-size: 0.8125rem; color: var(--vuexy-body-color); margin-top: 0.25rem;">{{ section.settings.order_by_time }}</div>
                <div class="delivery-location">
                  <i class="ti ti-map-pin"></i>
                  Deliver To {{ section.settings.delivery_location }}
                  <a href="#" style="color: var(--vuexy-primary); margin-left: 0.5rem; font-size: 0.8125rem;">Change</a>
                </div>
              </div>

              <!-- Quick Quantity & Price Alert Box -->
              <div class="price-alert-box">
                <div class="price-alert-header">
                  <i class="ti ti-flame"></i>
                  <span>{{ section.settings.promo_label }}</span>
                </div>
                <div class="price-alert-content">
                  <div class="quick-qty-label">
                    <i class="ti ti-stack-2"></i> Quantity
                  </div>
                  <div class="quick-qty-controls">
                    <button class="quick-qty-btn" onclick="changeQuantity(-1)">âˆ’</button>
                    <input type="number" id="quickQuantity" value="1" min="1" max="999" class="quick-qty-input" onchange="syncQuantity(this.value)">
                    <button class="quick-qty-btn" onclick="changeQuantity(1)">+</button>
                  </div>
                  <div class="quick-price-wrapper">
                    <span class="quick-price" id="quickPrice">{{ section.settings.current_price }}</span>
                    <span class="old-price">{{ section.settings.original_price }}</span>
                    <span class="discount-badge">{{ section.settings.discount_percent }}</span>
                  </div>
                  <button class="view-campaigns-btn" onclick="viewCampaigns()">
                    <i class="ti ti-discount-2"></i> View Campaigns
                  </button>
                </div>
              </div>

              <!-- Step 1: Upload Design -->
              <div class="step-card">
                <div class="step-header">
                  <span class="step-number">1</span>
                  {{ section.settings.step1_title }}
                </div>
                <div class="upload-area" id="uploadArea">
                  <div class="upload-row" style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 1rem; width: 100%;">
                    <div class="upload-icon" style="flex-shrink: 0;">
                      <i class="ti ti-cloud-upload"></i>
                    </div>
                    <div style="flex: 1; text-align: left;">
                      <p class="upload-text">Drag your design here</p>
                      <p class="upload-subtext">PNG, JPG, SVG up to 50MB</p>
                    </div>
                    <button class="upload-btn" style="flex-shrink: 0;">
                      <i class="ti ti-device-desktop me-1"></i> My Device
                    </button>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>

              <!-- Step 2: Select Position -->
              <div class="step-card">
                <div class="step-header">
                  <span class="step-number">2</span>
                  {{ section.settings.step2_title }}
                </div>
                <div class="position-selector">
                  <!-- Front Body -->
                  <div class="position-box active" onclick="selectPosition('front', this)" data-position="front">
                    <div class="position-canvas-container">
                      <canvas id="pos-front-canvas" class="position-canvas"></canvas>
                    </div>
                    <div class="position-coords" id="coords-front">0, 0, 0.15</div>
                    <div class="position-label">Front Body</div>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Back Body -->
                  <div class="position-box" onclick="selectPosition('back', this)" data-position="back">
                    <div class="position-canvas-container">
                      <canvas id="pos-back-canvas" class="position-canvas"></canvas>
                    </div>
                    <div class="position-coords" id="coords-back">0, 0, -0.15</div>
                    <div class="position-label">Back Body</div>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Left Sleeve -->
                  <div class="position-box" onclick="selectPosition('left-sleeve', this)" data-position="left-sleeve">
                    <div class="position-canvas-container">
                      <canvas id="pos-left-canvas" class="position-canvas"></canvas>
                    </div>
                    <div class="position-coords" id="coords-left">-0.18, 0.08, 0</div>
                    <div class="position-label">Left Sleeve</div>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Right Sleeve -->
                  <div class="position-box" onclick="selectPosition('right-sleeve', this)" data-position="right-sleeve">
                    <div class="position-canvas-container">
                      <canvas id="pos-right-canvas" class="position-canvas"></canvas>
                    </div>
                    <div class="position-coords" id="coords-right">0.18, 0.08, 0</div>
                    <div class="position-label">Right Sleeve</div>
                  </div>
                </div>
                <p style="font-size: 0.75rem; color: var(--vuexy-muted-color); margin-top: 0.75rem; text-align: center;">
                  <i class="ti ti-info-circle me-1"></i>Click to select where your design will be placed
                </p>
                
                <!-- Position Adjustment Sliders -->
                <div class="position-sliders" style="margin-top: 1rem; padding: 0.75rem; background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter); border-radius: 8px;">
                  <!-- Reassurance Alert -->
                  <div style="background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(40, 199, 111, 0.1), rgba(0, 207, 232, 0.1)); border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-success); border-radius: 6px; padding: 0.5rem 0.75rem; margin-bottom: 0.75rem;">
                    <p style="font-size: 0.7rem; color: var(--vuexy-success); margin: 0; line-height: 1.4;">
                      <i class="ti ti-info-circle me-1"></i>
                      <strong>Don't worry!</strong> If you can't position the image correctly, our technicians will configure it optimally and call you for approval.
                    </p>
                  </div>
                  <!-- Live Coordinate Display -->
                  <div id="coordinateDisplay" style="display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 1rem; margin-bottom: 0.75rem; padding: 0.5rem; background: var(--vuexy-dark-bg); border-radius: 6px;">
                    <span style="font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 0.7rem; color: #28c76f;">X: <span id="liveX">0.00</span></span>
                    <span style="font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 0.7rem; color: #ff9f43;">Y: <span id="liveY">0.00</span></span>
                    <span style="font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace; font-size: 0.7rem; color: #00cfe8;">Z: <span id="liveZ">0.00</span></span>
                  </div>
                  <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 0.75rem; margin-bottom: 0.5rem;">
                    <label style="font-size: 0.75rem; font-weight: 600; color: var(--vuexy-primary); min-width: 70px;">
                      <i class="ti ti-arrows-horizontal me-1"></i>X Pos
                    </label>
                    <input type="range" id="positionXSlider" min="-100" max="100" value="0" step="1"
                           style="flex: 1; height: 6px; accent-color: var(--vuexy-primary);">
                    <span id="positionXValue" style="font-size: 0.7rem; color: var(--vuexy-body-color); min-width: 30px; text-align: right;">0</span>
                  </div>
                  <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 0.75rem;">
                    <label style="font-size: 0.75rem; font-weight: 600; color: var(--vuexy-primary); min-width: 70px;">
                      <i class="ti ti-arrows-vertical me-1"></i>Y Pos
                    </label>
                    <input type="range" id="positionYSlider" min="-100" max="100" value="0" step="1"
                           style="flex: 1; height: 6px; accent-color: var(--vuexy-primary);">
                    <span id="positionYValue" style="font-size: 0.7rem; color: var(--vuexy-body-color); min-width: 30px; text-align: right;">0</span>
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>

              <!-- Step 3: Set Design Size -->
              <div class="step-card">
                <div class="step-header">
                  <span class="step-number">3</span>
                  Set Design Size
                </div>
                <div class="size-inputs">
                  <div class="size-input-group">
                    <label>Width (Inch)</label>
                    <input type="number" value="9" min="1" max="14" id="widthInput">
                  </div>
                  <div class="size-multiply">Ã—</div>
                  <div class="size-input-group">
                    <label>Height (Inch)</label>
                    <input type="number" value="9" min="1" max="12" id="heightInput">
                  </div>
                  <div class="size-input-group">
                    <label>Quantity</label>
                    <div class="quantity-control">
                      <button onclick="changeQuantity(-1)">âˆ’</button>
                      <input type="number" value="1" min="1" id="quantityInput">
                      <button onclick="changeQuantity(1)">+</button>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>

                  <span style="color: var(--vuexy-muted-color); font-size: 0.875rem;">Total Price:</span>

                </div>
              </div>

              <!-- Pricing Section -->

                <div class="pricing-header">

                  </div>
                </div>

                  <thead>
                    <tr>
                      <th>Quantity</th>
                      <th>1 Sq In</th>
                      <th>25 Sq In</th>
                      <th>50 Sq In</th>
                      <th>100 Sq In</th>
                    </tr>
                  </thead>
                  <tbody>
                    <tr>
                      <td>1</td>

                      <td><span class="price-original">$4.70</span><span class="price-sale">$3.05</span></td>
                      <td><span class="price-original">$5.15</span><span class="price-sale">$3.50</span></td>
                      <td><span class="price-original">$5.80</span><span class="price-sale">$4.15</span></td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td>2-5</td>
                      <td><span class="price-sale">$2.71</span><span class="discount-badge">-5%</span></td>
                      <td><span class="price-sale">$2.90</span></td>
                      <td><span class="price-sale">$3.33</span></td>
                      <td><span class="price-sale">$3.95</span></td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td>6-11</td>
                      <td><span class="price-sale">$2.57</span><span class="discount-badge">-10%</span></td>
                      <td><span class="price-sale">$2.75</span></td>
                      <td><span class="price-sale">$3.15</span></td>
                      <td><span class="price-sale">$3.74</span></td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td>12-24</td>
                      <td><span class="price-sale">$2.43</span><span class="discount-badge">-15%</span></td>
                      <td><span class="price-sale">$2.59</span></td>
                      <td><span class="price-sale">$2.98</span></td>
                      <td><span class="price-sale">$3.53</span></td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td>25-99</td>
                      <td><span class="price-sale">$2.28</span><span class="discount-badge">-20%</span></td>
                      <td><span class="price-sale">$2.44</span></td>
                      <td><span class="price-sale">$2.80</span></td>
                      <td><span class="price-sale">$3.32</span></td>
                    </tr>
                    <tr>
                      <td>100+</td>
                      <td><span class="price-sale">$2.00</span><span class="discount-badge">-30%</span></td>
                      <td><span class="price-sale">$2.14</span></td>
                      <td><span class="price-sale">$2.45</span></td>
                      <td><span class="price-sale">$2.91</span></td>
                    </tr>
                  </tbody>
                </table>
              </div>

              <!-- Bulk Discount Info -->
              <div class="bulk-section">
                <div class="bulk-title">
                  <i class="ti ti-discount"></i>
                  Bulk Order Discounts
                </div>
                <table class="bulk-table">
                  <tr>
                    <th>Order Total</th>
                    <th>Discount</th>
                    <th>Code</th>
                  </tr>
                  <tr>
                    <td>$500+</td>
                    <td><span class="cloudy-badge badge-success">5% Off</span></td>
                    <td><code style="background: rgba(93, 173, 226, 0.15); padding: 0.25em 0.5em; border-radius: 4px;">BULK5</code></td>
                  </tr>
                  <tr>
                    <td>$1,000+</td>
                    <td><span class="cloudy-badge badge-success">10% Off</span></td>
                    <td><code style="background: rgba(93, 173, 226, 0.15); padding: 0.25em 0.5em; border-radius: 4px;">BULK10</code></td>
                  </tr>
                  <tr>
                    <td>$2,000+</td>
                    <td><span class="cloudy-badge badge-success">15% Off</span></td>
                    <td><code style="background: rgba(93, 173, 226, 0.15); padding: 0.25em 0.5em; border-radius: 4px;">BULK15</code></td>

              <!-- Add to Cart Button (Desktop) -->

                <i class="ti ti-shopping-cart"></i>

            <!-- Press Instructions -->
            <div class="instructions-section">
              <h3 class="instructions-title">

    <!-- Core JS -->
    <script src="./assets/vendor/libs/popper/popper.js"></script>

    <!-- Three.js T-Shirt 3D Model - Using shirt_baked.glb from GitHub repo -->
    <script>
      // Three.js Variables
      let scene, camera, renderer, tshirt, controls;
      let currentColor = '#3b82f6';  // Standard blue
      let isAutoRotate = true;
      let tshirtMaterial = null;

      // Initialize Three.js Scene
      function initThreeJS() {
        const container = document.getElementById('tshirt-canvas');
        const loadingSpinner = document.getElementById('loadingSpinner');

        // Scene - White background
        scene = new THREE.Scene();
        scene.background = new THREE.Color(0xffffff);

        // Camera - positioned for the GLB model (fov: 25 as per original)
        const width = container.clientWidth;
        const height = container.clientHeight;
        camera = new THREE.PerspectiveCamera(25, width / height, 0.1, 1000);
        camera.position.set(0, 0, 2.5);

        // Renderer with high quality settings
        renderer = new THREE.WebGLRenderer({ 
          canvas: container,
          antialias: true,
          alpha: true,
          preserveDrawingBuffer: true
        });
        renderer.setSize(width, height);
        renderer.setPixelRatio(Math.min(window.devicePixelRatio, 2));
        renderer.shadowMap.enabled = true;
        renderer.shadowMap.type = THREE.PCFSoftShadowMap;
        renderer.outputEncoding = THREE.sRGBEncoding;
        renderer.toneMapping = THREE.ACESFilmicToneMapping;
        renderer.toneMappingExposure = 1.0;

        // Orbit Controls - FULL 360Â° ROTATION for main scene
        controls = new THREE.OrbitControls(camera, renderer.domElement);
        controls.enableDamping = true;
        controls.dampingFactor = 0.08;
        controls.minDistance = 1.8;
        controls.maxDistance = 4;
        controls.enablePan = false;
        controls.autoRotate = true;  // Enable auto-rotate
        controls.autoRotateSpeed = 1.0;
        // Allow full vertical rotation with slight limits
        controls.minPolarAngle = Math.PI / 6;  // 30 degrees from top
        controls.maxPolarAngle = Math.PI - Math.PI / 6;  // 30 degrees from bottom
        // NO horizontal limits - full 360Â° rotation
        controls.minAzimuthAngle = -Infinity;
        controls.maxAzimuthAngle = Infinity;

        // Professional Lighting Setup
        setupLighting();

        // Load the GLB T-Shirt Model
        loadTshirtModel(loadingSpinner);

        // Animation loop
        animate();

        // Handle resize
        window.addEventListener('resize', onWindowResize);
      }

      // Setup Professional Lighting
      function setupLighting() {
        // Soft ambient light for overall illumination
        const ambientLight = new THREE.AmbientLight(0xffffff, 0.4);
        scene.add(ambientLight);

        // Main key light - front right
        const keyLight = new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff, 0.8);
        keyLight.position.set(3, 5, 5);
        keyLight.castShadow = true;
        keyLight.shadow.mapSize.width = 1024;
        keyLight.shadow.mapSize.height = 1024;
        scene.add(keyLight);

        // Fill light - front left
        const fillLight = new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff, 0.4);
        fillLight.position.set(-3, 3, 3);
        scene.add(fillLight);

        // Rim/Back light for depth
        const rimLight = new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff, 0.3);
        rimLight.position.set(0, 3, -5);
        scene.add(rimLight);

        // Top light for highlights
        const topLight = new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff, 0.3);
        topLight.position.set(0, 8, 0);
        scene.add(topLight);

        // Hemisphere light for natural feel
        const hemiLight = new THREE.HemisphereLight(0xffffff, 0xf5f5f5, 0.3);
        scene.add(hemiLight);
      }

      // Load T-Shirt GLB Model
      function loadTshirtModel(loadingSpinner) {
        const loader = new THREE.GLTFLoader();
        
        loader.load(
          '{{ 'shirt_baked.glb' | asset_url }}',
          function(gltf) {
            // Model loaded successfully
            tshirt = gltf.scene;
            
            // Find and store the material for color changing
            tshirt.traverse((child) => {
              if (child.isMesh) {
                // Clone the material so we can modify it
                child.material = child.material.clone();
                child.material.color = new THREE.Color(currentColor);
                child.material.roughness = 0.9;
                child.material.metalness = 0.0;
                child.material.needsUpdate = true;
                child.castShadow = true;
                child.receiveShadow = true;
                
                // Store reference to material
                if (!tshirtMaterial) {
                  tshirtMaterial = child.material;
                }
              }
            });

            // Center and scale the model appropriately
            const box = new THREE.Box3().setFromObject(tshirt);
            const center = box.getCenter(new THREE.Vector3());
            const size = box.getSize(new THREE.Vector3());
            
            // Center the model
            tshirt.position.x = -center.x;
            tshirt.position.y = -center.y;
            tshirt.position.z = -center.z;

            // Scale to fit nicely in view
            const maxDim = Math.max(size.x, size.y, size.z);
            const scale = 1.0 / maxDim;
            tshirt.scale.setScalar(scale);

            scene.add(tshirt);

            // Hide loading spinner with fade
            loadingSpinner.style.transition = 'opacity 0.5s';
            loadingSpinner.style.opacity = '0';
            setTimeout(() => {
              loadingSpinner.style.display = 'none';
            }, 500);

            console.log('T-Shirt model loaded successfully!');
            
            // Calculate and display mesh coordinates
            calculateMeshCoordinates();
            
            // Add t-shirt to mini position previews
            setTimeout(() => {
              addTshirtToMiniScenes();
            }, 200);
          },
          function(xhr) {
            // Loading progress
            const percent = (xhr.loaded / xhr.total * 100).toFixed(0);
            const loadingText = loadingSpinner.querySelector('.loading-text');
            if (loadingText) {
              loadingText.textContent = `Loading 3D Model... ${percent}%`;
            }
          },
          function(error) {
            console.error('Error loading T-Shirt model:', error);
            // Fallback to basic geometry if model fails to load
            createFallbackTshirt();
            loadingSpinner.style.display = 'none';
          }
        );
      }

      // Fallback T-Shirt if GLB fails to load
      function createFallbackTshirt() {
        const geometry = new THREE.BoxGeometry(0.5, 0.6, 0.15);
        const material = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({
          color: currentColor,
          roughness: 0.9,
          metalness: 0.0
        });
        tshirt = new THREE.Mesh(geometry, material);
        tshirtMaterial = material;
        scene.add(tshirt);
      }

      // Calculate Mesh Coordinates for each position
      function calculateMeshCoordinates() {
        if (!tshirt) return;

        const box = new THREE.Box3().setFromObject(tshirt);
        const size = box.getSize(new THREE.Vector3());
        const center = box.getCenter(new THREE.Vector3());

        // Calculate precise coordinates based on mesh geometry
        const frontZ = center.z + (size.z / 2) * 0.85;  // 85% to front surface
        const backZ = center.z - (size.z / 2) * 0.85;   // 85% to back surface
        const sleeveY = center.y + (size.y / 4);        // Upper quarter for sleeves
        const sleeveX = size.x / 2 * 0.75;              // 75% out for sleeve center

        // Update coordinate objects
        positionCoordinates['front'] = { 
          x: center.x, 
          y: center.y, 
          z: frontZ, 
          rotationY: 0, 
          label: 'Front Body Center' 
        };
        positionCoordinates['back'] = { 
          x: center.x, 
          y: center.y, 
          z: backZ, 
          rotationY: Math.PI, 
          label: 'Back Body Center' 
        };
        positionCoordinates['left-sleeve'] = { 
          x: center.x - sleeveX, 
          y: sleeveY, 
          z: center.z, 
          rotationY: Math.PI / 2, 
          label: 'Left Sleeve Upper' 
        };
        positionCoordinates['right-sleeve'] = { 
          x: center.x + sleeveX, 
          y: sleeveY, 
          z: center.z, 
          rotationY: -Math.PI / 2, 
          label: 'Right Sleeve Upper' 
        };

        // Update UI with coordinates
        updateCoordinateDisplay();

        console.log('Mesh Coordinates Calculated:', {
          meshSize: size,
          meshCenter: center,
          positions: positionCoordinates
        });
      }

      // Update coordinate display in UI
      function updateCoordinateDisplay() {
        const formatCoord = (c) => c.toFixed(2);
        
        Object.keys(positionCoordinates).forEach(key => {
          const pos = positionCoordinates[key];
          const displayKey = key.replace('-sleeve', '');
          const elem = document.getElementById(`coords-${displayKey}`);
          if (elem) {
            elem.textContent = `${formatCoord(pos.x)}, ${formatCoord(pos.y)}, ${formatCoord(pos.z)}`;
          }
        });
      }

      function switchTab(tabId, button) {

        document.querySelectorAll('.product-tab-btn').forEach(btn => {
          btn.classList.remove('active');

      // Change T-Shirt Color - Using smooth easing
      function changeTshirtColor(color, element) {
        currentColor = color;
        
        // Update material color with smooth transition
        if (tshirt) {
          tshirt.traverse((child) => {
            if (child.isMesh && child.material) {
              // Animate color change
              const startColor = child.material.color.clone();
              const endColor = new THREE.Color(color);
              let progress = 0;
              
              function animateColor() {
                progress += 0.1;
                if (progress <= 1) {
                  child.material.color.lerpColors(startColor, endColor, progress);
                  requestAnimationFrame(animateColor);
                } else {
                  child.material.color.set(color);
                }
              }
              animateColor();
            }
          });
        }

        // Update active state
        document.querySelectorAll('.color-option').forEach(el => el.classList.remove('active'));
        if (element) element.classList.add('active');

        // Update mini scenes with new color
        updateMiniScenesColor(color);
      }

      // Camera Controls
      function resetCamera() {
        // Reset to current selected position view
        const coords = positionCoordinates[selectedPosition];
        if (coords) {
          animateToPosition(coords.rotationY);
        }
        
        // Reset camera position
        const targetPosition = { x: 0, y: 0, z: 2.5 };
        const startPosition = { x: camera.position.x, y: camera.position.y, z: camera.position.z };
        let progress = 0;
        
        function animateReset() {
          progress += 0.05;
          if (progress <= 1) {
            const ease = 1 - Math.pow(1 - progress, 3);
            camera.position.x = startPosition.x + (targetPosition.x - startPosition.x) * ease;
            camera.position.y = startPosition.y + (targetPosition.y - startPosition.y) * ease;
            camera.position.z = startPosition.z + (targetPosition.z - startPosition.z) * ease;
            controls.target.set(0, 0, 0);
            controls.update();
            requestAnimationFrame(animateReset);
          }
        }
        animateReset();
      }

      function rotateLeft() {
        // Manual rotation - rotate camera left
        if (tshirt) {
          const currentAngle = Math.atan2(camera.position.x, camera.position.z);
          const newAngle = currentAngle + Math.PI / 4;  // 45 degrees
          const distance = camera.position.length();
          
          camera.position.x = Math.sin(newAngle) * distance;
          camera.position.z = Math.cos(newAngle) * distance;
          camera.lookAt(0, 0, 0);
          controls.update();
        }
      }

      function rotateRight() {
        // Manual rotation - rotate camera right
        if (tshirt) {
          const currentAngle = Math.atan2(camera.position.x, camera.position.z);
          const newAngle = currentAngle - Math.PI / 4;  // 45 degrees
          const distance = camera.position.length();
          
          camera.position.x = Math.sin(newAngle) * distance;
          camera.position.z = Math.cos(newAngle) * distance;
          camera.lookAt(0, 0, 0);
          controls.update();
        }
      }

      function animateRotation(target) {
        if (!tshirt) return;
        const start = tshirt.rotation.y;
        let progress = 0;
        
        function animate() {
          progress += 0.1;
          if (progress <= 1) {
            const ease = 1 - Math.pow(1 - progress, 2);
            tshirt.rotation.y = start + (target - start) * ease;
            requestAnimationFrame(animate);
          } else {
            tshirt.rotation.y = target;
          }
        }
        animate();
      }

      function zoomIn() {
        const targetZ = Math.max(camera.position.z - 0.3, 1.5);
        animateZoom(targetZ);
      }

      function zoomOut() {
        const targetZ = Math.min(camera.position.z + 0.3, 4);
        animateZoom(targetZ);
      }

      function animateZoom(targetZ) {
        const startZ = camera.position.z;
        let progress = 0;
        
        function animate() {
          progress += 0.1;
          if (progress <= 1) {
            const ease = 1 - Math.pow(1 - progress, 2);
            camera.position.z = startZ + (targetZ - startZ) * ease;
            requestAnimationFrame(animate);
          } else {
            camera.position.z = targetZ;
          }
        }
        animate();
      }

      function toggleAutoRotate() {
        isAutoRotate = !isAutoRotate;
        controls.autoRotate = isAutoRotate;
      }

      // Window Resize Handler
      function onWindowResize() {
        const container = document.getElementById('tshirt-canvas');
        if (!container) return;
        
        const width = container.clientWidth;
        const height = container.clientHeight;

        camera.aspect = width / height;
        camera.updateProjectionMatrix();
        renderer.setSize(width, height);
      }

      // Animation Loop with smooth rendering
      function animate() {
        requestAnimationFrame(animate);
        
        // Update controls
        controls.update();
        
        // Render
        renderer.render(scene, camera);
      }

      // ==================== UNIFIED POSITION COORDINATES ====================
      // Kamera geÃ§iÅŸleri iÃ§in koordinatlar
      const positionCoordinates = {
        'front': { 
          x: 0, y: 0.02, z: 0.052,
          cameraAngle: 0,
          label: 'Ã–n GÃ¶vde'
        },
        'back': { 
          x: 0, y: 0.02, z: -0.052,
          cameraAngle: Math.PI,
          label: 'Arka GÃ¶vde'
        },
        'left-sleeve': { 
          x: -0.08, y: 0.08, z: 0.015,

        },
        'right-sleeve': {

        }
      };

      let selectedPosition = 'front';
      let miniScenes = {};
      let miniRenderers = {};

      // Select Position Function
      function selectPosition(position, element) {
        selectedPosition = position;

        document.querySelectorAll('.position-box').forEach(box => box.classList.remove('active'));
