        box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(122, 143, 166, 0.3);
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY UPLOAD AREA
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .upload-area {
        border: 2px dashed var(--vuexy-border-color);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        padding: 0.875rem 1rem;
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.04);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
        cursor: pointer;
      }

      .upload-area:hover {
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.08);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-sm);
      }

      .upload-icon {
        font-size: 2rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        opacity: 0.7;
        line-height: 1;
      }

      .upload-text {
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-semibold);
        margin-bottom: 0.125rem;
        font-size: 0.875rem;
      }

      .upload-subtext {
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: 0.7rem;
        margin-bottom: 0;
      }

      .upload-btn {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
        color: white;
        border: none;
        padding: 0.5rem 1.25rem;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        font-size: 0.8rem;
        margin-top: 0;
        cursor: pointer;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-primary-lg);
      }

      .upload-btn:hover {
        box-shadow: 0 0 12px 0 rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.5);
        transform: translateY(-1px);
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY SIZE INPUTS
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .size-inputs {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: 1fr auto 1fr 1fr;
        gap: 1rem;
        align-items: end;
      }

      .size-input-group label {
        display: block;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: 0.75rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        letter-spacing: 0.6px;
      }

      .size-input-group input {
        width: 100%;
        padding: 0.625rem 0.875rem;
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-input-border);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-base);
        text-align: center;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-fast);
        background: var(--vuexy-input-bg);
      }

      .size-input-group input:focus {
        outline: none;
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        box-shadow: 0 3px 10px 0 rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.1);
      }

      .size-multiply {
        font-size: 1.25rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        padding-bottom: 0.625rem;
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY QUANTITY CONTROL
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .quantity-control {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-input-border);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        overflow: hidden;
        background: var(--vuexy-input-bg);
      }

      .quantity-control button {
        width: 40px;
        height: 40px;
        border: none;
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.08);
        cursor: pointer;
        font-size: 1.125rem;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-fast);
      }

      .quantity-control button:hover {
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.15);
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
      }

      .quantity-control input {
        width: 55px;
        text-align: center;
        border: none;
        border-left: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        border-right: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-base);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        background: var(--vuexy-input-bg);
      }

      .price-display {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: 1.75rem;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-bold);
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        text-align: right;
        padding-bottom: 0.25rem;
      }

      /* ========== PRICING TABLE ========== */
      .pricing-section {
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
      }

      .pricing-header {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: space-between;
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
      }

      .pricing-title {
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-success);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        font-size: 1rem;
      }

      .pricing-title i {
        font-size: 1.25rem;
      }

      .pricing-table {
        width: 100%;
        border-collapse: separate;
        border-spacing: 0;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        overflow: hidden;
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .pricing-table th {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--vuexy-primary), var(--vuexy-primary-dark));
        color: white;
        padding: 0.875rem 1rem;
        font-weight: 500;
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
        text-align: center;
      }

      .pricing-table td {
        padding: 0.875rem 1rem;
        text-align: center;
        border-bottom: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        font-size: 0.875rem;
      }

      .pricing-table tr:last-child td {
        border-bottom: none;
      }

      .pricing-table tbody tr {
        transition: background 0.15s;
      }

      .pricing-table tbody tr:hover {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter);
      }

      .price-original {
        text-decoration: line-through;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
        margin-right: 0.25rem;
      }

      .price-sale {
        color: var(--vuexy-success);
        font-weight: 600;
      }

      .discount-badge {
        background: var(--vuexy-warning-light);
        color: #c9a227;
        font-size: 0.6875rem;
        padding: 0.2em 0.5em;
        border-radius: 4px;
        font-weight: 600;
        margin-left: 0.25rem;
      }

      /* ========== BULK DISCOUNT ========== */
      .bulk-section {
        background: var(--vuexy-info-light);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        padding: 1.25rem;
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
        border: 1px solid rgba(93, 173, 226, 0.2);
      }

      .bulk-title {
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-info);
        margin-bottom: 1rem;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        font-size: 1rem;
      }

      .bulk-title i {
        font-size: 1.25rem;
      }

      .bulk-table {
        width: 100%;
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
      }

      .bulk-table th {
        text-align: left;
        padding: 0.625rem 0.5rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        font-weight: 500;
        border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(93, 173, 226, 0.2);
      }

      .bulk-table td {
        padding: 0.625rem 0.5rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
      }

      /* ========== INSTRUCTIONS ========== */
      .instructions-section {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        padding: 1.5rem;
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-md);
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .instructions-title {
        font-size: 1.25rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
      }

      .instructions-title i {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
      }

      .instruction-steps {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
        gap: 1rem;
      }

      .instruction-step {
        text-align: center;
        padding: 1.5rem 1rem;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        transition: all 0.2s;
      }

      .instruction-step:hover {
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(122, 143, 166, 0.15);
        transform: translateY(-2px);
      }

      .instruction-number {
        width: 50px;
        height: 50px;
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--vuexy-primary), var(--vuexy-primary-dark));
        color: white;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        font-size: 1.25rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        margin: 0 auto 1rem;
        box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(122, 143, 166, 0.3);
      }

      .instruction-title {
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        margin-bottom: 0.375rem;
        font-size: 0.9375rem;
      }

      .instruction-desc {
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      .instruction-time {
        font-size: 0.75rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-warning);
        font-weight: 600;
        margin-top: 0.5rem;
        display: inline-block;
        padding: 0.25em 0.5em;
        background: var(--vuexy-warning-light);
        border-radius: 4px;
      }

      /* ========== SETTINGS GRID ========== */
      .settings-grid {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(150px, 1fr));
        gap: 1rem;
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
        padding-top: 1.5rem;
        border-top: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .setting-item {
        text-align: center;
        padding: 1rem;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
      }

      .setting-label {
        font-size: 0.6875rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        text-transform: uppercase;
        margin-bottom: 0.375rem;
        letter-spacing: 0.5px;
      }

      .setting-value {
        font-weight: 700;
        color: var(--vuexy-primary-dark);
        font-size: 1.125rem;
      }

      .setting-note {
        font-size: 0.6875rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        margin-top: 0.25rem;
      }

      /* ========== REVIEWS ========== */
      .reviews-section {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        backdrop-filter: blur(20px);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        padding: 1.5rem;
        margin-top: 1.5rem;
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-md);
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .reviews-header {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: space-between;
        margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        gap: 1rem;
        padding-bottom: 1rem;
        border-bottom: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .reviews-title {
        font-size: 1.25rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
      }

      .reviews-title i {
        color: var(--vuexy-warning);
      }

      .reviews-summary {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 1rem;
      }

      .reviews-score {
        font-size: 2.5rem;
        font-weight: 700;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        line-height: 1;
      }

      .reviews-details {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
      }

      .reviews-stars {
        color: var(--vuexy-warning);
        display: flex;
        gap: 2px;
      }

      .reviews-count {
        font-size: 0.8125rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      .review-bars {
        flex: 1;
        max-width: 280px;
      }

      .review-bar-item {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        margin-bottom: 0.375rem;
        font-size: 0.75rem;
      }

      .review-bar-label {
        width: 48px;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      .review-bar-track {
        flex: 1;
        height: 6px;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter);
        border-radius: 3px;
        overflow: hidden;
      }

      .review-bar-fill {
        height: 100%;
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--vuexy-warning), #f8c957);
        border-radius: 3px;
      }

      .review-bar-percent {
        width: 32px;
        text-align: right;
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        font-weight: 500;
      }

      /* ========== REVIEW CARDS ========== */
      .review-cards {
        display: grid;
        gap: 1rem;
      }

      .review-card {
        padding: 1.25rem;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-lighter);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        transition: all 0.2s;
      }

      .review-card:hover {
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
      }

      .review-card-header {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.75rem;
        margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
      }

      .review-avatar {
        width: 42px;
        height: 42px;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--vuexy-primary), var(--vuexy-primary-dark));
        color: white;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 0.875rem;
      }

      .review-author {
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        font-size: 0.9375rem;
      }

      .review-date {
        font-size: 0.75rem;
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      .review-text {
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        font-size: 0.875rem;
        line-height: 1.6;
      }

      /* ========== RELATED PRODUCTS ========== */
      .related-section {
        margin-top: 2rem;
        padding-bottom: 2rem;
      }

      .section-title {
        font-size: 1.375rem;
        font-weight: 600;
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        margin-bottom: 1.25rem;
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY PRODUCT CARDS
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .product-cards {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(180px, 1fr));
        gap: 1.25rem;
      }

      .product-card {
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        overflow: hidden;
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-sm);
        border: none;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
        text-decoration: none;
      }

      .product-card:hover {
        transform: translateY(-5px);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-lg);
      }

      .product-card-image {
        aspect-ratio: 1;
        background: var(--vuexy-body-bg);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        padding: 1rem;
      }

      .product-card-image img {
        max-width: 100%;
        max-height: 100%;
        object-fit: contain;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-slow);
      }

      .product-card:hover .product-card-image img {
        transform: scale(1.08);
      }

      .product-card-body {
        padding: 1rem;
        border-top: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
      }

      .product-card-title {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-semibold);
        color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-base);
        margin-bottom: 0.375rem;
      }

      .product-card-rating {
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.375rem;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-sm);
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
      }

      .product-card-rating i {
        color: var(--vuexy-warning);
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY BUTTON STYLES
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      /* Base Button */
      .btn {
        display: inline-flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        padding: 0.786rem 1.5rem;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-base);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        line-height: 1;
        text-align: center;
        white-space: nowrap;
        vertical-align: middle;
        cursor: pointer;
        user-select: none;
        border: 1px solid transparent;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
      }

      /* Primary Button - Add to Cart */
      .add-cart-btn, .btn-primary {
        width: 100%;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
        color: #fff;
        border: none;
        padding: 0.9rem 1.75rem;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        font-size: 1rem;
        letter-spacing: 0.3px;
        cursor: pointer;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        gap: 0.625rem;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-primary-lg);
        position: relative;
        overflow: hidden;
      }

      .add-cart-btn::before {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: -100%;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(255,255,255,0.25), transparent);
        transition: left 0.5s ease;
      }

      .add-cart-btn:hover {
        box-shadow: 0 0 20px 0 rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.5);
        transform: translateY(-3px);
      }

      .add-cart-btn:hover::before {
        left: 100%;
      }

      .add-cart-btn:active {
        transform: translateY(-1px);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-primary);
      }

      /* Outline Button */
      .btn-outline-primary {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        background: transparent;
      }

      .btn-outline-primary:hover {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary);
        color: #fff;
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-primary);
      }

      /* Flat Button */
      .btn-flat-primary {
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.12);
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        border: none;
      }

      .btn-flat-primary:hover {
        background: rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.2);
      }

      /* Relief Button */
      .btn-relief-primary {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary);
        color: #fff;

         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */

        gap: 0.5rem;

      .footer-title {

        line-height: 1.6;
      }

      .footer-links {
        list-style: none;
        padding: 0;
        margin: 0;
      }

      .footer-links li {
        margin-bottom: 0.625rem;
      }

      .footer-links a {

        text-decoration: none;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-sm);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-fast);
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
      }

      .footer-links a:hover {
        color: var(--vuexy-primary-light);
        padding-left: 0.25rem;
      }

      .footer-bottom {
        border-top: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1);

        color: rgba(255,255,255,0.5);

      @media (max-width: 991px) {
        .product-info {
          margin-top: 1.5rem;
        }

        .size-inputs {
          grid-template-columns: 1fr auto 1fr;
        }

      @media (max-width: 767px) {
        .promo-banner .container {
          flex-direction: column;
          gap: 0.5rem;
        }

        .promo-banner .promo-item {
          border-right: none;
          border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
          padding: 0.375rem 0;
        }

        .nav-category {

        }

        .product-title {
          font-size: 1.5rem;
        }

        .size-inputs {
          grid-template-columns: 1fr;
          gap: 0.75rem;
        }

        .size-multiply {
          display: none;
        }

        .instruction-steps {
          grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
        }

        .reviews-header {
          flex-direction: column;
          align-items: flex-start;
        }

      @media (max-width: 575px) {
        .instruction-steps {
          grid-template-columns: 1fr;
        }

        .product-cards {
          grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
        }
      }

      /* ========== T-SHIRT MOCKUP ========== */
      .tshirt-mockup {
        position: relative;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 0.5rem;
        padding: 0;
        margin-bottom: 0;
      }

        opacity: 0.2;
        transition: opacity 0.3s;
        width: 28px;
        height: 32px;
      }

      .tshirt-visual.center {
        opacity: 0.6;
        width: 36px;
        height: 42px;
      }

      /* ========== BUTTON STYLES ========== */
      .btn-cloudy-primary {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--vuexy-primary), var(--vuexy-primary-dark));
        border: none;
        color: white;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(122, 143, 166, 0.35);
      }

      .btn-cloudy-primary:hover {
        box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(122, 143, 166, 0.45);
        transform: translateY(-1px);
        color: white;
      }

      .btn-cloudy-outline {
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-primary);
        color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        background: transparent;
      }

      .btn-cloudy-outline:hover {
        background: var(--vuexy-primary);
        color: white;
      }

      /* Loading Animation */
      .loading-spinner {
        position: absolute;
        top: 50%;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: center;
        gap: 1rem;
      }

      .spinner {
        width: 40px;
        height: 40px;
        border: 3px solid var(--vuexy-primary-light);
        border-top-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        border-radius: 50%;
        animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
      }

      @keyframes spin {
        to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
      }

      .loading-text {
        color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
        font-size: 0.875rem;
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY POSITION SELECTOR
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .position-selector {
        display: grid;
        grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
        gap: 1rem;
        margin-top: 1rem;
      }

      .position-box {
        position: relative;
        aspect-ratio: 1;
        background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
        border: 2px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
        cursor: pointer;
        overflow: hidden;
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
      }

      .position-box:hover {
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-md);
        transform: translateY(-4px);
      }

      .position-box.active {
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        border-width: 2px;
        box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.12), var(--vuexy-shadow-md);
      }

      .position-box.active::after {
        content: 'âœ“';
        position: absolute;
        top: 8px;
        right: 8px;
        width: 24px;
        height: 24px;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
        color: white;
        border-radius: 50%;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        font-size: 12px;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-bold);
        z-index: 10;
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-primary);
        animation: scaleIn 0.2s ease;
      }

      @keyframes scaleIn {
        from { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; }
        to { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; }
      }

      .position-canvas-container {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        position: relative;
      }

      .position-canvas {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        display: block;
      }

      .position-label {
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        background: linear-gradient(transparent, rgba(40, 48, 70, 0.9));
        color: white;
        font-size: 0.75rem;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        text-align: center;
        padding: 18px 6px 10px;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: 0.8px;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
      }

      .position-coords {
        position: absolute;
        top: 8px;
        left: 8px;
        background: var(--vuexy-primary);
        color: white;
        font-size: 0.625rem;
        padding: 4px 8px;
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-sm);
        font-family: 'JetBrains Mono', monospace;
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-medium);
        box-shadow: var(--vuexy-shadow-xs);
      }

      @media (max-width: 575px) {
        .position-selector {
          grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
        }
        .position-label {
          font-size: 0.7rem;
        }
      }

      /* â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
         VUEXY FORM INPUTS
         â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â• */
      
      .form-control, input[type="number"], input[type="text"] {
        display: block;
        width: 100%;
        padding: 0.571rem 1rem;
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-base);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-normal);
        line-height: 1.45;
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        background-color: var(--vuexy-input-bg);
        background-clip: padding-box;
        border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-input-border);
        border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
        transition: var(--vuexy-transition-base);
      }

      .form-control:focus, input[type="number"]:focus, input[type="text"]:focus {
        color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
        background-color: var(--vuexy-input-bg);
        border-color: var(--vuexy-primary);
        outline: 0;
        box-shadow: 0 3px 10px 0 rgba(var(--vuexy-primary-rgb), 0.1);
      }

      .form-control::placeholder {
        color: var(--vuexy-placeholder-color);
        opacity: 1;
      }

      label {
        font-family: var(--vuexy-font-family);
        font-size: var(--vuexy-font-size-sm);
        font-weight: var(--vuexy-font-weight-normal);
        color: var(--vuexy-label-color);
        margin-bottom: 0.357rem;
        display: inline-block;
      }
    </style>

    <!-- Core JS -->
    <script src="./assets/vendor/libs/popper/popper.js"></script>
