    font-weight: 600;
    color: #d62976;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.25rem;
    margin-left: 0.25rem;
  }

  .cloudy-badge {
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 0.4em 0.7em;
    font-size: 0.857rem;
    font-weight: 500;
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-sm);
  }

  .badge-success {
    background: var(--vuexy-success-light);
    color: var(--vuexy-success);
  }

  /* â•â•â• PRODUCT TITLE â•â•â• */
  .product-category {
    color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
    font-size: 0.8125rem;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
  }

  .product-title {
    font-size: 1.75rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
    margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
  }

  /* â•â•â• DELIVERY CARD â•â•â• */
  .delivery-card {
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(40, 199, 111, 0.05), rgba(0, 207, 232, 0.05));
    border: 1px solid rgba(40, 199, 111, 0.2);
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
    padding: 0.875rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }

  .delivery-title {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    font-weight: 500;
    color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
  }

  .delivery-title i { color: var(--vuexy-success); font-size: 1.25rem; }
  .delivery-time { color: var(--vuexy-success); font-weight: 600; }

  .delivery-location {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.375rem;
    margin-top: 0.5rem;
    font-size: 0.8125rem;
    color: var(--vuexy-body-color);
  }

  .delivery-location i { color: var(--vuexy-primary); font-size: 1rem; }

  /* â•â•â• PRICE ALERT BOX â•â•â• */
  .price-alert-box {
    background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
    border: 1px solid rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.2);
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    overflow: hidden;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.08);
  }

  .price-alert-header {
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.1), rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.05));
    color: var(--vuexy-primary);
    padding: 0.4rem 0.75rem;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.4rem;
    font-size: 0.7rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    letter-spacing: 0.5px;
  }

  .price-alert-header i { font-size: 0.85rem; color: #ff9f43; }
  .price-alert-content { padding: 0.75rem; }

  .quick-qty-label {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.3rem;
    font-weight: 500;
    color: var(--vuexy-muted-color);
    font-size: 0.65rem;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
  }

  .quick-qty-controls {
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    background: rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.04);
    border-radius: 50px;
    padding: 0.15rem;
    border: 1px solid rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.1);
  }

  .quick-qty-btn {
    width: 26px;
    height: 26px;
    border: none;
    background: transparent;
    color: var(--vuexy-primary);
    border-radius: 50%;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.2s;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
  }

  .quick-qty-btn:hover { background: rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.15); }

  .quick-qty-input {
    width: 40px;
    text-align: center;
    border: none;
    background: transparent;
    font-size: 0.9rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--vuexy-primary);
  }

  .quick-price-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    align-items: baseline;
    gap: 0.4rem;
    margin-top: 0.35rem;
  }

  .quick-price { font-size: 1.75rem; font-weight: 700; color: var(--vuexy-primary); }
  .old-price { font-size: 0.9rem; color: #ff9f43; text-decoration: line-through; font-weight: 600; }

  .discount-badge {
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ff9f43, #ff6b35);
    color: white;
    font-size: 0.6rem;
    font-weight: 700;
    padding: 0.15rem 0.35rem;
    border-radius: 20px;
  }

  .view-campaigns-btn {
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.35rem;
    margin-top: 0.5rem;
    padding: 0.35rem 0.75rem;
    background: transparent;
    border: none;
    color: var(--vuexy-primary);
    font-size: 0.7rem;
    font-weight: 500;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  /* â•â•â• STEP CARDS â•â•â• */
  .step-card {
    background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
    border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
    padding: 1rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }

  .step-header {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.75rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
    margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
  }

  .step-number {
    width: 28px;
    height: 28px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
    color: white;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    font-weight: 600;
  }

  /* â•â•â• UPLOAD AREA â•â•â• */
  .upload-area {
    border: 2px dashed var(--vuexy-primary);
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
    padding: 1rem;
    background: rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.02);
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.2s;
  }

  .upload-area:hover { background: rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.05); border-color: var(--vuexy-primary-dark); }

  .upload-icon { font-size: 2rem; color: var(--vuexy-primary); }
  .upload-text { font-weight: 500; color: var(--vuexy-heading-color); margin: 0; }
  .upload-subtext { font-size: 0.75rem; color: var(--vuexy-muted-color); margin: 0; }

  .upload-btn {
    background: var(--vuexy-primary);
    color: white;
    border: none;
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
    font-weight: 500;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.2s;
  }

  .upload-btn:hover { background: var(--vuexy-primary-dark); }

  /* â•â•â• POSITION SELECTOR â•â•â• */
  .position-selector {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
    gap: 0.75rem;
  }

  .position-box {
    background: var(--vuexy-primary);
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
    padding: 0.75rem;
    text-align: center;
    color: white;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.2s;
    border: 2px solid transparent;
  }

  .position-box:hover { transform: translateY(-2px); box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.4); }
  .position-box.active { border-color: var(--vuexy-warning); box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(255, 159, 67, 0.3); }
  .position-label { font-size: 0.7rem; font-weight: 600; text-transform: uppercase; }

  /* â•â•â• SIZE INPUTS â•â•â• */
  .size-inputs {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.75rem;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }

  .size-input-group { flex: 1; min-width: 80px; }
  .size-input-group label { display: block; font-size: 0.75rem; color: var(--vuexy-muted-color); margin-bottom: 0.25rem; }

  .size-input-group input {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 0.5rem;
    border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-sm);
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: 600;
  }

  .size-multiply { font-size: 1.25rem; color: var(--vuexy-muted-color); }

  .quantity-control {
    display: flex;
    border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-sm);
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .quantity-control button {
    width: 32px;
    border: none;
    background: var(--vuexy-body-bg);
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 1rem;
  }

  .quantity-control input {
    width: 50px;
    border: none;
    border-left: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
    border-right: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: 600;
  }

  .price-display { font-size: 1.5rem; font-weight: 700; color: var(--vuexy-primary); }

  /* â•â•â• ADD TO CART â•â•â• */
  .add-cart-btn {
    width: 100%;
    background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
    color: white;
    border: none;
    padding: 1rem;
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
    font-size: 1rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    transition: all 0.2s;
    margin-top: 1rem;
  }

  .add-cart-btn:hover { transform: translateY(-2px); box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.4); }

  /* â•â•â• INSTRUCTIONS â•â•â• */
  .instructions-section {
    background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
    border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
    padding: 1.25rem;
    margin-top: 1.5rem;
  }

  .instructions-title {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    font-size: 1rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }

  .instructions-title i { color: var(--vuexy-primary); }

  .settings-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
    gap: 0.75rem;
    margin-top: 1rem;
  }

  .setting-item {
    background: var(--vuexy-body-bg);
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
    padding: 0.75rem;
    text-align: center;
    border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
  }

  .setting-label { font-size: 0.7rem; color: var(--vuexy-muted-color); text-transform: uppercase; }
  .setting-value { font-size: 1rem; font-weight: 700; color: var(--vuexy-primary); margin: 0.25rem 0; }
  .setting-note { font-size: 0.65rem; color: var(--vuexy-muted-color); }

  /* â•â•â• FLOATING CART â•â•â• */
  .floating-cart-container {
    position: fixed;
    top: 200px;
    right: 30px;
    z-index: 9999;
  }

  .floating-cart-btn {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.6rem;
    background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
    color: white;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 50px;
    padding: 0.75rem 1.25rem;
    font-size: 0.85rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    cursor: pointer;
    box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.4);
    transition: all 0.3s;
  }

  .floating-cart-btn:hover { transform: scale(1.05); }
  .floating-cart-price { background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2); padding: 0.2rem 0.6rem; border-radius: 20px; font-weight: 700; }

  @media (max-width: 992px) {
    .product-gallery { position: relative; top: 0; }
    .position-selector { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); }
    .settings-grid { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); }
  }
</style>

<section class="product-section">
  <div class="container">
    <div class="row">
      <!-- LEFT COLUMN: 3D Gallery - col-lg-5 -->
      <div class="col-lg-5">
        <div class="product-gallery">
          <div class="threejs-container">
            <canvas id="product-canvas"></canvas>
            <button class="wishlist-btn" title="Add to wishlist">
              <i class="ti ti-heart"></i>
            </button>
            <span class="stock-badge">
              <i class="ti ti-check me-1"></i>
              {% if product.available %}In Stock{% else %}Out of Stock{% endif %}
            </span>
            <div class="canvas-controls">
              <button onclick="resetCamera()" title="Reset View"><i class="ti ti-refresh"></i></button>
              <button onclick="rotateLeft()" title="Rotate Left"><i class="ti ti-rotate-clockwise"></i></button>
              <button onclick="rotateRight()" title="Rotate Right"><i class="ti ti-rotate-2"></i></button>
              <button onclick="zoomIn()" title="Zoom In"><i class="ti ti-zoom-in"></i></button>
              <button onclick="zoomOut()" title="Zoom Out"><i class="ti ti-zoom-out"></i></button>
            </div>
          </div>

          <!-- Color Picker -->
          <div class="color-picker-section">
            <div class="color-picker-title">T-Shirt Color</div>
            <div class="color-options">
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #ffffff; border: 1px solid #ddd;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#ffffff', this)" title="White"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #1a1a1a;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#1a1a1a', this)" title="Black"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #2d3748;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#2d3748', this)" title="Dark Gray"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #e53e3e;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#e53e3e', this)" title="Red"></div>
              <div class="color-option active" style="background: #3b82f6;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#3b82f6', this)" title="Blue"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #38a169;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#38a169', this)" title="Green"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #d69e2e;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#d69e2e', this)" title="Gold"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #805ad5;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#805ad5', this)" title="Purple"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #ed64a6;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#ed64a6', this)" title="Pink"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #dd6b20;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#dd6b20', this)" title="Orange"></div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- RIGHT COLUMN: Product Info - col-lg-7 -->
      <div class="col-lg-7">
        <div class="product-info">
          {% for block in section.blocks %}
            {% case block.type %}

              {% when 'reviews_bar' %}
                <div class="rating-section" {{ block.shopify_attributes }}>
                  <div class="rating-stars">
                    <i class="ti ti-star-filled"></i>
                    <i class="ti ti-star-filled"></i>
                    <i class="ti ti-star-filled"></i>
                    <i class="ti ti-star-filled"></i>
                    <i class="ti ti-star-filled"></i>
                  </div>
                  <span class="rating-count"><a href="#reviews">{{ block.settings.review_count }} reviews</a></span>
                  <div class="mini-video-reviews-inline">
                    <div class="mini-story"><img src="https://i.pravatar.cc/100?img=1" alt=""></div>
                    <div class="mini-story"><img src="https://i.pravatar.cc/100?img=2" alt=""></div>
                    <div class="mini-story"><img src="https://i.pravatar.cc/100?img=3" alt=""></div>
                    <div class="mini-story"><img src="https://i.pravatar.cc/100?img=4" alt=""></div>
                    <div class="mini-story"><img src="https://i.pravatar.cc/100?img=5" alt=""></div>
                    <span class="mini-video-label"><i class="ti ti-video"></i> {{ block.settings.video_count }}</span>
                  </div>
                  <span class="cloudy-badge badge-success ms-2">
                    <i class="ti ti-thumb-up me-1"></i>{{ block.settings.recommended }}% Recommended
                  </span>
                </div>

              {% when 'title' %}
                <div {{ block.shopify_attributes }}>
                  <p class="product-category">{{ product.type | default: 'DTF Transfers by Size' }}</p>
                  <h1 class="product-title">{{ product.title }}</h1>
                </div>

              {% when 'delivery' %}
                <div class="delivery-card" {{ block.shopify_attributes }}>
                  <div class="delivery-title">
                    <i class="ti ti-truck-delivery"></i>
                    Get it <span class="delivery-time">{{ block.settings.delivery_time }}</span>
                  </div>
                  <div style="font-size: 0.8125rem; color: var(--vuexy-body-color); margin-top: 0.25rem;">Order by {{ block.settings.order_by }}</div>
                  <div class="delivery-location">
                    <i class="ti ti-map-pin"></i>
                    Deliver To {{ block.settings.location }}
                    <a href="#" style="color: var(--vuexy-primary); margin-left: 0.5rem; font-size: 0.8125rem;">Change</a>
                  </div>
                </div>

              {% when 'price_box' %}
                <div class="price-alert-box" {{ block.shopify_attributes }}>
                  <div class="price-alert-header">
                    <i class="ti ti-flame"></i>
                    <span>{{ block.settings.promo_text }}</span>
                  </div>
                  <div class="price-alert-content">
                    <div class="quick-qty-label"><i class="ti ti-stack-2"></i> Quantity</div>
                    <div class="quick-qty-controls">
                      <button class="quick-qty-btn" onclick="this.nextElementSibling.stepDown()">âˆ’</button>
                      <input type="number" class="quick-qty-input" value="1" min="1">
                      <button class="quick-qty-btn" onclick="this.previousElementSibling.stepUp()">+</button>
                    </div>
                    <div class="quick-price-wrapper">
                      <span class="quick-price">{{ product.price | money }}</span>
                      {% if product.compare_at_price > product.price %}
                        <span class="old-price">{{ product.compare_at_price | money }}</span>
                        <span class="discount-badge">-{{ product.compare_at_price | minus: product.price | times: 100 | divided_by: product.compare_at_price }}%</span>
                      {% endif %}
                    </div>
                    <button class="view-campaigns-btn"><i class="ti ti-discount-2"></i> View Campaigns</button>
                  </div>
                </div>

              {% when 'upload_design' %}
                <div class="step-card" {{ block.shopify_attributes }}>
                  <div class="step-header">
                    <span class="step-number">1</span>
                    {{ block.settings.title }}
                  </div>
                  <div class="upload-area">
                    <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 1rem; width: 100%;">
                      <div class="upload-icon"><i class="ti ti-cloud-upload"></i></div>
                      <div style="flex: 1; text-align: left;">
                        <p class="upload-text">Drag your design here</p>
                        <p class="upload-subtext">PNG, JPG, SVG up to 50MB</p>
                      </div>
                      <button class="upload-btn"><i class="ti ti-device-desktop me-1"></i> My Device</button>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <input type="file" id="design-upload" hidden accept="image/*">
                </div>

              {% when 'position_selector' %}
                <div class="step-card" {{ block.shopify_attributes }}>
                  <div class="step-header">
                    <span class="step-number">2</span>
                    {{ block.settings.title }}
                  </div>
                  <div class="position-selector">
                    <div class="position-box active" data-position="front"><span class="position-label">Front</span></div>
                    <div class="position-box" data-position="back"><span class="position-label">Back</span></div>
                    <div class="position-box" data-position="left"><span class="position-label">Left Sleeve</span></div>
                    <div class="position-box" data-position="right"><span class="position-label">Right Sleeve</span></div>
                  </div>
                </div>

              {% when 'size_selector' %}
                <div class="step-card" {{ block.shopify_attributes }}>
                  <div class="step-header">
                    <span class="step-number">3</span>
                    {{ block.settings.title }}
                  </div>
                  <div class="size-inputs">
                    <div class="size-input-group">
                      <label>Width (Inch)</label>
                      <input type="number" value="9" min="1" max="14">
                    </div>
                    <div class="size-multiply">Ã—</div>
                    <div class="size-input-group">
                      <label>Height (Inch)</label>
                      <input type="number" value="9" min="1" max="12">
                    </div>
                    <div class="size-input-group">
                      <label>Quantity</label>
                      <div class="quantity-control">
                        <button>âˆ’</button>
                        <input type="number" value="1" min="1">
                        <button>+</button>
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="d-flex justify-content-between align-items-center mt-3 pt-3" style="border-top: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);">
                    <span style="color: var(--vuexy-muted-color); font-size: 0.875rem;">Total Price:</span>
                    <span class="price-display">{{ product.price | money }}</span>
                  </div>
                </div>

              {% when 'add_to_cart' %}
                <div {{ block.shopify_attributes }}>
                  <button class="add-cart-btn" type="submit">
                    <i class="ti ti-shopping-cart"></i>
                    {{ block.settings.button_text }}
                  </button>
                </div>

              {% when 'press_info' %}
                <div class="instructions-section" {{ block.shopify_attributes }}>
                  <h3 class="instructions-title">
                    <i class="ti ti-manual-gearbox"></i>
                    Heat Press Instructions
                  </h3>
                  <div class="settings-grid">
                    <div class="setting-item">
                      <div class="setting-label">Temperature</div>
                      <div class="setting-value">{{ block.settings.temperature }}</div>
                      <div class="setting-note">149Â°C</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="setting-item">
                      <div class="setting-label">Time</div>
                      <div class="setting-value">{{ block.settings.time }}</div>
                      <div class="setting-note">Firm Pressure</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="setting-item">
                      <div class="setting-label">Pressure</div>
                      <div class="setting-value">{{ block.settings.pressure }}</div>
                      <div class="setting-note">40-50 PSI</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="setting-item">
                      <div class="setting-label">Peel</div>
                      <div class="setting-value">{{ block.settings.peel }}</div>
                      <div class="setting-note">Immediate</div>
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>

            {% endcase %}
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>

<!-- Floating Cart Button -->
<div class="floating-cart-container">
  <button class="floating-cart-btn">
    <i class="ti ti-shopping-cart"></i>
    <span>Add to Cart</span>
    <span class="floating-cart-price">{{ product.price | money }}</span>
  </button>
</div>

<!-- Three.js Script -->
<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/three.js/r128/three.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/three@0.128.0/examples/js/controls/OrbitControls.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/three@0.128.0/examples/js/loaders/GLTFLoader.js"></script>
<script>
  let scene, camera, renderer, controls, tshirtMesh;

  function initThreeJS() {
    const canvas = document.getElementById('product-canvas');
    if (!canvas) return;

    scene = new THREE.Scene();
    scene.background = new THREE.Color(0xf8f8f8);

    camera = new THREE.PerspectiveCamera(25, canvas.clientWidth / canvas.clientHeight, 0.1, 1000);
    camera.position.set(0, 0, 5);

    renderer = new THREE.WebGLRenderer({ canvas, antialias: true });
    renderer.setSize(canvas.clientWidth, canvas.clientHeight);
    renderer.setPixelRatio(window.devicePixelRatio);

    controls = new THREE.OrbitControls(camera, renderer.domElement);
    controls.enableDamping = true;
    controls.dampingFactor = 0.05;

    const ambientLight = new THREE.AmbientLight(0xffffff, 0.6);
    scene.add(ambientLight);

    const directionalLight = new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff, 0.8);
    directionalLight.position.set(5, 5, 5);
    scene.add(directionalLight);

    const loader = new THREE.GLTFLoader();
    loader.load('{{ "shirt_baked.glb" | asset_url }}', function(gltf) {
      const model = gltf.scene;
      model.traverse((child) => {
        if (child.isMesh) {
          tshirtMesh = child;
          child.material = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({
            color: 0x3b82f6,
            roughness: 0.8,
            metalness: 0.1
          });
        }
      });
      model.scale.set(4, 4, 4);
      model.rotation.y = Math.PI;
      scene.add(model);
    });

    function animate() {
      requestAnimationFrame(animate);
      controls.update();
      renderer.render(scene, camera);
    }
    animate();

    window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
      camera.aspect = canvas.clientWidth / canvas.clientHeight;
      camera.updateProjectionMatrix();
      renderer.setSize(canvas.clientWidth, canvas.clientHeight);
    });
  }

  function changeTshirtColor(color, element) {
    if (tshirtMesh) tshirtMesh.material.color.setStyle(color);
    document.querySelectorAll('.color-option').forEach(el => el.classList.remove('active'));
    if (element) element.classList.add('active');
  }

  function resetCamera() { if (controls) controls.reset(); }
  function rotateLeft() { if (tshirtMesh) tshirtMesh.parent.rotation.y -= 0.5; }
  function rotateRight() { if (tshirtMesh) tshirtMesh.parent.rotation.y += 0.5; }
  function zoomIn() { if (camera) camera.position.z -= 0.5; }
  function zoomOut() { if (camera) camera.position.z += 0.5; }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initThreeJS);
</script>

  .upload-subtext { font-size: 0.75rem; color: var(--vuexy-muted-color); margin: 0; }

  .upload-btn {
    background: var(--vuexy-primary);
    color: white;
    border: none;
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
    font-weight: 500;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.2s;
  }

  .upload-btn:hover { background: var(--vuexy-primary-dark); }

  /* â•â•â• POSITION SELECTOR â•â•â• */
  .position-selector {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
    gap: 0.75rem;
  }

  .position-box {
    background: var(--vuexy-primary);
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
    padding: 0.75rem;
    text-align: center;
    color: white;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.2s;
    border: 2px solid transparent;
  }

  .position-box:hover { transform: translateY(-2px); box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.4); }
  .position-box.active { border-color: var(--vuexy-warning); box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(255, 159, 67, 0.3); }
  .position-label { font-size: 0.7rem; font-weight: 600; text-transform: uppercase; }

  /* â•â•â• SIZE INPUTS â•â•â• */
  .size-inputs {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.75rem;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }

  .size-input-group { flex: 1; min-width: 80px; }
  .size-input-group label { display: block; font-size: 0.75rem; color: var(--vuexy-muted-color); margin-bottom: 0.25rem; }

  .size-input-group input {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 0.5rem;
    border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-sm);
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: 600;
  }

  .size-multiply { font-size: 1.25rem; color: var(--vuexy-muted-color); }

  .quantity-control {
    display: flex;
    border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-sm);
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .quantity-control button {
    width: 32px;
    border: none;
    background: var(--vuexy-body-bg);
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 1rem;
  }

  .quantity-control input {
    width: 50px;
    border: none;
    border-left: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
    border-right: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: 600;
  }

  .price-display { font-size: 1.5rem; font-weight: 700; color: var(--vuexy-primary); }

  /* â•â•â• ADD TO CART â•â•â• */
  .add-cart-btn {
    width: 100%;
    background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
    color: white;
    border: none;
    padding: 1rem;
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
    font-size: 1rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    transition: all 0.2s;
    margin-top: 1rem;
  }

  .add-cart-btn:hover { transform: translateY(-2px); box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.4); }

  /* â•â•â• INSTRUCTIONS â•â•â• */
  .instructions-section {
    background: var(--vuexy-card-bg);
    border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-lg);
    padding: 1.25rem;
    margin-top: 1.5rem;
  }

  .instructions-title {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    font-size: 1rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--vuexy-heading-color);
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
  }

  .instructions-title i { color: var(--vuexy-primary); }

  .settings-grid {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
    gap: 0.75rem;
    margin-top: 1rem;
  }

  .setting-item {
    background: var(--vuexy-body-bg);
    border-radius: var(--vuexy-radius-md);
    padding: 0.75rem;
    text-align: center;
    border: 1px solid var(--vuexy-border-color);
  }

  .setting-label { font-size: 0.7rem; color: var(--vuexy-muted-color); text-transform: uppercase; }
  .setting-value { font-size: 1rem; font-weight: 700; color: var(--vuexy-primary); margin: 0.25rem 0; }
  .setting-note { font-size: 0.65rem; color: var(--vuexy-muted-color); }

  /* â•â•â• FLOATING CART â•â•â• */
  .floating-cart-container {
    position: fixed;
    top: 200px;
    right: 30px;
    z-index: 9999;
  }

  .floating-cart-btn {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.6rem;
    background: var(--vuexy-primary-gradient);
    color: white;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 50px;
    padding: 0.75rem 1.25rem;
    font-size: 0.85rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    cursor: pointer;
    box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(115, 103, 240, 0.4);
    transition: all 0.3s;
  }

  .floating-cart-btn:hover { transform: scale(1.05); }
  .floating-cart-price { background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2); padding: 0.2rem 0.6rem; border-radius: 20px; font-weight: 700; }

  @media (max-width: 992px) {
    .product-gallery { position: relative; top: 0; }
    .position-selector { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); }
    .settings-grid { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); }
  }
</style>

<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/three.js/r128/three.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/three@0.128.0/examples/js/controls/OrbitControls.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/three@0.128.0/examples/js/loaders/GLTFLoader.js"></script>
<script>
  let scene, camera, renderer, controls, tshirtMesh;

  function initThreeJS() {
    const canvas = document.getElementById('product-canvas');
    if (!canvas) return;

    scene = new THREE.Scene();
    scene.background = new THREE.Color(0xf8f8f8);

    camera = new THREE.PerspectiveCamera(25, canvas.clientWidth / canvas.clientHeight, 0.1, 1000);
    camera.position.set(0, 0, 5);

    renderer = new THREE.WebGLRenderer({ canvas, antialias: true });
    renderer.setSize(canvas.clientWidth, canvas.clientHeight);
    renderer.setPixelRatio(window.devicePixelRatio);

    controls = new THREE.OrbitControls(camera, renderer.domElement);
    controls.enableDamping = true;
    controls.dampingFactor = 0.05;

    const ambientLight = new THREE.AmbientLight(0xffffff, 0.6);
    scene.add(ambientLight);

    const directionalLight = new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff, 0.8);
    directionalLight.position.set(5, 5, 5);
    scene.add(directionalLight);

    const loader = new THREE.GLTFLoader();
    loader.load('{{ "shirt_baked.glb" | asset_url }}', function(gltf) {
      const model = gltf.scene;
      model.traverse((child) => {
        if (child.isMesh) {
          tshirtMesh = child;
          child.material = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({
            color: 0x3b82f6,
            roughness: 0.8,
            metalness: 0.1
          });
        }
      });
      model.scale.set(4, 4, 4);
      model.rotation.y = Math.PI;
      scene.add(model);
    });

    function animate() {
      requestAnimationFrame(animate);
      controls.update();
      renderer.render(scene, camera);
    }
    animate();

    window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
      camera.aspect = canvas.clientWidth / canvas.clientHeight;
      camera.updateProjectionMatrix();
      renderer.setSize(canvas.clientWidth, canvas.clientHeight);
    });
  }

  function changeTshirtColor(color, element) {
    if (tshirtMesh) tshirtMesh.material.color.setStyle(color);
    document.querySelectorAll('.color-option').forEach(el => el.classList.remove('active'));
    if (element) element.classList.add('active');
  }

  function resetCamera() { if (controls) controls.reset(); }
  function rotateLeft() { if (tshirtMesh) tshirtMesh.parent.rotation.y -= 0.5; }
  function rotateRight() { if (tshirtMesh) tshirtMesh.parent.rotation.y += 0.5; }
  function zoomIn() { if (camera) camera.position.z -= 0.5; }
  function zoomOut() { if (camera) camera.position.z += 0.5; }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initThreeJS);
</script>

<!-- Three.js Script -->
<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/three.js/r128/three.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/three@0.128.0/examples/js/controls/OrbitControls.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/three@0.128.0/examples/js/loaders/GLTFLoader.js"></script>
<script>
  let scene, camera, renderer, controls, tshirtMesh;

  function initThreeJS() {
    const canvas = document.getElementById('product-canvas');
    if (!canvas) return;

    scene = new THREE.Scene();
    scene.background = new THREE.Color(0xf8f8f8);

    camera = new THREE.PerspectiveCamera(25, canvas.clientWidth / canvas.clientHeight, 0.1, 1000);
    camera.position.set(0, 0, 5);

    renderer = new THREE.WebGLRenderer({ canvas, antialias: true });
    renderer.setSize(canvas.clientWidth, canvas.clientHeight);
    renderer.setPixelRatio(window.devicePixelRatio);

    controls = new THREE.OrbitControls(camera, renderer.domElement);
    controls.enableDamping = true;
    controls.dampingFactor = 0.05;

    const ambientLight = new THREE.AmbientLight(0xffffff, 0.6);
    scene.add(ambientLight);

    const directionalLight = new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff, 0.8);
    directionalLight.position.set(5, 5, 5);
    scene.add(directionalLight);

    const loader = new THREE.GLTFLoader();
    loader.load('{{ "shirt_baked.glb" | asset_url }}', function(gltf) {
      const model = gltf.scene;
      model.traverse((child) => {
        if (child.isMesh) {
          tshirtMesh = child;
          child.material = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({
            color: 0x3b82f6,
            roughness: 0.8,
            metalness: 0.1
          });
        }
      });
      model.scale.set(4, 4, 4);
      model.rotation.y = Math.PI;
      scene.add(model);
    });

    function animate() {
      requestAnimationFrame(animate);
      controls.update();
      renderer.render(scene, camera);
    }
    animate();

    window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
      camera.aspect = canvas.clientWidth / canvas.clientHeight;
      camera.updateProjectionMatrix();
      renderer.setSize(canvas.clientWidth, canvas.clientHeight);
    });
  }

  function changeTshirtColor(color, element) {
    if (tshirtMesh) tshirtMesh.material.color.setStyle(color);
    document.querySelectorAll('.color-option').forEach(el => el.classList.remove('active'));
    if (element) element.classList.add('active');
  }

  function resetCamera() { if (controls) controls.reset(); }
  function rotateLeft() { if (tshirtMesh) tshirtMesh.parent.rotation.y -= 0.5; }
  function rotateRight() { if (tshirtMesh) tshirtMesh.parent.rotation.y += 0.5; }
  function zoomIn() { if (camera) camera.position.z -= 0.5; }
  function zoomOut() { if (camera) camera.position.z += 0.5; }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initThreeJS);
</script>

<section class="product-section">
  <div class="container">
    <div class="row">
      <!-- LEFT COLUMN: 3D Gallery - col-lg-5 -->
      <div class="col-lg-5">
        <div class="product-gallery">
          <div class="threejs-container">
            <canvas id="product-canvas"></canvas>
            <button class="wishlist-btn" title="Add to wishlist">
              <i class="ti ti-heart"></i>
            </button>
            <span class="stock-badge">
              <i class="ti ti-check me-1"></i>
              {% if product.available %}In Stock{% else %}Out of Stock{% endif %}
            </span>
            <div class="canvas-controls">
              <button onclick="resetCamera()" title="Reset View"><i class="ti ti-refresh"></i></button>
              <button onclick="rotateLeft()" title="Rotate Left"><i class="ti ti-rotate-clockwise"></i></button>
              <button onclick="rotateRight()" title="Rotate Right"><i class="ti ti-rotate-2"></i></button>
              <button onclick="zoomIn()" title="Zoom In"><i class="ti ti-zoom-in"></i></button>
              <button onclick="zoomOut()" title="Zoom Out"><i class="ti ti-zoom-out"></i></button>
            </div>
          </div>

          <!-- Color Picker -->
          <div class="color-picker-section">
            <div class="color-picker-title">T-Shirt Color</div>
            <div class="color-options">
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #ffffff; border: 1px solid #ddd;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#ffffff', this)" title="White"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #1a1a1a;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#1a1a1a', this)" title="Black"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #2d3748;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#2d3748', this)" title="Dark Gray"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #e53e3e;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#e53e3e', this)" title="Red"></div>
              <div class="color-option active" style="background: #3b82f6;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#3b82f6', this)" title="Blue"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #38a169;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#38a169', this)" title="Green"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #d69e2e;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#d69e2e', this)" title="Gold"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #805ad5;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#805ad5', this)" title="Purple"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #ed64a6;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#ed64a6', this)" title="Pink"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #dd6b20;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#dd6b20', this)" title="Orange"></div>
            </div>
          </div>

          <!-- Product Tabs - Vuexy Style -->
          <div class="product-tabs-section">
            <div class="product-tabs-nav">
              <button class="product-tab-btn active" onclick="switchTab('specs', this)">
                <i class="ti ti-list-details"></i>
                <span>Technical Specs</span>
              </button>
              <button class="product-tab-btn" onclick="switchTab('description', this)">
                <i class="ti ti-file-description"></i>
                <span>Description</span>
              </button>
              <button class="product-tab-btn" onclick="switchTab('shipping', this)">
                <i class="ti ti-truck-delivery"></i>
                <span>Shipping</span>
              </button>
              <button class="product-tab-btn" onclick="switchTab('care', this)">
                <i class="ti ti-wash-machine"></i>
                <span>Care</span>
              </button>
            </div>

<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/three.js/r128/three.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/three@0.128.0/examples/js/controls/OrbitControls.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/three@0.128.0/examples/js/loaders/GLTFLoader.js"></script>
<script>
  let scene, camera, renderer, controls, tshirtMesh;

  function initThreeJS() {
    const canvas = document.getElementById('product-canvas');
    if (!canvas) return;

    scene = new THREE.Scene();
    scene.background = new THREE.Color(0xf8f8f8);

    camera = new THREE.PerspectiveCamera(25, canvas.clientWidth / canvas.clientHeight, 0.1, 1000);
    camera.position.set(0, 0, 5);

    renderer = new THREE.WebGLRenderer({ canvas, antialias: true });
    renderer.setSize(canvas.clientWidth, canvas.clientHeight);
    renderer.setPixelRatio(window.devicePixelRatio);

    controls = new THREE.OrbitControls(camera, renderer.domElement);
    controls.enableDamping = true;
    controls.dampingFactor = 0.05;

    const ambientLight = new THREE.AmbientLight(0xffffff, 0.6);
    scene.add(ambientLight);

    const directionalLight = new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff, 0.8);
    directionalLight.position.set(5, 5, 5);
    scene.add(directionalLight);

    const loader = new THREE.GLTFLoader();
    loader.load('{{ "shirt_baked.glb" | asset_url }}', function(gltf) {
      const model = gltf.scene;
      model.traverse((child) => {
        if (child.isMesh) {
          tshirtMesh = child;
          child.material = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({
            color: 0x3b82f6,
            roughness: 0.8,
            metalness: 0.1
          });
        }
      });
      model.scale.set(4, 4, 4);
      model.rotation.y = Math.PI;
      scene.add(model);
    });

    function animate() {
      requestAnimationFrame(animate);
      controls.update();
      renderer.render(scene, camera);
    }
    animate();

    window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
      camera.aspect = canvas.clientWidth / canvas.clientHeight;
      camera.updateProjectionMatrix();
      renderer.setSize(canvas.clientWidth, canvas.clientHeight);
    });
  }

  function changeTshirtColor(color, element) {
    if (tshirtMesh) tshirtMesh.material.color.setStyle(color);
    document.querySelectorAll('.color-option').forEach(el => el.classList.remove('active'));
    if (element) element.classList.add('active');
  }

  function resetCamera() { if (controls) controls.reset(); }
  function rotateLeft() { if (tshirtMesh) tshirtMesh.parent.rotation.y -= 0.5; }
  function rotateRight() { if (tshirtMesh) tshirtMesh.parent.rotation.y += 0.5; }
  function zoomIn() { if (camera) camera.position.z -= 0.5; }
  function zoomOut() { if (camera) camera.position.z += 0.5; }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initThreeJS);
</script>

<section class="product-section">
  <div class="container">
    <div class="row">
      <!-- LEFT COLUMN: 3D Gallery - col-lg-5 -->
      <div class="col-lg-5">
        <div class="product-gallery">
          <div class="threejs-container">
            <canvas id="product-canvas"></canvas>
            <button class="wishlist-btn" title="Add to wishlist">
              <i class="ti ti-heart"></i>
            </button>
            <span class="stock-badge">
              <i class="ti ti-check me-1"></i>
              {% if product.available %}In Stock{% else %}Out of Stock{% endif %}
            </span>
            <div class="canvas-controls">
              <button onclick="resetCamera()" title="Reset View"><i class="ti ti-refresh"></i></button>
              <button onclick="rotateLeft()" title="Rotate Left"><i class="ti ti-rotate-clockwise"></i></button>
              <button onclick="rotateRight()" title="Rotate Right"><i class="ti ti-rotate-2"></i></button>
              <button onclick="zoomIn()" title="Zoom In"><i class="ti ti-zoom-in"></i></button>
              <button onclick="zoomOut()" title="Zoom Out"><i class="ti ti-zoom-out"></i></button>
            </div>
          </div>

          <!-- Color Picker -->
          <div class="color-picker-section">
            <div class="color-picker-title">T-Shirt Color</div>
            <div class="color-options">
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #ffffff; border: 1px solid #ddd;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#ffffff', this)" title="White"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #1a1a1a;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#1a1a1a', this)" title="Black"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #2d3748;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#2d3748', this)" title="Dark Gray"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #e53e3e;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#e53e3e', this)" title="Red"></div>
              <div class="color-option active" style="background: #3b82f6;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#3b82f6', this)" title="Blue"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #38a169;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#38a169', this)" title="Green"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #d69e2e;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#d69e2e', this)" title="Gold"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #805ad5;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#805ad5', this)" title="Purple"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #ed64a6;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#ed64a6', this)" title="Pink"></div>
              <div class="color-option" style="background: #dd6b20;" onclick="changeTshirtColor('#dd6b20', this)" title="Orange"></div>
            </div>
          </div>

          <!-- Product Tabs - Vuexy Style -->
          <div class="product-tabs-section">
            <div class="product-tabs-nav">
              <button class="product-tab-btn active" onclick="switchTab('specs', this)">
                <i class="ti ti-list-details"></i>
                <span>Technical Specs</span>
              </button>
              <button class="product-tab-btn" onclick="switchTab('description', this)">
                <i class="ti ti-file-description"></i>
                <span>Description</span>
              </button>

                <i class="ti ti-truck-delivery"></i>
                <span>Shipping</span>
              </button>
              <button class="product-tab-btn" onclick="switchTab('care', this)">
                <i class="ti ti-wash-machine"></i>
                <span>Care</span>
              </button>
            </div>
            
            <div class="product-tabs-content">
              <!-- Technical Specs Tab -->
              <div class="product-tab-pane active" id="tab-specs">
                <div class="tab-content-title">
                  <i class="ti ti-clipboard-list"></i>
                  Product Specifications
                </div>
                <ul class="tab-spec-list">
                  <li><span class="spec-label">Transfer Type</span><span class="spec-value">DTF (Direct to Film)</span></li>
                  <li><span class="spec-label">Material</span><span class="spec-value">Premium PET Film</span></li>
                  <li><span class="spec-label">Resolution</span><span class="spec-value">1440 DPI</span></li>
                  <li><span class="spec-label">Wash Durability</span><span class="spec-value">50+ Washes</span></li>
                  <li><span class="spec-label">Compatible Fabrics</span><span class="spec-value">Cotton, Polyester, Blends</span></li>
                  <li><span class="spec-label">Application Method</span><span class="spec-value">Heat Press</span></li>
                </ul>

                  <i class="ti ti-info-circle"></i>
                  Product Description
                </div>
                <div class="tab-description">
                  <p>Our premium DTF transfers deliver stunning, photo-quality prints that last. Using cutting-edge Direct to Film technology, we ensure vibrant colors and exceptional detail in every design.</p>
                  <p>Perfect for custom apparel, these transfers work on virtually any fabric type and color, giving you unlimited creative possibilities.</p>
                  <div class="tab-features-grid">

<!-- Three.js Script -->
<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/three.js/r128/three.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/three@0.128.0/examples/js/controls/OrbitControls.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/three@0.128.0/examples/js/loaders/GLTFLoader.js"></script>
<script>
  let scene, camera, renderer, controls, tshirtMesh;

  function initThreeJS() {
    const canvas = document.getElementById('product-canvas');
    if (!canvas) return;

    scene = new THREE.Scene();
    scene.background = new THREE.Color(0xf8f8f8);

    camera = new THREE.PerspectiveCamera(25, canvas.clientWidth / canvas.clientHeight, 0.1, 1000);
    camera.position.set(0, 0, 5);

    renderer = new THREE.WebGLRenderer({ canvas, antialias: true });
    renderer.setSize(canvas.clientWidth, canvas.clientHeight);
    renderer.setPixelRatio(window.devicePixelRatio);

    controls = new THREE.OrbitControls(camera, renderer.domElement);
    controls.enableDamping = true;
    controls.dampingFactor = 0.05;

    const ambientLight = new THREE.AmbientLight(0xffffff, 0.6);
    scene.add(ambientLight);

    const directionalLight = new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff, 0.8);
    directionalLight.position.set(5, 5, 5);
    scene.add(directionalLight);

    const loader = new THREE.GLTFLoader();
    loader.load('{{ "shirt_baked.glb" | asset_url }}', function(gltf) {
      const model = gltf.scene;
      model.traverse((child) => {
        if (child.isMesh) {
          tshirtMesh = child;
          child.material = new THREE.MeshStandardMaterial({
            color: 0x3b82f6,
            roughness: 0.8,
            metalness: 0.1
          });
        }
      });
      model.scale.set(4, 4, 4);
      model.rotation.y = Math.PI;
      scene.add(model);
    });

    function animate() {
      requestAnimationFrame(animate);
      controls.update();
      renderer.render(scene, camera);
    }
    animate();

    window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
      camera.aspect = canvas.clientWidth / canvas.clientHeight;
      camera.updateProjectionMatrix();
      renderer.setSize(canvas.clientWidth, canvas.clientHeight);
    });
  }

  function changeTshirtColor(color, element) {
    if (tshirtMesh) tshirtMesh.material.color.setStyle(color);
    document.querySelectorAll('.color-option').forEach(el => el.classList.remove('active'));
    if (element) element.classList.add('active');
  }

  function resetCamera() { if (controls) controls.reset(); }
  function rotateLeft() { if (tshirtMesh) tshirtMesh.parent.rotation.y -= 0.5; }
  function rotateRight() { if (tshirtMesh) tshirtMesh.parent.rotation.y += 0.5; }
  function zoomIn() { if (camera) camera.position.z -= 0.5; }
  function zoomOut() { if (camera) camera.position.z += 0.5; }

  // Tab switching function
  function switchTab(tabId, button) {
    // Remove active from all buttons
    document.querySelectorAll('.product-tab-btn').forEach(btn => btn.classList.remove('active'));
    // Add active to clicked button
    button.classList.add('active');
    
    // Hide all panes
    document.querySelectorAll('.product-tab-pane').forEach(pane => pane.classList.remove('active'));
    // Show selected pane
    const selectedPane = document.getElementById('tab-' + tabId);
    if (selectedPane) selectedPane.classList.add('active');
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initThreeJS);
</script>
